Summary: I'm not a picky traveler, regularly stay in budget hotels, and had a fine stay here. Room was clean and bed was comfortable. Mini fridge looked brand new. The hot tub was working. My only criticism is that the hotel continues to advertise a free breakfast on its website when the hotel staff told me they haven't served breakfast since the start of the pandemic. I'm ok with hotels stopping breakfast service, but please update your website to reflect that. That being said, the price was great and I would stay again.
Manager Response: none

Summary: After staying here in 2015 we decided as it was a nice place we would go again - not a smart idea . There is no longer breakfast included , the rooms are so run down , the spa was closed , to use the laundry you have to wait for it to be available and book, Our door to our room looked like it had been kicked in at some stage and being on the ground floor I was worried so hardly slept the whole week. The noise at night time with people walking past and talking loudly was annoying , The grounds were messy . We checked in on Friday and by Monday had to ask for our room to be made up and replace the towels as it was not done. They did it again on Tuesday and that was the last time until we checked out on the following Friday.Will find elsewhere next time
Room tip: in 2015 was a 4/5 place to stay now in 2022 it would be kind giving it a 1

Summary: Working construction. Due to Rain, work was cancelled. Hotel manager gave me a hard time getting my money back for the rest of my stay that was cancelled due to work. I asked her to work with me. She said that her policies are her policies. So I told her that Days inn isn't the right hotel for my kind of work and she said that I was correct. She didn't budge. I've worked in the area for over 12 years. Stay in hotels. I spoke to the manager of a neighboring hotel and took my guys with me! Days inn just lost 8 rented rooms every week for the next 1 1/2 years. I tried to explain that to her but she told me that her hotel was not for me. Sorry Days inn. Buena Park hotel and suites THANKS YOU FOR OUR BUSINESS!
Manager Response: I'm sorry for the problem. Cancellation policy is setup because we hold your room and exclude someone else from using the room on sold out nights.  If it was a night that wasn't very busy, we can make exceptions since we didn't lose any business to keep the reservation. If it was one of those nights that we weren't sold out for that room type, please contact management with this review and a refund will be issued.

As a Diamond member, I qualify for an early check-in (2 hours early), based upon availability. Another perk is getting free suite upgrades, if available.  When I called the hotel, they informed me that the earliest they allow people to check-in is 30 minutes before the posted time. I informed them of my Diamond status and they said it didn't matter. The Front Desk Agent told me that they were sold out the night before, aside from a suite. I asked them for my free upgrade to that suite and they refused. I reminded them of the Diamond perks that Wyndham has. She said
Manager Response: I'm sorry about this incident. This is a training fault on our end and I'll double check to make sure everyone is informed about the benefits for Diamond members.

The pool was warm, clean, and very enjoyable.  The vending machines were all broken, but there's a Target next door within walking distance. I would stay again considering my tight budget.

Summary: Only hot water at the sink and couldn't easily regulate tamp of shower! I rented three rooms but only had the problem with one room.
Manager Response: I'm sorry about your stay. If you have any issues with your room, please let the front desk know and we can try and fix any issues you have. If we have rooms available we can also move you to a room to your satisfaction.

Summary: like this place, However...   I had asked for a quiet room close to the elevator.  I got the furthest place from and noisey ac unit.   To make things worse my entire family got sick from the bad air coming from the ac.  it was a hot night so we had to run the acor fry.  next morning there was little to no breakfast available and no fruit at all.   coffee in tiny cups two or three ounce or so.  ony thing we liked is that we got to check out late.  BUT again we were on the 4th floor and had to carry all of our bags to our car as they did not have any carts to use.
Manager Response: I'm sorry about your stay. If you have any issues with your room, please let the front desk know and we can try and fix any issues you have. If we have rooms available we can also move you to a room to your satisfaction.

Summary: Didn't Honor Wyndham Platinum early check in. Paid Multiple Deposits just figured everyday someone new would pocket it . last deposit was never returned would find a new reason for me to pay new deposit everyday. Short Asian Manager was really rude and seemed really bitter.
Manager Response: All hotels require a security deposit. Most hotels charge more than $100 for the security deposit. The $50 deposit we hold is used in case of smoking that occurs in the room, for incidentals, or for any room damage. If paid by cash, we will send one of our staff members to inspect the room prior to the return of the $50 cash deposit. If the deposit is paid by credit card, then it will be returned to your credit card in about 3 - 5 business days. It depends on the banks.

Summary: Needs more housekeeping.. carpets need to be cleaned...overall it can be a great hotel, close to stores and restaurants! For a budget stay it's ok..
Manager Response: I'm sorry about your stay. If you have any issues with your room, please let the front desk know and we can try and fix any issues you have. If we have rooms available we can also move you to a room to your satisfaction.

Summary: This particular Days Inn isn't bad.  I don't think it really sets itself apart from other hotels with anything special, but we had a good experience.    Our room was very clean and comfortable.  We weren't afraid to walk barefoot on the carpet.  The housekeeping staff did a great job.  The front desk staff was cordial.  Parking wasn't an issue, although the lot looks like it can be full if you get in too late, and the spaces are a little small.    My main issue was with the breakfast.  Other Days Inns I've stayed at, in addition to what this location provides, have a great hot breakfast offering, including waffles, eggs, grits, oatmeal, and sausage, as well as yogurt, fresh fruit options, different coffees, flavored creamers, and hot chocolate.  The breakfast at this location
Manager Response: Thanks for your review and I'm glad you saw us as a great value.  The breakfast consists of muffins, oranges, orange juice, oatmeal, cereal, milk, toast and coffee from Farmer Brothers and ends at 9AM. The picture of our breakfast can be found on our main website.

Summary: Nice, clean rooms right off the 91. Near lots of restaurants and there's a Target and Dollar Tree in the same parking lot as the hotel.
Manager Response: Thanks for your review and I'm glad you saw us as a great value.

Summary Heading: This hotel is really out dated..
Summary: The price of the hotel was good but the hotel was outdated.  There wasn't an iron in the room.  The phone was broken and lights over the beds did not work.  The microwave was old and did not work either.
Manager Response: I'm sorry about your stay. If you have any issues with your room, please let the front desk know and we can try and fix any issues you have. If we have rooms available we can also move you to a room to your satisfaction.

Summary: Horrible hotel, poor customer service, and security cameras that are non-operational according to the front desk. Police  were on the premises nightly. Lots of homeless and drugs. Car was broken into with no apologies from the hotel.  Will never stay here again.
Manager Response: I'm sorry about what happened during your stay. It is rare that when car break ins occur. Please notify front desk if you see loiters around the hotel and we will promptly have them leave the property.

Summary Heading: Its an Ok pPlace to Sleep
Summary: The best part of this hotel is that it is located at an excellent location for access to Knotts Berry Farm, Disney Land and the beaches. Our intention was to be out all day and into the evenings late. So we only needed a place to sleep. I did not want to spend $200+ at other Aneheim or Buena Park hotels when we wouldn't be there that much. The reviews for this hotel are iffy. But I will say that our 4 day stay was fine. We all slept well, possibly because of shear exhaustion, but the room was clean, the beds were comfortable. True, there are some shady folks in this area but we were not bothered by anyone. There are NO amenities at this location, It is bare bones but if all your going to do is sleep there, and hit the parks, then this is a good way to save some money.
Manager Response: Thanks for your review and I'm glad you saw us as a great value.

Summary: Stayed two days. Both days the breakfast sucked really bad.  Menu was fruitloops or frosted flakes. They also had oatmeal packs and toast. At exactly 9am they came out and tore it down with customers standing in line trying to get cereal. They took the plastic silverware and a few guests were left without a spoon to eat the cereal they had. Some without milk... yeah they took that too. Also found it rude that certain guests camped out in the same eating area playing on their phones or reading papers while people trying to eat had to stand. Need more places to set.
Manager Response: The breakfast consists of muffins, oranges, orange juice, oatmeal, cereal, milk, toast and coffee from Farmer Brothers and ends at 9AM.

Summary: For our first 2 days we had no working refrigerator. And we needed to have milk for our 2 yr old. They did not supply us with bath rags. Our lamp bulb on our desk needed to be replaced. Also our hair dryer did not work.
Manager Response: I'm sorry about your stay. If you have any issues with your room, please let the front desk know and we can try and fix any issues you have. If we have rooms available we can also move you to a room to your satisfaction.

Summary Heading: Disgusting and Full Of Shady People
Summary: Absolutely disgusting the towels had hairs on them... Bathroom was horrific there was a lot of shady people there and the staff was rude. They fail to tell you about breakfast, and the deposit.
Manager Response: I'm sorry about your stay. If you have any issues with your room, please let the front desk know and we can try and fix any issues you have. If we have rooms available we can also move you to a room to your satisfaction.  The breakfast consists of muffins, oranges, orange juice, oatmeal, cereal, milk, toast and coffee from Farmer Brothers and ends at 9AM.  All hotels require a security deposit. Most hotels charge more than $100 for the security deposit. The $50 deposit we hold is used in case of smoking that occurs in the room, for incidentals, or for any room damage. If paid by cash, we will send one of our staff members to inspect the room prior to the return of the $50 cash deposit. If the deposit is paid by credit card, then it will be returned to your credit card in about 3 - 5 business days. It depends on the banks.

Summary Heading: Glad it was just one night
Summary: Not satisfied with the customer service. People seemed to annoyed when being asked a question. Not a friendly staff.
Manager Response: I'm so sorry about that. We were going through some recent staff changes with new hires. I imagine those individuals were the ones who had you problems with.

Summary: I love this hotel. It is clean! but i wish they would change their breakfast every other day or have other options.internet is so slow. but other than those 2 things i love staying here.
Manager Response: Thanks for your review and I'm glad you saw us as a great value.  The outer edges of the hotel have weaker Internet signal due to placement of the Access points. The best rooms are toward the center of each of the three buildings.

Summary Heading: Old, dirty and hard to find
Summary: I passed the hotel a couple of times before I could figure how to get into the parking lot, the freeway is right next to it and I kept almost getting into the freeway trying to figure out the entrance to the hotel's parking.  Turns out you have to enter the Target's parking and then you'll see the hotel.  It looks like there's plenty of parking but on weekends it gets very crowded because of the restaurant/club on the same shopping plaza, I had to park a little far from the hotel.  When I finally got to my room I was very disappointed that my room smelled like humidity or old, the toilet looked like it had been flushed but not cleaned after the last use (gross!) The whole room in general was dated.  I did not feel comfortable sleeping there.  I would not stay there again.  I
Manager Response: I'm sorry about your stay. If you have any issues with your room, please let the front desk know and we can try and fix any issues you have. If we have rooms available we can also move you to a room to your satisfaction.  For some reason on Google Maps, it has you entering the hotel from the Freeway! I try to tell people that our hotel is in the same parking lot as Target.  The breakfast consists of muffins, oranges, orange juice, oatmeal, cereal, milk, toast and coffee from Farmer Brothers.

Summary: Wifi is on and off and at times totally gone. I was also a victim of a car hit and run at the front parking space of the hotels check in register. There was a witness and one of the current lients apparently backed up into my oarked vehicle and destroyed my car. No remorese shown by the hotel management and i am left with a damaged vehicle. what kind of rewards program do you guys have set in olace. Cmon!
Manager Response: I'm sorry to hear about the car accident. I hope you were able to get the insurance of the other individual to take care of the matter.

Summary: The pool area is very nice.  They just need to clean around the pool area more. Clean the tables and the chairs. But the over all very nice days inn.
Manager Response: Thanks for your review and I'm glad you saw us as a great value.

Summary: Property needs to be updated. Adjacent restaurant parking lot was full of garbage which reflects on the curb appeal of the property. Had to change rooms 3 different times before everything worked in the room. Microwave plates are all too big for the rack that they sit on. Bathtubs and Bathroom floors are badly in need of renovation. However desk staff and housekeepers are very nice and helpful. Seems like they have replaced the beds. Very comfortable.
Manager Response: Thanks for the feedback. I'll relay it to my staff.

Summary: It's the worst hotel I've ever stayed in No value for the money No customer service No curtesy They don't believe in Wyndham reward They did not allow me to stay 5 minutes after 12
Manager Response: I'm sorry about your stay. If you have any issues with your room, please let the front desk know and we can try and fix any issues you have. If we have rooms available we can also move you to a room to your satisfaction.

Summary: Exterior walls walking to my room the stucco looked a little old the floors were dirty and the rooms were outdated not sure if they have security because our neighbors were loud
Manager Response: I'm sorry about your stay. If you have any issues with your room, please let the front desk know and we can try and fix any issues you have. If we have rooms available we can also move you to a room to your satisfaction.

Summary Heading: Avoid this Hotel if you can!
Summary: The quality of this hotel was very poor compared to a low budget motel.  At checkin I noticed the facility was smoke free but every walk way had cigarette disposals setup where the hallways smelled like smoke and marijuana.  Our room was in very poor condition with the carpet lifted agains the wall and holes in towels and sheets.  I went down with my boys to swim, but the pool was so dirty it was unusable, especially the jacuzzi.
Manager Response: I'm sorry about your stay. If you have any issues with your room, please let the front desk know and we can try and fix any issues you have. If we have rooms available we can also move you to a room to your satisfaction.  Our hotel is non-smoking inside the rooms. Because of the exterior layout, some guests choose to smoke on the balconies.

Summary: The pool was nasty, dirty, salty (full of kid pee)  The blankets were stained, the check in time is too late the check out time is too early. Makes no sense.
Manager Response: I'm sorry about your stay. If you have any issues with your room, please let the front desk know and we can try and fix any issues you have. If we have rooms available we can also move you to a room to your satisfaction.  Our check in time is 3PM since we have to clean the rooms of people who check out at 11AM. It becomes especially relevant when we are sold out.

Summary: This was the worst experience that I have ever had. I checked in late and unpacked. On my way out of the hotel my girlfriend and I noticed a bad odor which seemed to be coming from the floor but we couldn't quite place it. We decided to purchase Fabreze on the way back but when we returned to the hotel the smell was intense and beyond anything that a spray/deodorizer might do. When we complained about the smell the clerk hands me an unmarked spray bottle stating that this was all he could do. I advised him that my girlfriend and I had already thought of that. He told me that he didn't have any other rooms available and when I asked him to cancel my room and issue me a refund he smiled at the fact that we had checked in almost 5 hours prior to coming forth with our problem. He
Manager Response: I'm so sorry about your stay. I'm glad to hear you were able to get a full refund.

Summary: Unhappy with stay customer service was bad room was dirty and it felt unsafe had bums outside of my room perhibaiting us from pool area and opening blinds along with trash can overflowing
Manager Response: I'm sorry about your stay. If you have any issues with your room, please let the front desk know and we can try and fix any issues you have. If we have rooms available we can also move you to a room to your satisfaction.

Summary: YES AFTER paying for the room, the PARKING was 10 dollars per night "free money for that  franchisee"
Manager Response: I'm sorry for your experience. Parking is free at our hotel.

Summary: We enjoyed our stay at this hotel-nice comfy king bed-big flat screen TV-that's the important stuff-right? Some people may complain that this is a little dated, older property-but  we didn't mind-Everything worked, staff was friendly and there was free coffee and muffins in the morning! Location was excellent-we were so close (same street) to Knott's Berry Farm and Medevil Times-There were restaurants galore in the area-We will stay here again on our next trip to the area!
Manager Response: Thanks for your review and I'm glad you saw us as a great value.

Summary: Upon walking into in the room, there was a huge stain on the floor and it was semi wet. It was dark in color. None of the appliances worked, like the phone, thermostat and a few lamps. The heater was not the thermostat once since that one was covered with tape, it was a ground one. When we put it on it smelled like burning for a while, the thermostat on that didnt work either. The sheets were a little stained on one bed. We checked in late so didnt see another alternative but i know we would never come back here again.
Manager Response: I'm sorry about your stay. If you have any issues with your room, please let the front desk know and we can try and fix any issues you have. If we have rooms available we can also move you to a room to your satisfaction.

Summary: When I first initially booked I said I needed 2 rooms possibly first floor but if its not available then as ong as it was by the elevator it would be ok as I had a older gentleman in a wheelchair. Upon arrival I was greeted warmly but rooms were far on the 4th floor on the other side of the elevator and one room ac didn't work only stayed at one temp, then power went out on our 2nd night, then pool was semi clean, room service or house cleaning would come knocking at around 830am/9am there was no hot water, and I was told they were sold out but yet err passed rooms on the first floor the entire 3 days we were there and it was empty, because Windows were wide open.
Manager Response: I'm sorry about your stay. If you have any issues with your room, please let the front desk know and we can try and fix any issues you have. If we have rooms available we can also move you to a room to your satisfaction.  We do have rooms that are reserved specifically for ADA that can be reserved directly.

Summary: Room was comfy, but had a bad odor. Great wifi signal, good location. Very thin walls could hear neighbors & people walking near.
Manager Response: I'm sorry about your stay. If you have any issues with your room, please let the front desk know and we can try and fix any issues you have. If we have rooms available we can also move you to a room to your satisfaction.

Summary: I don't think we will ever stay at this hotel again. The service wasn't bad, but the room was really dirty. There was some sort of something all over the walls in the bathroom, and the carpets turned the bottoms of our feet completely black; our feet would have been cleaner walking outside!
Manager Response: I'm sorry about your stay. If you have any issues with your room, please let the front desk know and we can try and fix any issues you have. If we have rooms available we can also move you to a room to your satisfaction.  We've installed new carpet in many of our rooms as of early May 2016. We also have a weekly cleaning schedule of the carpets at our hotel.

Summary: I arrived at 2:45pm and there was already 20-25 people waiting to check-in. I would assume that the front desk clerk would accommodate the group check-in before the 3:00pm standard check-in time. Unfortunately that was not the case and many individuals not in the group left. The clerk told me to wait till after he checked everyone else in. I get the strict policy, but after being on the road for 12 hours trying to get here and then having to wait an additional 40 minutes to check-in I will NEVER be staying at this establishment again. Customer service was horrible. Buyer/lodger beware.
Manager Response: Sorry about the delay. We will check people in as soon as possible if we have the rooms cleaned. Once people checkout we have time to clean the rooms thoroughly. On particularly crowded days that checkout, it can be difficult to turn the rooms over earlier than 3PM.

Summary Heading: Too many surprizes with their policies
Summary: Check in was at 3 PM, I arrived around 4:30, The front desk clerk was very professional and courteous.   The things I did not expect at check in was the $50 deposit, you can pay in cash and get your cash back when you check out, or keep it the card you made your reservation with and get it back in 3-5 days. I decided to pay cash so I went to the ATM and the one in their lobby is $5, so I said I will be back, went to lesser charged ATM. After I came back I asked if I could change cards, I really wanted to use my Wyndham rewards card for the extra points, but didn't have it on me when I made the reservation. Came to find out that they charged my card earlier that day for the room charge. I could of changed cards but it would take 3-5 days to get everything back on the card used
Manager Response: The $50 cash deposit is used in case of smoking that occurs in the room, for incidentals, or for any room damage. Upon checkout time, we will send one of our staff members to inspect the room prior to the return of the $50 cash deposit. If the deposit is paid by credit card, then it will be returned to your credit card in about 3 - 5 business days. It depends on the banks.  Reservations are guaranteed by credit card numbers. We will pre-authorize the credit cards for the first night to ensure the guarantee is sufficient in case the guests don't show up for their reservation. If the credit card fails to pre-authorize, then we will attempt to contact the guest for a valid form of guarantee. If the guarantee fails, then we have no choice, but to cancel the reservation.

Summary: The receptionist working that night was rude and didn't explain the 50$  Security deposit. When I got up to my room there were 2 queen beds when I soecifilly said 1 King. I called front desk and he rudely said they had tried calling me to let me know and when I told him I never received anything he said I didn't put my number right and they couldn't do anything. The floor was dirty and the blankets smelled gross. Worst hotel stay I've ever had.
Manager Response: I'm sorry about your experience.  The $50 is a security deposit that can either be paid in cash or placed on a credit card.  We have replaced carpets in numerous rooms, and have new blankets on the way.

Summary: Great location, a lot of places to eat around and stores. Clean room only problem was that the sink in the bathroom wouldn't open so the water could not drain so I figure it out but when opened it instantly smelled like a sewer really foul odor. I wish I could of gotten a discount or something but all I received was an apology. Overall nice stay, good breakfast.
Manager Response: I'm glad you saw us as a good value.

Summary: I stayed at this property when it was under a different name and I kinda expected the same service and commodities, but I was very dissapointed. The outside grounds are cleaner than the carpet in the room. My daughter's white socks turned dark black just from walking inside and the bef comforter was very old. The pillows were old too.
Manager Response: We just finished installing new carpet in numerous rooms, and placed a large order for new pillows and comforters. Sorry for the inconvenience.

Summary: Hotel is updating, some rooms do not have refrig..costemic work..in the place. The staff is trying to thier best.  Location is good, next to the freeway. Full house can be crowed in the lobby for breakfast time, so dont be late.The price makes up for the difference, this hotel has to maintain a good rate..to make this place. All together good !
Manager Response: Thanks for your review and I'm glad you saw us as a great value.

Summary Heading: Very Nice Property! Very comfortable and good sized rooms
Summary: The only drawback was the noise of the freeway on one side - but everything else was wonderful - great service, large rooms, comfortable and very clean. Very nice pool and jacuzzi and I love that it is open till later than most places - that is a Huge plus!!!
Manager Response: Thanks for your review and I'm glad you saw us as a great value.

Summary Heading: Reviews on the Days Inn in Buena Park California
Summary: Reviews on the Days Inn in Buena Park California as I see it. First office staff is great very helpful very courteous very punctual follows through with everything I'm just excellent. As for the overall cleanliness of the room excellent perfect. Actually I will just say this this is a very very nice place to stay for the price it's even better I recommend it to everybody
Manager Response: Thanks for your review and I'm glad you saw us as a great value.

Summary Heading: Nice location, but very bad room
Summary: The location is great and the service is good, but the room has mold. The front desk clerk responded right away to move us to another room. That was excellent service.
Manager Response: Thanks for your review and I'm glad you saw us as a great value.

Summary: It is very hard to get into the parking lot. you have to go through the target parking lot, and if you miss it you may end up on the highway!  The hotel served it purpose for us, but not sure I would stay again. It is in a very high traffic area, making it very noisy, we used the air conditioning to drown out the noise.  We had three people in a two bed room, and every day they only left us two towels, and we had to go ask for more, each time.  The bathtub finish was gone, so it didn't look very good. The bathroom sink is out side the bathroom, right beside a microwave?!?!  It was nice to have a fridge.
Manager Response: I'm not sure how to correct Google Maps. I know it's a problem. I try to tell people we're in the same parking lot as Target. That helps the confusion.  We have ordered more towels to deal with the shortage issue. They should've given you more. That was my mistake, and we have implement regular inventories to prevent that instance in the future.  The hotel is adjacent to the freeway, so if noise is a concern, please call the front desk after making a reservation and request a room that is on the opposite side of the freeway. The A/C is also a great idea.  Thanks for your feedback on the tubs. We're going through and having to refinish them.

Summary Heading: Great location, helpful staff and clean hotel
Summary: Great value and wit was within walking distance of Target, restaurants, food stores and many other amenities. The room was very clean and fairly updated.  Comfortable bed. Roomie lobby area for a change of pace and the pool and hot tube are clean and easily accessible.
Manager Response: Thanks for your review and I'm glad you saw us as a great value.

Summary: I was taken by surprise that One can not stay beyond 6 months at Days Inn Buena Park. I was told last minute and had to leave within couple of days. I was well settled with all my scheduled plans between working hours and meeting timings and other essentials for a  busy official routine day to day. This is a bit of shock to resettle in another hotel with commute  time and other things. Felt sorry to hear about that.
Manager Response: I'm so sorry about the limitation. The City of Buena Park has a unique ordinance that restricts stays at hotels to no more than 60 days total within a 180 day period. If it was entirely our choice, we would love for you to stay longer.  In fact, a group of hotels in 2003 attempted to overturn the law, but lost the case. If this is a major concern for you, the only thing that can be done is to let the current City Council members know about your concern and see if they can overturn the City Code.

Summary: It was decent and very good location.  It was a last  minute need and the price was very good.
Manager Response: Thanks for your review and I'm glad you saw us as a great value.

Summary: On a business trip for 3-night, the hotel is located adjacent to 91-fwy & next to a Target shopping plaza. You can see the hotel from a distance, but there is no clear entrance sign. It was night time, no light on the signs. Under those circumstance, it's very easy to miss the entrance and either get on the W 91-fwy again or miss it entirely. Once you turn into the plaza, you need to go through a restaurant's parking lot to get to that hotel or you will miss and end up in the Target parking lot. There is only one elevator and the room is way on other side. It took me a while to find my bearing. Very confusion!! No or clear directional signs. The room was clean, but being next to freeway the noise was terrible. If you are easy to fall to sleep, you should be okay. The bed was too
Manager Response: Sorry about the confusing entrance. We're in the same parking lot as Target. There are two elevators at the hotel. One is in the lobby.  The hotel is adjacent to the freeway, so if noise is a concern, please call the front desk after making a reservation and request a room that is on the opposite side of the freeway.

Summary: Overall, not a bad place for the price, but they could definitely improve on their breakfast with healthier choices such as hard-boiled eggs, multi-grain toast, yogurt and multi-grain cereals rather than the junk foods put out. As well, our carpet had clearly not been vacuumed and a bloody booger had been wiped on the wall, and would have been easy enough to clean up. Beds were pillow top and very comfortable, as were the pillows, staff were friendly, professional, and helpful.
Manager Response: The breakfast consists of muffins, danishes, oranges, orange juice, oatmeal, cereal, milk, toast and coffee from Farmer Brothers. This is the franchise required breakfast across all Days Inns.  I'm sorry about your stay. If you have any issues with your room, please let the front desk know and we can try and fix any issues you have. If we have rooms available we can also move you to a room to your satisfaction.

Summary Heading: Do not like being lied to!!
Summary: I was fine, but when I asked about the $50 deposit, I was lied to!  I was going to pay it in cash, but the lady said I could put it on my bank card and it would be refunded the next day!!  Not 3 to 5 business days!!  When I checked out the next day,  I was told that the lady was wrong, and I had to wait 3 to 5 business days because I used a card!!  I told them when I checked out that I offered to pay the security deposit in cash the day before, but was talked out of it!!!  I left your property very mad, and will not ever go back!!!  I hate being lied to!!
Manager Response: I apologize for the confusion. The deposit on the debit cards are released upon checkout assuming no incidentals or damage to the room, but the time the banks process it can be 3 to 5 days.   When a cash deposit is received, it is released upon checkout after a room inspection.  I'll remind our staff about the time it takes for the funds to be credited back to the accounts.

Summary: It was in a good location next to a target which saves me the second day that we were there. Complementary breakfast was included so we got it the first day and then the second day they shut it down so then I had to go to the target to go get stuff.
Manager Response: I apologize for the breakfast situation. Breakfast currently ends at 9AM.

Summary Heading: Clean, quiet, convenient locationGreat desk area for work...
Summary: Clean, quiet, convenient location Great desk area for work - but need more plug-ins Good location by 91 and close to I-5
Manager Response: We're working on that and have already started installing extension power outlets in select rooms.

Summary: Clean huge room. My son was very happy with the Flat screen television and choice of channels. the pool facilities were clean. Pool not crowded in the afternoon. Front desk staff very helpful. We did not have breakfast at the hotel but the 10% discount to nearby restaurants was excellent. Shopping and food within walking distance. Thank you for a comfortable stay.
Manager Response: Thanks for your review and I'm glad you saw us as a great value.

Summary: This was a disappointing stay. The only difference is this location had a college dormitory style refrigerator (too small to hold anything other than beverages) and a decent microwave. The Refrigerator was placed on the floor, ah, excuse me?  I'm an adult not a teen... and I'm disabled so the maintenance placed it on the luggage rack, great, well that's creative but not really convenient because then it was at knee level, and with a bad back I had to bend over, and my companion at 6'3 had to do the same.  Not ideal or desirable.    $77 dollars was a lousy value for this dirty and un-kept property.   The laundry room isn't maintained and the front office requires guests to get a separate designated "laundry" key card to use the laundry room (but of course, you aren't advised of
Manager Response: Thanks for the feedback.  The breakfast consists of muffins, danishes, oranges, orange juice, oatmeal, cereal, milk, toast and coffee from Farmer Brothers.

Summary: This is a great place to stay at. It is close to all of the attractions and right by a freeway.
Manager Response: Thanks for your review and I'm glad you saw us as a great value.

Summary: Enjoyed our family stay here.  We stayed in a suite with plenty of room for the grandkids. The best part of staying in a suite here was that there are two bathrooms with tub and shower.  The breakfast was a normal continental breakfast. Danishes, cereal, coffee, juice, and bagels.  You gotta get up early if you want to eat though as the breakfast closes at 9:00.  Maybe one day they will leave it open till 10:00.  If you don't make it in time you can walk to Denny's or get coffee at Starbucks inside Target. Both are in walking distance from the hotel.
Manager Response: Thanks for your review and I'm glad you saw us as a great value.

Summary: Room was not very nice. Door of our room did not fully close and hotel is right beside the freeway, so it was a very loud night.  Staff sent maintenance, but there was nothing they could do.  No other rooms were available. Bed sheets had rips in them. Hotel is generally dirty and in desperate need of renovations.  Our kids enjoyed the pool and the staff was nice.  Free breakfast, but lacking in quality.
Manager Response: I'm sorry to hear about your stay.  The hotel is adjacent to the freeway, so if noise is a concern, please call the front desk after making a reservation and request a room that is on the opposite side of the freeway.  Sheets should had been replaced if they have rips in them.   The breakfast consists of muffins, danishes, oranges, orange juice, oatmeal, cereal, milk, toast and coffee.

Summary: This hotel is a few miles from Disney but it worked out perfectly. Older hotel so nothing fancy
Manager Response: Thanks for your review. I'm glad you found our hotel to be a good value.

Summary: the bed cover sheets were not cleaned.  The hallways looks dirty.  The interior of the unit specially the bathroom look very old; it needs to be updated, repaired, resurfaced, or something to make it look better.
Manager Response: I'm sorry about your stay. If you have any issues with your room, please let the front desk know and we can try and fix any issues you have. If we have rooms available we can also move you to a room to your satisfaction.

Summary: As knotts was close we chose this hotel. Luckliy room was a bit renovated, reception was bad, sofa was all torn.Last day we had no hot water in shower. Breakfast is just orange and bread and cereals, which is fine as long as they keep it, we have to ask to replenish the items finished, also breakfast was just till 9. Other hotels on weekends keep it till 10. Very few table and chairs for breakfast.
Manager Response: Thanks for your feedback. I'll see what I can do about the table and chairs during breakfast.

Summary: Got dropped off at hotel and before stepping into lobby,someone outside asked us for money. The trash can outside was overflowing with trash to the top and more and on the stairs. Hotel hallway/elevator smelled like pot. Walked in room and used the toilet and it almost overflowed to the top when flushed. So called the front and they said they would send up maintenance. A guy came up with a plunger said there was something stuck but it's okay now. When he left I flushed it to check and it was the same, I asked if I could change rooms and they said it's sold out. I walked over to shower and stepped in to shower and the tub turned black with my foot print so I turned to look at the towel/mat on the ground and saw my foot prints clearly in black! It means the rug is Sooo filthy! I
Manager Response: none

Summary Heading: Dirty, outdated, noisy.  Amenities were below par. Upside...
Summary: Dirty, outdated, noisy.  Amenities were below par. Upside:  the bed was comfortable and the staff friendly.

The hotel is adjacent to the freeway, so if noise is a concern, please call the front desk after making a reservation and request a room that is on the opposite side of the freeway.

Summary: This hotel was horrible sheets had red stains on them pillows were old sheets and towels had black stains on them carpets was dirty and stained need new carpets Blake was rude and had no customer service. I would never stay at this property again
Manager Response: I'm sorry to hear about your stay. The things you mentioned are unacceptable for my hotel. Please let the front desk know about your issues and we can try and take care of the issues.  We are in process of replacing carpets in select rooms as of March 21, 2016.

Summary: Stayed here as Disneyland was so near to this place. Overall it was ok with the room,maintenance, morning breakfast. On final bill they charged $50 as misc expense, no reason was given for that. Towels were of poor quality though. Buliding was old and outside maintenance was really poor, people vomited on the stairway and no one bothered to clean it up.
Manager Response: Please call the hotel and ask for Asiri to figure out what that $50 misc expense is. We can always refund it if it was done in error.

Summary Heading: My Stay at Day's Inn, Buena park
Summary: There were large stains on the Carpet , the Bedspread and even the chairs. These were large stains which could not be ignored. I did not spend the night because I felt the room was dirty. I was very disappointed this time. I have stayed here many times before and it was not this bad. The sheets, towels, bedspreads are all very old and thin !
Manager Response: I'm sorry about your stay. If you have any issues with your room, please let the front desk know and we can try and fix any issues you have. If we have rooms available we can also move you to a room to your satisfaction.

Summary Heading: If there was a -1000000 thats what I would rate this place

When I got to this so called motel, hotel whatever they want to call it, the front desk guy was a total arrogant you know what. He had the worst attitude IV ever seen! Got the keys and walked into my "delux" room........ Carpet was so wet it soaked in between my toes up from my sandles!! Yuck!!! The room smelled so bad I wish I had one of those UV lights to find the area something died in! I was so furious with this guy's attitude, and now I had to deal with one of the smallest most disgusting wet so called room ID ever seen. My mother couldn't even stand the smell. This place could not pass inspection! No way! Changed our "room" which I'd like to
Manager Response: I'm sorry about your stay. If you have any issues with your room, please let the front desk know and we can try and fix any issues you have. If we have rooms available we can also move you to a room to your satisfaction.

Summary: Room is adequate.  Desk chair had a broken armrest.  no digital thermostat in room.  once they had sheets on the bed that were stained
Manager Response: Thanks for your feedback. If you let the front desk know about the problems in your room, we can see if we can fix it. I know for a fact, that we have numerous extra desk chairs that we could've replaced it with. Also, stained bed sheets are not acceptable!

Summary: It is in a good location right off the freeway and not that far from knotts berry farm. The parking is not the greatest. But it is a safe area.
Manager Response: Thanks for your feedback!

Summary Heading: HORRIBLE!!!  I couldn't leave a MINUS ZERO STAR RATING!  WORST HOTEL STAY, EVER!!!
Summary: I only stayed here because the Knott's Hotel was booked for a cheer competition that weekend.  Lesson learned... DO NOT STAY HERE, EVER!!!   There was an issue with my reservation on the Hotel's end.  The counter girl was adamant that I did not have a reservation, and would not assist me further, even though she had my itinerary and identification in her hand.  Instead, she blamed my reservation company and instructed me to contact them.  At 10:00 pm.  After driving 5 hours from Las Vegas, Nevada.  With my tired and cranky children waiting. So, I call the booking company who then calls the desk, and the same girl verifies my reservation to them on the phone!  When I confront her on this, she realizes that she has been put on the spot and begrudgingly checks me in.   I get a
Manager Response: We record the audio and video at our front desk. If you can contact the hotel and ask for Asiri with your information, we can see if we can research what exactly happened for your check in.  The restaurant next door has a parking agreement with our lot, so they are allowed to park in our lot. Regarding the noise next door, please notify the front desk and we can put you in touch with the Buena Park Police. The Buena Park Police told us that the hotel guests would have to file a noise complaint in order for the Police to take action.  The hotel is adjacent to the freeway, so if noise is a concern, please call the front desk after making a reservation and request a room that is on the opposite side of the freeway.  If you have any issues with your room, please let the front desk know and we can try and fix any issues you have. If we have rooms available we can also move you to a room to your satisfaction.

Summary Heading: Great location, property out of maintenance
Summary: Very good location for the attractions, knotts berry farm and Disney, walking distance to many places to eat and large swimming pool, and great mattresses but rooms in general and carpets needs renovation, poor choices for breakfast and poor staff attention get me to rate this hotel like POOR
Manager Response: We have replaced some of the carpets in the rooms the week of March 21, 2016.  The breakfast consists of muffins, oranges, orange juice, oatmeal, cereal, milk, toast and coffee.

Summary: Making a reservation was a breeze. Check-in was a snap. The staff are wonderful. Having a simple breakfast in the lobby is a nice touch. Thanks Days Inn!
Manager Response: Thanks for your feedback!

Summary Heading: That's being nice to even rate this hotel a 1.
Summary: There was a dead cockroach in my room. I called office to have them remove it. If the maid throughly cleaned that cockroach should not have been there. I kept hearing scratching at night by the fridge. When I pulled my son's clothes from the dresser drawer I found mice poop and pee on the bottom of the drawer and my son's clothes. The people that work in the office are rude and the maids were just as rude.  I brought the cockroach and mice up to them and they never offered any compensation. They even saw both. It's a dump.
Manager Response: I'm sorry about your stay. If you have any issues with your room, please let the front desk know and we can try and fix any issues you have. If we have rooms available we can also move you to a room to your satisfaction.  Isotech professionally manages pests at our hotel. Isotech is the pest management company featured on the show, "Verminators."

Summary: the beds dont have a protective cover to protect from bed bugs  the room smell bad and are stuffy  the rooms are not well maintained  people are smoking at there doors and on stairs
Manager Response: I'm sorry about your stay. If you have any issues with your room, please let the front desk know and we can try and fix any issues you have. If we have rooms available we can also move you to a room to your satisfaction.

Summary Heading: Two Week Stay at Days Inn
Summary: Overall this was a great stay here at Days Inn. The only major problem I had on a daily basis was that my key would not work and I would have to get new keys issued. The front desk workers were polite as standard. The house keepers were also friendly although the main housekeeper was a bit cranky every morning. At the end of my stay it took a while to get my cash deposit back but everything checked out good. All in all my family and I really enjoyed our stay and would absolutely come back.
Manager Response: The new locks for our doors has arrived and we are coordinating the installation. They are the RFID locks so they don't have the magnetic strip. We are starting with the 4th floor for the transition and working our way down.

Summary: The staff was very rude to us and acted like our business was not important. This was the white male attendant with the arm injury as well as the cleaning lady.
Manager Response: Thank you for your feedback. I'll let the staff know about the issue.

Summary: Hotel is a little dated the rooms are clean we had the suite which was plenty big  The continental breakfast was just a breakfast nothing special swimming pool was OK the hot tub didn't work every night the staff was friendly it was really close to Knottsberry farm Disneyland a medieval times dinner and pirate dinner show the restaurants around the motel give you 10% off for staying at the motel
Manager Response: Thanks for your feedback.   The breakfast consists of muffins, oranges, orange juice, oatmeal, cereal, milk, toast and coffee.

Summary: No TV remote when we first checked in, phone didn't work so we had to call 800 number to get front desk number to report both problems.  The rooms were rundown, bedding appeared to be very old, bed spread had several cigarette burn holes, pillow cases were so threadbare they were see-through, and tub had what appeared to be mold in the grout. Rooms had double paned windows, but one of the panes was missing in our room.  My 6 yr old threw up in the middle of the night, and we needed new bedding.  We were told there was none available, and were only provided with one fitted sheet, which we had to pick up from front desk ourselves.  I had to use towels to cover my daughter while she slept.  When I reported my frustration to the front desk in the morning, I was told that normally
Manager Response: Thanks for your feedback. I'll let the staff know.  There are numerous problems you had pointed out, and I will work toward having extra stock on hand so that it doesn't happen again.

Summary: Ok this place is called Days Inn Good Nite Inn so dont look for buena park days inn. Dirty room no shampoo 1/2 bittle of conditioner only 2 towels, slippery shower, hard bed, fan on and off all night long, blah blah blah. At least the elevator worked, did not stay for breakfast.  :/
Manager Response: I'm sorry about your stay. If you have any issues with your room, please let the front desk know and we can try and fix any issues you have. If we have rooms available we can also move you to a room to your satisfaction.  Our hotel is called: "Days Inn, Buena Park." There does exist a "Good Nite Inn" and also a "Buena Park Hotel and Suites." I agree, it does get confusing.

Summary: We spent 4 nights here at the start of our US road trip.The room was a a bit dated but clean.It was in walking distance to plenty of places to eat.The staff were nice and helpful.If we are in the area again we would stay there again for sure
Manager Response: Thanks! I hope you got a chance to receive our 10% discounts to local restaurants that you can get from the front desk.

Summary: The hotel was a good value but it was located near a busy freeway which made easy acess but also loud and hard to get to sleep.
Manager Response: Dear 308darcyr,  Thank you for your review. Next time if the freeway sound is bothering you please let us know so we can move you to a room away from the freeway.   Look forward to welcome you again.  Sincerely,  Franciscu S

Summary: I was very disappointed by the stained sheets/dirty bedspread.  Also the tub & sink were dirty.  Disgusting.  I want my money back.
Manager Response: Dear 697tracyeh,  I am sorry that your room was not up to your satisfaction. I will let our housekeeping manager know about the sheets you mentioned. Please feel free to call me to discuss about your experience.   Thank you,  Franciscu S.

Summary: The room was ok, just adequate.  One side of the building is a very loud freeway, the other an outdoor restaurant  /  disco.  the music started at 9pm and ended at 2 am.  It was so loud the walls of the room shook.  Not a pleasant stay.
Manager Response: Dear 137charlesa,  Thank you for your review. I apologize for the inconvenience caused due to the  sound from the restaurant. We can definitely move you to another room if the music is bothering you. Once again, I am sorry for the inconvenience and it is our hope you will give us another chance to serve you in the future.    Sincerely,  Franciscu S.

Summary: Location, location, location. I like the fact that its pretty much centralized from Disneyland and Knotts. Its also right next to a club which is a bonus.
Manager Response: Dear 855jesusg,  Thank you for your review and we look forward to welcome you again.  Sincerely,  Franciscu S.

Summary Heading: Service was great!  The pool and hotub was nice. The rooms...
Summary: Service was great!  The pool and hotub was nice. The rooms were ok but have not been updated in quite a while.  The bathroom really needed updating...the caulking was old and cracked, the bathtub was rusty. The breakfast was a just the basics. Nice that it has many restaurants near by.  the freeway if right in the back  so it is noisy.
Manager Response: Dear Mike,  Thank you for your review. I will let our housekeeping and maintenance manager know about the condition of the room you mentioned.   We look forward to welcome you again.  Sincerely,  Franciscu S.

Summary: Days inn is another option close to knots berry farm includes breakfast  rooms are spacious and they include microwave oven and a little fridge  I got surprised about the silence of the rooms the rooms are made of brick and mortar not false walls where you could easily hear other rooms noize  they include a pool and a jacuzzi  continental breakfast is ok  and if you want you could walk to knots berry farm instead of using your car  uber may be an option but two uber rides may equal to the price of the parking
Manager Response: Dear Techie R,  Thank you for your great review and we look forward to welcome you again.  Sincerely,  Franciscu S.

Summary: Extremely moved by the quality of service. My sincere thanks to the Manager who takes initiatives on Guest services and proactive support management extended service to guests.
Manager Response: Dear 282muralir,  Thank you for your great review. We look forward to welcome you again.  Sincerely,  Franciscu S.

Summary: Their was a very long line in the lobby, the rep was doing what she could, where the manager of the property watched from a adjoining room
Manager Response: none

Summary: My boyfriend and I planned to go to Disneyland last summer and this was the only Inn available at the time. Once we arrived we were very pleased for what we paid for, there was free WiFi, complementary breakfast, a nice swimming pool, and many more amenities. The front desk was very helpful when it came to answering our questions about transportation services to Disneyland. The location was great as well we were located in a corner of a square like plaza that had many restaurants, clothing stores, and a target so it was fairly easy to go out and get the things we forgot to pack. (All in walking distance, less than five minutes). The only down fall was when we checked in they made us pay another security deposit (we payed one online) so we were a little thrown off by that but
Manager Response: none

Summary: Right off the 91 fwy n beach blvd. Hidden in back corner. Freeway is literally the backyard. Alot of things to do within walking distance which was a plus. Target is not even a qtr mile from hotel. Black Angus, Wendys, Fuddruckers, Knotts Berry Farm, Medieval Times, Pirates Carribbean show and dinner, and more. Overall not too bad rooms are large enough but there is a big desk in the way. Beds are cozy. Definitely needed more towels in the room but especially if going to use the pool or spa. Could use a little updating, but I would go again.
Manager Response: none

Summary: The door never closed right had to give it a few hard trys before it locked. The refrigerator never got cold
Manager Response: none

Summary: Run down hotel. Convenient for free parking, location, free internet and so called free breakfast. My room was extremely noisy, seems there is no sound proof at all. Definitively a one night stop. Not terrible but way below average. Won't return for sure despite the staff are very friendly.  If you're a budget traveller... you got what you paid for!!!
Manager Response: none

Summary: We have stayed here many times and I am never disappointed! The staff is super friendly and helpful, it's always clean and conveniently close to businesses and freeways! We come down to this area several times a year and we always choose to stay here!
Manager Response: none

Summary: My stay at the Days Inn is always enjoyable. the staff is accomedating, but... I think with so many rooms there should be more washer and dryers available.
Manager Response: none

Summary: I might stay there again but bring my own blankets. Staff were really nice! Breakfast good and very crowded. We saw a roach in our room. My husband won't stay there again but I might. Bed mattress was comfy.
Manager Response: none

Summary: we visited Disneyland. great location; near to freeways; 10mins to Disneyland. restaurants near by; plenty options breakfast was not satisfactory
Manager Response: none

Summary: The hotel was in a nicer area.  This was important to me because I was traveling by myself and I was not worried about my safety at all.  When I checked in the lady was very friendly and helpful.  The mattress was comfortable.  The sheets were clean but scratchy and the bedspreads were covered in stains - definitely  need to be cleaned or replaced. The towels were super thin and scratchy. I made sure not to use the shower since it was not as clean as I would have liked.  The room was clean as in I know that it was cleaned, but could use a make over, it did not look clean, if that makes sense. Also it was noisy.  The walls were super thin.  I could hear people taking in the next room, traffic from the freeway and the fridge vibrating.  There was a fridge and microwave which was
Manager Response: none

Summary: Stained sheets and bedspread, front office sent up a sheet for me to change and they were out of bedspread.  Next night had a burned bedspread. My son told me his room had holes in bedding. I also asked for an extra pillow, but they ran out. I was given a pool towel because they ran out of bath towels. The price quoted on the phone differed from actual price. They adjusted the price and gave me a total close to original after they "gave me a lower rate and discount for troubles". They apologized alot.
Manager Response: Dear Gina,  Thank you for your review and please accept my apologies for the rate difference. Our rates fluctuate depending on our occupancy. However, if you have a confirmed reservation the rate will not change. I will let our housekeeping manager know about the stains you mentioned.   Sincerely,  Franciscu S.

Summary Heading: A stay to check out the area
Summary: great lobby area. friendly staff rooms were clean and comfortable  seems to be in a great area. close to restaurants and a major department store  everything was good. found roaches as we were leaving. if i would of known the place has roaches , I would not of stayed
Manager Response: Dear Kenneth,  Thank you for your genuine review. We work with Isotech who is our pest management company and will let them know about the roaches you mentioned. We also use a gel bait to keep away the insects.   Sincerely,  Franciscu S.

Summary Heading: The hotel cleanliness was not up to standards. Sink and...
Summary: The hotel cleanliness was not up to standards. Sink and bath wouldn't drain . Floor was dirty they was black hair on the sheets and stains on the blanket. Staff was friendly and lobby was clean .
Manager Response: Dear M902DTdianam,  Thank you for taking the time to write a review. Please accept my apologies for the condition of the room. I will let our housekeeping manager know about the stains you mentioned.   Sincerely,  Franciscu S.

Summary: Only thing good about this Days Inn Housekeeping. Otherwise Paint pilling off from bath tub, tiles missing, no face plate on telephone for instruction, we stayed 3 days, went their only to sleep, homeless guys going around asking for food and money. Worn off carpet.
Manager Response: Dear Satyen,  Thank you for taking the time to write a review. We greatly appreciate your feedback. We are looking into changing the carpets in the near future. Look forward to welcome you again.   Sincerely,  Franciscu S.

Summary: This was our second visit this fall. We stay at this property and find it to be perfect get-away (respite) from taking care of elderly parents about 20 miles away. The service, price, and accomodation are all beter than average.  We would like to see a little more attention given to keeping the parking lot clean of bits of trash.  On both visits we note that the AC filters had not been cleaned in a long time.  The continental breakfast is a bit of a disappointment. It has the feel of "we have to" as opposed to "we want to". The selection, presentation, seating, and food quality are a minimum for a $100 per night general mid level hotel. They could learn a lot from a Comfort Inn (granted a higher level property) or a Microtel ( not a higher level property).  Still in the end we
Manager Response: Dear Kenfillups,  Thank you for taking the time to write a honest review. I will notify the housekeeping manager about the A/C filters you mentioned. We look forward to welcome you again.   Sincerely,  Franciscu S.

Summary: The restaurant next door was so LOUD with music and singing until 1am that I could NOT sleep and I needed to get up early the next day. Poor Location for this hotel. I will not stay here again. The continental breakfast was not all that great compared to other hotels.
Manager Response: Dear Eric,  Please accept my apologies about the music from the restaurant. We will look into what can be done about this issue. There was a time that we did not get any complaints about the music but seems like it's happening again. Our breakfast includes muffins,danishes, wheat and white bread, butter, jam, two kinds of cereal, oats, tea, coffee, orange and apple juice.   Sincerely,  Franciscu S.

Summary: Great location for this hotel with entertainment and restaurants close by.  Our trip was to Knott's Berry Farm which was just 2 minutes away, and Medieval Knights and Pirate Dinner Adventure are even closer.  A little older property, but relatively quite considering there is a freeway ramp right there (our room was on the off side).  Continental breakfast was kind of a disappointment.  we grabbed coffee and headed to the local restaurants.  Staff was friendly and helpful.  Couldn't get the WiFi to work/stay connected, so used the computer in the lobby for information.
Manager Response: Dear Ronald,  Thank you for taking the time to write a review. We greatly appreciate your feedback. Our breakfast includes muffins,danishes, wheat and white bread, butter, jam, two kinds of cereal, oats, tea, coffee, orange and apple juice. I am not sure if you notified the front desk about the difficulty you had with the wifi. Please accept my apologies.   Look forward to welcome you again.  Sincerely,  Franciscu S.

Summary: It use to be a LA Quinta.   I have been coming here for years.   I love the seclusion feel even though your not.   It clean and quiet.   The staff is efficient,  friendly,  and great.   Love,  love,  this place.  It's a really comfortable place.
Manager Response: Dear Raventhorn,  We are glad to hear you enjoyed your stay with us and we look forward to welcome you again.  Sincerely,  Franciscu S.

Summary: There were spiders on our bed. And when we walked around for not even 15 minutes in the room, all of our socks were all black! I only rated the other start since it was close to our destination.
Manager Response: Dear Guest,  Thank you for your review. I will notify our pest management company about the spiders you mentioned. Please accept my apologies.   Sincerely,  Franciscu S.

Summary: We stayed in a room on the first floor. I realize there's more foot-traffic but this was beyond normal for a hotel establishment. There was nasty spit stain on the wall right next to the door, an a big glob of fresh spit 2 feet in front of the doorway. inside the room was actually decent for the price, but it was obvious that proper cleaning had not been done - there was a spit stain on the side of the dresser. I'm sure that because of price the quality of clientele has diminished but, honestly, some of the things we noticed were a surprise. it might be time for a pep-talk with the staff, or some way to filter out disrespectful customers.
Manager Response: Dear Guest,  Thank you for taking the time to write a review and I will be having a meeting with our staff members and will be sharing this feedback.   Sincerely,  Franciscu S.

Summary: Courterous service.   Easy freeway access.   Breakfast was available at 6:00AM. Would recommend this hotel.  Used for business purposes.
Manager Response: Dear Philip,  Thank you for your review and we look forward to welcome you again.  Sincerely,  Franciscu S.

Summary: Good price near Disneyland. A little sketchy clientele but to be expected for such a good price.  Carpets really dirty but otherwise OK.
Manager Response: Dear BillybN4016LP,  Thank you for taking the time to write a review.   Glad you made use of our competitive rates.  Look forward to welcome you again.   Sincerely,  Franciscu S.

Summary Heading: our room is no.113 and is next to the power room so it is so loud .
Summary: We ask a front desk about this issue they said nothing they can do, even I did make a reservation by phone and give them my credit card plus asking them if they can put me on 2nd floor by an office side so politely. But when we check in Nov.21,2015 the lady name acnes I believe she's an owner again nothing she can do and we can not get to the room until 4.28p.m because the room does not clean yet. So I believe make a reservation 2 days in advance does not mean anything or guarantee that you going to get what you been request not like another hotel policy. We stay with them for so many years this is a 1st time we're totally disappointed!
Manager Response: Dear Siriwons,  I am sorry that you were given the particular room you mentioned. Making a reservation in advance guarantees a room for the dates you booked. However, all the special requests are honored on availability basis. I will talk to Agnes to find out why she was not able to move you to anther room. Please contact me directly when you plan to visit us again and I will make sure you get a room of your choice.  Sincerely,  Franciscu S.

Summary: Nice stay, great staff and great AM breakfast. Clean rooms and surroundings. Shopping is close and eating is close, all can be walked to in the area. Inn gives you a 10% discount card for the local eatery's,etc.
Manager Response: Dear Darren,  Thank you for taking the time to write a review and we look forward to welcome you again.   Sincerely,  Franciscu S.

Summary: The room we stayed in had roaches, towels and bath tub was not clean. I would not recommend this Days Inn location to anybody and will never stay here again.
Manager Response: Dear Kenny809,  Please accept my apologies for the inconveniences caused. I will let our bug company know about the roaches you mentioned.   Sincerely,  Franciscu S.

Summary: Everyone was very nice and the beds were unbelieiveable.  So comfy and the pillows were so fluffy and soft.  Love it.
Manager Response: Dear kristyg552,  Thank you for your great review and we look forward to welcome soon!  Sincerely,  Franciscu S.

Summary: The room is small and smelly. Walls have plaster spots. roaches in the bathroom . Bed covers has cigarette holes. The free breakfast is a joke. Will never ever spend the night there.
Manager Response: Dear Salam,  Thank you for your review. Also, please accept my apologies that you did not have a pleasant stay with us. It is our hope that you will give us another opportunity to better serve you in the near future.   Sincerely,  Franciscu S.

Summary: My stay was overall ok when I arrived at 3:30am check in was simple but when going to my room the room had not been cleaned the trash was full coffee cups everywhere the bed was messy & sheets were stained with black on them. When going to the front office I got some what of an attitude from the attendant but was moved into a suite which was ok I choose to pay extra for the suite & just stay in that room it was decent not cleaned the best but it would pass for a few nights. I did like that there were stores very close to the property.
Manager Response: Dear H9612PHpatriciav,  Thank you for your review. Please accept my apologies for the attitude you received from the front desk agent and also for the room that was not clean. I will investigate to find out how a dirty room was placed as clean in our system.   I hope you will give us another opportunity to better serve you in the near future.   Sincerely,  Franciscu S.

Summary: Clean, helpful staff, good location for our needs, beds kind of stiff, but we bring our own mats.
Manager Response: Dear 143darylf,  Thank you for your review and we look forward to welcome soon.  Sincerely,  Franciscu S.

Summary: For the price I was very satisfied with Days Inn.  My room was clean and though I didn't participate they did offer a free breakfast in the lobby each morning.  They also had a coffee pot, small refrigerator, and microwave in the room, which I thought was great.  I was only there for a couple days so I skipped on any room service but I did ask for more towels, which was no problem.  The staff was very professional and friendly.
Manager Response: Dear Cheryle85,  Thank you for taking the time to write a review. We are glad to hear that you had a good stay with us.   Look forward to welcome you soon.  Sincerely,  Franciscu S.

Summary: Hotel romm was all we needed as we were out most of the days just needed a clean place to sleep and shower. Breakfast was fairly basic but was a way to start the day and what was supplied was nice. Only thing our room was right by the freeway so a little noisy but got use to it just ask for a room at the other end of hotel
Manager Response: Dear Gillsholidays,  Thank you for your review and we look forward to welcome you soon.  Sincerely,  Franciscu S.

Summary Heading: this was our 3rd stay here and Staff is always great they...
Summary: this was our 3rd stay here and Staff is always great they always give us the room we request, only problem i have here is housekeeping knocking at my door at 9am when check out is at 11am, other than that we always have a great stay,
Manager Response: Dear Chavez L,  We are delighted to hear that you always enjoy your stay with us. Next time please let our front desk know at check-in to inform the housekeeper not to knock on your door at 9AM :)   Look forward to welcome you soon.  Sincerely,  Franciscu S.

Summary: I was expecting this hotel to look the same as it did when it was the "Red Roof Inn". The service, cleanliness, and prices were far better than I expected. I was a last-minute walk-in, and I got a good rate on Halloween night. Great place, and I will definitely stay again.
Manager Response: Dear Gypsiewanderer26,  Thank you for taking the time to write a review. We are glad to hear that we exceeded your expectations. Look forward to welcome you soon.   Sincerely,  Franciscu S.

Summary Heading: The room was clean and nice.
Summary: It was a decent price and clean.  The AC smelt a little moldy.  Prob needs a clean out.  My only complaint was the Inidian/middle eastern nightclub next door.  It was loud and obnoxious beyond belief.  The first night was fine but second night it was overpoweringly loud I got hardly any sleep.  I feel sorry for whoever runs this hotel location because the nightclub next door must be hurting their business.   I would stay here again but only Mon to Wens.
Manager Response: Dear Islandofflowers,  Thank you for taking the time to write a review. I will let our maintenance staff know about the A/C. I am so sorry that you had to experience the loud music. Please request for room change next time if you happen to hear the music.   We look forward to welcome you soon.  Sincerely,  Franciscu S.

Summary: First issue is that they double charged me and couldn't refund my money . Second is that for you to use a iron you have to leave your driver license , not good !
Manager Response: Dear Cu19hole,  Thank you for your review and I sincerely apologize for the inconvenience caused due to the refund. If you wish to speak to me regards to it please call me on 714 670 9000.   Sincerely,  Franciscu S.

Summary Heading: Great location for Knott's Berry Farm
Summary: My friend and I booked this hotel due to its proximity to Knott's, as we had tickets to Knott's Scary Farm and didn't want to drive home after our visit to the Park.  The location was really convenient.  It's not a fancy place, but meets all the basic needs and the price is reasonable.  The staff were helpful and friendly.  If we had gotten up earlier we could have enjoyed a free breakfast, but it was only served from 6-9.  I can't comment on the breakfast as we'd had a late night and didn't make it down in time.
Manager Response: Dear BarbarasY8985EI,  We greatly appreciate your review and look forward to welcome you again.  Sincerely,  Franciscu S.

Summary: The stay was ok I think staff could be a little cleaner I would always see them eating when they were in the rooms cleaning
Manager Response: Dear Cassandrap701,  Thank you for your review and we look forward to welcome you again.   Sincerely,  Franciscu S.

Summary: Terrible!!!!!!  They simply don't care.  I made a reservation Thursday to Friday I check in at around 5pm but didn't go in the room till 10:30 after a long meeting. I turned the AC on as soon as I walked in.. 2hours later 12:30 am, After waiting for the room to cool off from this hot day I call the front desk and told them the room AC was not working and the room temperature was very hot. He told me to lower the AC temperature ( thinking it was a digital AC) I told him the unit only had two knobs one for hot and cool and the other one for low AC high AC and vent and that I set it cool high AC 2 hrs ago and the room is still really hot...  He said : " well, there is no maintenance person at this time." That I should wait for it to cool off. I told him it was so hot I couldn't
Manager Response: Dear Ale S,  Thank you for your review. I am sorry that you had issues with the A/C and how you were treated by the front desk agent. I will forward him your review for reference. I will try to reach you to better accommodate you for the inconveniences caused. If I am unable to reach you please feel free to contact me.   Sincerely,  Franciscu S.

Summary: This was a nice little suprise. The hotel was very clean, quiet, and comfortable.  The amenities were great for the price. The continental breakfast left something to be desired and was forced to purchase breakfast for both mornings. The front desk staff was very nice and accommodating. The cleaning staff were rude and my husband and I felt rushed to leave the room so that they could clean it at 9 AM. When we complied and left the room, dressed and ready for our day at 9:15, we went to the lobby to get our continental breakfast. This is where I got a bit angry, the cleaning staff was bagging up and clearing out continental breakfast bar and there was nothing left for guests, not even a cup of coffee! Good thing there was a Target with a Starbucks inside across the parking lot,
Manager Response: Dear Heather,  Thank you for your review. I am sorry that you felt like you were rushed by the housekeeper. I will let the housekeeping manager know about your feedback. Our breakfast ends at 9AM. However, we serve coffee 24hrs a day. Like most other hotels/motels we do take a deposit of $50. I am sorry that it took four days for the refund to go through. Please feel free to contact me when you plan to visit us again and I will make sure to deduct the amount you paid for your coffee.   Look forward to welcome you again.    Sincerely,  Franciscu S.

Summary: The hotel was conveniently located near knottsberry farm and Disneyland, right off the 91.  The breakfast was good, nice pool, and the rooms are very clean and quiet.
Manager Response: Dear Hunyb,  We are delighted to hear that you had a great stay with us and we look forward to welcome you again.   Sincerely,  Franciscu S.

Summary: We were attracted by the excellent value and stayed an extra night because the motel and service were so good.
Manager Response: Dear Y4622UZjohns,  Thank you for your review and we look forward to welcome you again.  Sincerely,  Franciscu S.

Summary: I have been staying at this location for several years now when I am in LA on business. The staff are good for the most part, however, this time I had bugs in the bedroom, not sure what they are, bedbugs or roaches, but not a nice experience.
Manager Response: Dear Brucer230,  Thank you for your review and for your business over the years. I sincerely apologize about the issue you had. I have informed our bug company about the roaches and they will be coming to check the room.  Sincerely,  Franciscu S.

Summary Heading: Stayed for a month because I was relocating and my apt...
Summary: Stayed for a month because I was relocating and my apt wasn't ready yet. It was a good stay but some of the staff don't communicate with each other...I would definitely stay again.
Manager Response: Dear SaraaL4412DR,  Thank you for your review and we look forward to welcome you again.  Sincerely,  Franciscu S.

Summary Heading: Good location for my needs. Rates are very good during low...
Summary: Good location for my needs. Rates are very good during low tourist periods. 3 prong electrical outlets are needed near the desk to plug in computers. Breakfast is almost all processed sugar items. No unsweetened cereal, fresh fruit etc.
Manager Response: Dear Leigh B,  Thank you for your review and we look forward to welcome you again.  Sincerely,  Franciscu S.

Summary: I will never stay here again. I seen a total of 10 roaches and was given back 10$ this place is awful. I will be calling the city on this matter. The staff is awful.. The rooms are not so clean. Not to mention they're towel nazis and will freak out if you use them on your body.. I was so freaked out to even sleep.
Manager Response: Dear Lindsayblake94,  Thank you for your review. I have informed our bed bug company to inspect the room.   Sincerely,  Franciscu S.

Summary: First time staying at this property. I was greatly surprised. We enjoyed our 2 night stay for our 1st time at Knotts Berry Farm. Rooms were nicely furnished, spacious, very clean, beds were comfy, strong wifi connection and the continental breakfast was just the right amount of goodness to get our morning started. Even though it is located next to the freeway, you couldn't hear any traffic noise from the room.  would recommend this property.
Manager Response: Dear Myalex702,  Thank you for taking the time to write a great review.   We look forward to welcome you again.  Sincerely,  Franciscu S.

Summary Heading: Stayed here about two weeks pleasant stay
Summary: I actually did really enjoy this hotel.  All of the staff were very friendly.  They have an awesome breakfast in the morning time.  There pool is pretty decent.  There in a good location. Right next to target and Dennys. As well as a stater brothers very close by. And that's just to name a few. All in all it was a great stay no complaints I can think of.  The rooms were nice.
