Very clean.  They had a fridge and microwave. Really did enjoy my stay.
Manager Response: Dear Ashlees100,  Thank you for your great review and we look forward to welcome you again.  Sincerely,  Franciscu S.

Summary Heading: Second time staying, just as good as always!
Summary: This was my second stay at Buena Park. I love this hotel, it's excellent quality for the best price. This isn't the Ritz but it's got everything you need. We stayed for three nights for our Disneyland trip (it's a ten minute drive, and the price is too good to lose). Love the free breakfast, free wifi, free parking, and friendly staff. This trip was a disaster for us: car trouble, broken zipper, toilet clog, but every snag that came up the staff was helpful and able to point us in the right direction every time. (And they fixed the toilet within an hour of us telling them about it) Will definitely be back!
Manager Response: Dear C0rbyjanet,  Thank you for taking the time to write a great review. You are correct, we are not the Ritz but we try our best to offer a great service to all of our guests.   Look forward to welcome you again.  Sincerely,  Franciscu S.

Summary: Horrid staff doesn't smile..noisy from street and freeway..the worst is we got to our room and someone was in it..front desk didn't know someone was in there..breakfast was nothing like days inn quality... Got money back and fled fast
Manager Response: Dear Lindab00,  Please accept my apologies for the inconveniences caused by the duplicate booking.   Sincerely,  Franciscu S.

Summary: The room smelled like smoke.  The restroom was not clean, the tub had a long hair on the wall and the shower curtain was torn and wrinkled. No iron or iron board.  The breakfast needs to be improved and your staff should have a smile when your customers arrive.
Manager Response: Dear 244berniceq,  Thank you for taking the time to write a review. I am sorry that the restroom was not clean. I will let our housekeeping manager know about your review. You can always check-out an iron or an ironing board from the front desk.   Sincerely,  Franciscu S.

Summary Heading: Pretty decent, loved the pool and spa!
Summary: Overall a nice hotel. The staff was friendly, courteous and prompt. Good size pool and spa was a nice temperature. Complimentary continental breakfast was just enough to get the day started.
Manager Response: Dear K4752JImelissac,  Thank you for taking the time to write a great review.   We look forward to welcome you again.  Sincerely,  Franciscu S.

Summary: I'm sorry to say this was an uncomfortable stay I was only there one night for a conference in Anaheim so I wasn't even in the room that long to be creaped out like I was. The location was great, lots of shops and eateries. I took my food back to the hotel I was in my room probably ten minutes when I noticed a roach running across the floor next to where I was standing, so we ate in the car. I was worried all-night long that they would come in to the bed, which I was disappointed to learn, my king size was really two twin size mattresses held together by the fitted sheet which had old stains. I only knew this because I almost up ended the bed when I crawled over the edge to sit down. I was hoping the roach incident was a one time thing but at 3am when I went to the restroom
Manager Response: Dear 84gabrielaq,  Thank you for your review. Please accept my sincere apologies about the roaches you mentioned. I will let our pest management company know so they can inspect the room. We do not have two twin mattresses together. May be the base of the bed was uneven. I will let our maintenance staff know so they can look into it.   Once again I am sorry for the unpleasant stay you had with us and it is our hope that you will give us another opportunity to better serve you in the near future.  Sincerely,  Franciscu S.

Summary: This was the dirtiest place I have ever encountered   The first room we were given had dried food on the bed spread and was dirty over all. We were moved to another room that didn't have food in the bed but a disgusting dirty shower with hair built up in the shower drain that caused the drain to run very slowly.  I didn't want to sleep here and assured my kids slept only on the blankets I brought from home and did not walk on the floor with bare feet. The traffic noise kept us up as well as the noise from the homeless that surrounded the property. I felt very unsafe and uncomfortable and would have driven home or found another place it it had been an option. I don't recommend this place to anyone and feel it should be shut down for health and safety reasons
Manager Response: Dear 450kristinl,  Thank you for your review. Please accept my sincere apologies for the unpleasant stay you had with us. I will let our maintenance and housekeeping manager's know about your review.   I hope you will give us another opportunity to better serve you in the near future.   Sincerely,  Franciscu S.

Summary: Well, considering this is in the middle of a big city, not bad. Bring ear plugs, if you want any quiet time. Lots of loud people, the pool is open until 10 pm. (hint, hint) The Interstate is right next to the property, this is a double edge sword. There are lots of very loud and powerful cars and motorcycles in the area, and they love to show them off. The hallways echo every noise from the interstate. (not much they can do about that). The icing on the cake is the loud beeping from the Pool maintenance shed, every morning.  The bed was comfortable, and the room was clean. Well the linens anyway. I know they can't shampoo the carpets every week, but when you get out of the shower, walk across the floor and find your feet black. There was a really nice workstation setup with a
Manager Response: Dear 808chads,  Thank you for taking the time to give us your honest feedback.   We greatly appreciate it.   I will let the ownership know about your suggestions.   I apologize about the dirty carpets. We are currently in the process of deep cleaning the carpets.  We look forward to welcome you again.   Sincerely,   Franciscu S.

Summary: Labor day weekend pricing. Building has some serious wear and tear, and I'd like to say the rates are reasonable, but there not, seem a bit high, even for a holiday weekend for a hotel of this caliber. Rates are more than posted on the door in your room. Howerever, the bed is comfortable and had a good night's sleep. The room has flat screen, mini fridge,  microwave, and coffee maker. The bathroom is clean and the water in the tub/shower is hot. Toilet is chipped. Basin sink is clogged and drains slow. Ac works really good. Breakfast is disappointing and selection was only a few danish, two choices of cereal and bitter coffee. It is close to amusement parks, dinning and more. Freeway access is good. Perhaps non holiday rates are more reasonable which would make this hotel worth
Manager Response: Dear Michael,  Thank you for taking the time to write a review about Days Inn Buena Park. Please accept my apologies that the basin drained slowly. I will let our maintenance staff know about the issues you mentioned. I am glad to hear that you had a good night sleep. We look forward to welcome you again.  Sincerely,  Franciscu S.

Summary: The worst day in my life ,i couldn't sleep every night in my room no 228 cause the insect  and cockroaches     in every where the manager said i couldn't do anything cuause the air is hot please find solutions  days inn Buena park , the problem is I reserved 18 days and non refundable so how I could find my money back
Manager Response: Dear Mahmoud B,  Thank you for taking the time to write a review about Days Inn Buena Park. I apologize for the inconvenience you had to experience. As you are aware we we offered to move you to another room but you declined to do so. Furthermore, I don't recall you requesting to cancel the rest of the nights you booked with us. Our front desk agent asked you and your wife yesterday (September 1st) if you would like to see another room but you declined to do so once again. We want to find you a solution but unfortunately you are declining all of the solutions we are providing you. I will call you again to check if you would like to see another room.   Sincerely,  Franciscu S.

Summary Heading: We had to change room 3 times the sewer backed up in the...
Summary: We had to change room 3 times the sewer backed up in the tub . Moved because it was horrible then moved us to a different room and moved us again.  And there was no place to eat had to set on the floor to eat.
Manager Response: Dear Teresa,  Thank you for taking the time to write a review and I sincerely apologize that you had to move three times. Our maintenance staff had looked into the issue and was able to take care of it. I hope you will give us another opportunity to better serve you in the future.   Sincerely,  Franciscu S.

Summary: The hotel was a little aged. The floors were extremely dirty and made my feet black. The breakfast was very small and not worth eating.
Manager Response: Dear Sean,  Thank you for taking the time to write a review.  I will let our housekeeping know about the floors you mentioned. Please accept my sincere apologies. Our breakfast items include: Toast, wheat, white bread, butter, jam, muffins, pastries,  2 kinds of cereal, oatmeal, oranges, tea, coffee, orange and apple juice.   We look forward to welcome you again.  Sincerely,  Franciscu S.

Summary: Staff was friendly and knowledgeable of the area. The room was super clean and the wifi had a great signal. They had a free continental breakfast but seating is very limited. No real complaints, it's a great value.
Manager Response: Dear Alli_sun_T,  Thank you for your kind comment and we look forward to welcome you again.   Sincerely,  Franciscu S.

Summary: I was not happy with this place.  The room was stuffy air condition appeared not to work. As a property associated with Wyndham I was concerned
Manager Response: Dear 827marilynw,  Thank you for taking the time to write a review about Days Inn Buena Park. I am sorry that you had trouble with the air conditioner in your room. I will notify our maintenance staff to look in to it. I am not sure if you asked to be moved to another room. Please let our front desk know if anything is not up to you satisfaction and we will do our best to accommodate you.  Sincerely,  Franciscu S.

Summary: I was disappointed in the room for the price.  Cobwebs covered corners of front door.  Continental breakfast was a large pot of oatmeal and fruit loop cereal. The muffins were cut in half and a minimum of Danish.  The remote in room was sticky.  Bedspreads stained. Only 2 towels for 4 people in a double queen room. I quess I expected more for 200.00 a nite not much of a discount for world mark owner when renting the rooms.  Great full only needed for one nite. Person complaining as I checked in. Paint on tub pealing off looked like paint over mold on walls in bath to lit filled to top before going down. And shower went from freezing cold to scalding hot to freezing cold you spent shower time adjusting water.
Manager Response: Dear LindapZ1522SL,  We appreciate you taking the time to let us know of the issues you encountered during your stay. Please accept my apologies. I will notify the appropriate departments about the issues you mentioned. It is our hope that you will give us another opportunity to better serve you in the future.   Sincerely,  Franciscu S.

Summary: Well there was a couple of issues. First there was a half way scent flat screen TV only problem was I couldn't change the channel and even thought I got there early I had plans later in evening and got back late so when I wanted to watch TV I didn't want to bother the people down in the office. The second issue is the sibg u have in the room about theft of hotel items I notified office that if u are gonna tell people they will be charged for items taken from the room they had better make sure the room is properly stocked. Third is that is smelled a lot like bleach for at least the first 3 hrs I was in the room
Manager Response: Dear Scotte312,  Thank you for taking the time to write a review about our hotel. I apologize that the TV channels did not work. I hope you notified out front desk so we could have sent our maintenance staff to check the issue for you. I will notify the housekeeping manager about the bleach you mentioned.   Sincerely,  Franciscu S.

Summary: Had a last minute trip to Disney and this was one of the only places available. The room was large with a living room, bedroom, 2 baths but very dated and the furniture and carpet very dirty and stained. There was also a trash can outside of our room that was filled and overflowing trash  and other junk but it was never emptied the 24 hours we where there.
Manager Response: Dear tb82094,  Thank you for taking the time to write a review about our property. I will notify our housekeeping manager about the trash and the condition of the carpet you mentioned.   It is our hope that you will give us another opportunity to better serve you in the future.   Sincerely,  Franciscu S.

Summary: Moved to this Hotel after horrible experience at Days Inn Anaheim West on Ball Road. This Hotel is very nice and very clean. Front Desk Staff is very courteous and helpful! Rooms were cleaned daily. Pool area cleaned daily. Only 2 complaints, had to ask for more towels daily, they never left enough in the room, and breakfast is not great. There is plenty of necessity stores and variety of restaurants in the area. For the price and proximity to events and family this definitely served our needs! . Would recommend and will likely stay again!
Manager Response: Dear Fargo,  Thank you for taking the time to write a review about our property. We are glad to hear that you had good stay with us. Please accept my apologies that not enough towels were given to you. I will let out housekeeping manager know about your feedback. We look forward to welcome you again.   Sincerely,  Franciscu S.

Summary: If your looking to spend money elsewhere with a convenient Location to Disney, Knotts, Beaches and other activities.  This is your place.  Rooms have slight mildew smell, Towels not the cleanest looking.  Bring a pillow!  But very very convenient location.
Manager Response: Dear Shane,  We appreciate you taking the time to write a review about your experience with us. I apologize that the towels you received were not looking clean. I will let our housekeeping manager  know about your review. We look forward to welcome you again.  Sincerely,  Franciscu S.

Summary: The rooms were okay nothing fancy, however for the price we payed they were fine. The breakfast could have had at least decent cereal and juice( if you are going to serve cereal and juice at least get some that will be eatable and drinkable). BE CAREFUL!! Close to the pool area there is a difference on the walkway and one of the people from our party twisted his ankle so bad that the next 2 days he had to have a wheel chair and he is now using a medical boot and crutches for the next 6 weeks. Called the hotel about it and they said they would call be back. Still waiting.
Manager Response: Dear Danielle,  Thank you for taking the time to write a review about our property.  Breakfast includes: toast, wheat, white bread, butter, jam, muffins, pastries,  2 kinds of cereal, oatmeal, oranges, tea, coffee, orange and apple juice.   I am sorry to hear about the person who twisted his ankle. Like I stated to you this is the first time we heard about someone getting injured in the walkway you mentioned.  I am sorry that our insurance company took about four days to respond to you regards to your claim. However, I was told by our insurance company today that they are in contact with you.   Once again please accept my apologies.   Sincerely,  Franciscu S.

Summary: We stayed here to avoid the cost of Disney area hotels. It is a Days Inn and the price was reasonable.  It was clean and had a bed. It wasn't expensive so I don't expect fancy. Nothing bad to say, check in and check out were easy and it was just up the road from Knotts Berry Farm and Disney was no more than 15 minutes away. I would stay here again.
Manager Response: Dear Dan,  Thank you for your review and glad to hear that you had a good stay with us. We look forward to welcome you again.  Sincerely,  Franciscu S.

Summary Heading: My air conditioner did not work and did not get it fix...
Summary: My air conditioner did not work and did not get it fix until 8:00 pm the next day after ,I when to the offices And complain once again ! I was very unhappy !
Manager Response: Dear 206cecilt,  Thank you for your feedback. I am so sorry that you had difficulty with the air conditioner. Please contact me if you wish to discuss about the issue further.   Sincerely,  Franciscu S.

Summary Heading: One step up from a no-tell motel
Summary: I was sure the entire time I was there that I would be robbed. The continental breakfast was a joke. It was so poorly maintained that I figured the patch in my tub would let lose any time I used it and the elevator makes wonderful grinding noise. The noise from the 91 was a constant companion. If there was a rating less than one I would give it.
Manager Response: Dear 418cherylc,  Thank you for taking the time to write a review about our property. I sorry that you felt unsafe during your stay. I am not sure if you requested a different room away from the freeway. Next time please ask any of our front desk agents to move your room.   Sincerely,  Franciscu S.

Summary: breakfast was very unsatisfactory no protein all sugar..towels were sandpaper...kids screaming up and down halls all night long
Manager Response: none

Summary: This was a nice place to stay however the breakfast could be better.  The facilities are a little rundown, the outside was dirty.
Manager Response: none

Summary: After being forced to cancel our initial reservation elsewhere, we had to find a different hotel for our vacation. Unfortunately, we found this one. Wyndham should be ashamed to be associated with such an establishment. Both rooms smelled bad; our sheets were torn and stained, there was hair caught in the blow dryer and our bath towels came preloaded with someone else's hair! There are people loitering around the hotel, smoking, at all hours of the day and night, calling into question my family's personal safety as well as the well being of our belongings. We were charged over 2x the posted room charge for our final night--a night that none of us slept because the music from the restaurant next door played LOUD until after 1:30 AM!! The place is a dump, the management is rude
Manager Response: none

Summary: When checkin in staff was polite and helpful. When getting to my room I noticed bathroom had an odor I ignored it. As I sat on the toilet I noticed a crack on the wall, looked like it was painted over but paint did not match. When I went to go use the blow dryer the next morning I noticed it didn't turn on so front desk was notified. They brought me an extra. The broken one was replaced with a new one on the third day. I went to go use the microwave and noticed glass plate was missing. I reported it so i wouldn't get charge for it. The Asian lady who answered did offer me to use microwave in the lobby which was an inconvenience (being on the 3rd floor) she then call me back  few minutes later asking me if I would like an extra microwave instead of just replacing the glass plate
Manager Response: none

Summary: While working on an assignment in Buena Park, California I was booked into the Days Inn located in that area.  The hotel itself is a bit aged, but under new management, little by little it is coming around. If you are on a budget the value is good for the pricing.  The staff was polite and helpful with questions.  The accommodations were neat and clean and the bed comfortable.  The pool was of a fairly good size and being used by a fair number of families.  The hotel is located withing walking distance of half-dozen restaurants.  Note the following:  •	It’s not easy to get to the hotel due to the road design and lack of adequate signing  •	Breakfast bar is fair  •	If you want to use an iron and ironing board you have to leave your drivers license (I thought that was a bit
Manager Response: none

Summary: The room was larger than most hotels and it was very clean. The location of the property was great. The continental breakfast was very good and the food tasted fresh. The staff was very helpful.
Manager Response: none

Summary: It was a convenient location. Was surprised that it had 2 bathrooms which was nice with a family of 6. They never left us enough towels, and the towels they did leave us were stained. The fridge was also nice except the counter top above the fridge was hot and the carpet was wet under the fridge. The pull out couch was very thin to sleep on. The kids used the cushions from the couch as a bed. Housekeeping didn't empty the garbage everyday and we ended up missing a charge cord for my son's kindle. Maybe got picked up from housekeeping in some towels but it hasn't turned up and haven't gotten a phone call from the manager either. Breakfast was a joke unless you like milk and cereal for breakfast. Won't be back.
Manager Response: none

Summary: Charged me extra $20 for checking in early.   That's fine.  I had to have them fix the air conditioning unit.  Then, they didn't have any towels in my room.  Why would they put me in a room that isn't ready for a guest especially paying the extra  $20 for early check in.  The employees are rude too.  There were more customers not satisfied that day!
Manager Response: none

Summary: Assigned rooms that were not yet cleaned at check in.  A/C did not work. and had to change rooms twice before we got a clean room with working A/C.  Also found bugs in the rooms. Pillows were like trying to sleep on rocks. Management was rude about the problems and didn't even seem to care.  Will never stay at Days Inn again.
Manager Response: Dear E7873FUdavidm,  Thank you for taking the time to write review about our property. Please accept my apologies for the inconveniences you had to experience. I notified out maintenance staff to  look into the A/C issue you mentioned. As you know I looked into the A/C issue personally because I didn't want to inconvenience you  by moving rooms. Once again I am sorry for the unpleasant stay you had with us and it's our hope that you will give us another opportunity to better assist you in the future.  Sincerely,  Franciscu S.

Summary: I stay at this hotel about 2 times a month and have a great experience each time. The rooms are clean and the price is great!
Manager Response: none

Summary: I stayed in at this hotel for 5 nights (7/11-7/16). We have reserved 2 weeks in advance for the 5 nights and when we checked in they charged another full night stating they were going to reimburse it once we checked out; which was very inconvenience because they charged more than what we have previously paid for each night when we paid for the five nights.  The conditions of my room was poor. The sink and toilet needs to be replace. The toilet hole was broken and the sink was stained and broken too. The top mattress was comfortable. The kids were able to get entertained with TV cable and WiFi. Breakfast is continental only. Don't expect hot pancakes or eggs. They only serve muffins, cinnamon rolls, oranges and cereal. Overall just for spending nights at this hotel is ok. About
Manager Response: none

Summary: The 'breakfast' consisted of a few pastries and cereal, nearly nothing more. I tried to stay an extra two days and they asked for $440 when the normal rate was around $100. Outlets were only on one side of the room. Do not disturb sign doesn't stay on handle, resulting in disturbances. Couldn't find my reservation and then tried to overcharge me.
Manager Response: none

Summary: Was very excited with my stay at days inn it was like apartment like breakfast was great the price was awesome recommend days inn to friends and family
Manager Response: none

Summary: The room next to us was robbed during our stay. When I asked the manager if this happened often he smiled and said it had never happened in this hotel. I have been in the travel industry for over forty years and I don't know of any hotel that can "honestly" make that statement. When we went to check out we were told we needed to wait until housekeeping checked our room or I would forfeit my deposit. Again, with over forty years in the travel business, this is a first. Why on earth would I steal towels that were thinner than paper (and dirty)? I return to the LA area twice a year but I will never be staying here again!
Manager Response: none

Summary: The staff was most helpful and pleasant.  Would have like a little more choice for breakfast and a printer at the computer.  Clean and quiet room.  Will definitely stay there again.
Manager Response: none

Summary: I love this place because of the area. You can get away it's a place to hang and come home refreshed. The staff is friendly and accommodating
Manager Response: none

Summary: We stayed only one night arrived late and checked out around 11 am.  We had roaches in our room and in the bathroom---and they were out during the day.  Can't' remember when I had a room with roaches. We complained and received only $30 off our bill.  Never again will we stay there!
Manager Response: Dear Cheryl,  Thank you for your review. I apologize about the roaches you mentioned. I will let our bug company know so they can take care of it. Once again I am sorry about the unpleasant stay you had with us.   I hope you will give us another opportunity to better serve you in the future,.   Sincerely,  Franciscu S.

Summary Heading: Great Stay I highly recommend it
Summary: I liked the room, parking was next to my room. Room was very spacious with a nice office desk and chair, i felt very comfortable.It had coffee, swimming pool so many things I didn't try, but I have stayed here before like 2 years ago and it was nice room too.
Manager Response: Dear Blanca,  Thank you for taking the time to write a review about our property. We greatly appreciate your feedback and happy to hear that you had a good stay with us.   Look forward to welcome you again.  Sincerely,  Franciscu S.

Summary: No complaints on hotel stay, but I think the hotel needs a little face lift from the inside of the bathrooms, & rooms.
Manager Response: Dear Anna,  Thank you for your review and for your suggestion. We look forward to welcome you again.  Sincerely,  Franciscu S.

Summary Heading: Great stay over the 4th of July stayed at the Knights inn...
Summary: Great stay over the 4th of July stayed at the Knights inn from 3rd to 4th and had a horrible experience there so I went to the days Inn and difference was like night Knight bad and day good
Manager Response: Dear David,  We greatly appreciate your review and glad to hear that you had a good stay with us.   All of us look forward to welcome you again.  Sincerely,  Franciscu S.

Summary: This Days Inn needs some improvement to be up to par with its sister hotels, that is, other Days Inn in So Cal. It's a good location cross roads of I-5 and 91, only a few minutes from Disneyland, which was the purpose of our trip, but it is aging and could use a makeover. We did not get soap or shampoo on the second night. All else was as expected. Somehow they managed to keep breakfast stocked for the July 4th weekend crowd.
Manager Response: Dear David,  Thank you for taking the time to write a review about our property. Please accept my apologies that you did not get soap or shampoo. I hope you called our front desk to request more soap and shampoo. We look forward to welcome you soon.  Sincerely,  Franciscu S.

Summary: When they say daybreak breakfast it is juice, coffee, cold cereal, oatmeal, toast, Danish and orange slices.  Not bad, sufficient.  Rooms are adequate. Employees are very friendly. Get some noise from the freeway on one side and pool noise on the other.  Worth the price.
Manager Response: Dear Richard,  Thank you for your review and glad to hear that you had good stay with us. We try to offer competitive rates whenever possible for our valued and potential guest's.   We look forward to welcome you again.  Sincerely,  Franciscu S.

Summary: Ohh were to start... Staff was rude, hotel look good but rooms were horrible no towels in the room. Extra charge for checking in early. My girlfriend had a roach crawling on to her while she was sleeping.  They authorized my card twice and charge me an extra 50 dls deposit even tho i paid with credit card. Breakfast was way to simple and funny thing they had muffins which is good but they cut them in half which is ridiculous. The coffe maker in my room looked like it hadnt been clean in weeks.  By far we will never stay there again. The only good thing was the Manager was very polite and nice seems he was the only one that new wat he was doing..
Manager Response: Dear Oswezzy,  Thank you for taking the time to write a review about our property. I sincerely apologize that you were not able to have a good experience with us. We do take a refundable deposit of $50 from all of our guests. I will let our housekeeping manager know about the coffee maker you mentioned. I would really appreciate if you give us another opportunity to better serve you in the near future.   Sincerely,  Franciscu S.

Summary: We had a five night stay at this property and it was the worst experience of our trip. The room to our left was robbed while the guests were in the room and the next night the room to our right had guests who argued for two hours about who was going to pay for the room. When the manager was informed of the incidents he seemed very cavalier and acted as if these incidents were "one time events." We certainly will not return and wonder why this location carries the Days Inn logo.
Manager Response: Dear Stephen W,  Thank you for your review. When you notified me about the people arguing I explained to you that it is beyond our control if someone decides to start an argument. However, when you had notified our night front desk agent he had informed the party who was arguing to keep it quiet and few minutes later they had ended their argument. Once again thank you for your review.   Sincerely,  Franciscu S.

Summary: There was trash everywhere. The exterior of the building needed paint and outdated and there where shady characters hanging around. The free breakfast was ok.
Manager Response: Dear marialH7606VH,  Thank you for your review. I am sorry that you had to see trash everywhere. I have notified our housekeeping manager about your review so she can take appropriate measures to make sure that all the trash gets picked up.   Sincerely,  Franciscu S.

Summary Heading: would recommend to family and friends
Summary: Clean! Organized! Close to everything! Coupon code for Knitts Berry Farm! Salt water pool that made your skin and hair feel awesome.  When checking in we told front desk that we may need another night, which we did.  Then they could extend the reservation with the original reservation and charged us double for our last night.  That was disappointing and I had to go to the hotel by eleven to give them a new card!  This was overcharged, inconvenient and policy or not, did not make sense.  Also. If rooms are actually ready, there should be no harm in early check in, instead of us arriving in LAX at  not be able to settle in and start the day!
Manager Response: Dear Terry,  We appreciate your review and glad that you enjoyed the pool. The day you wanted to extend we must have been sold out or may be had very few rooms available hence you had to pay more than what you expected. Room rates fluctuate depending our occupancy.  I am not sure what time you arrived. Our check-in time starts at 3PM and generally we do check-ins around 2PM without any fee.   Feel free to contact me when you plan to visit us again.  Sincerely,  Franciscu S.

Summary: The facility is nice, clean and affordable. The only thing I can say is that the breakfast could be better. Rather than danish, toast, and cereal, waffles and fresh fruits are better alternative. The cost would probably be the same if that is the issue.
Manager Response: Dear 430jan2015,  Thank you for your review and also for your suggestion. We do offer oranges daily.   Look forward to welcome you again.   Sincerely,  Franciscu S.

Summary: Me and a friend booked a room for 2 nights and then extended for another 2 we enjoyed it so much. The hotel is conveniently located near restaurants, shopping and the 91 fwy the pool was nice the rooms were clean and a good size
Manager Response: Dear Christina,  Thank you for your great review. We are glad to hear that you enjoyed your stay with us and look forward to welcome you again.   Feel free to contact me when you plan to visit us again.   Sincerely,  Franciscu S.

Summary Heading: everything was great except for housekeeping knocking at my...
Summary: everything was great except for housekeeping knocking at my door at 9am and having my do not disturb sign up.
Manager Response: Dear Chavez L,  Thank you for your review. I apologize that housekeeping disturbed you at 9AM. I will inform them about it. We look forward to welcome you soon.   Sincerely,  Franciscu S.

Summary: Front office clerk was extremely rude, no towels in room upon arrival, people swimming late and making a lot of noise.... Hair dryer was broken, run down doors made it feel like it was open due to draft and noise level.
Manager Response: Dear M1006COmelissam,  Thank you for your review. I am sorry that the front desk agent was rude to you. I will talk to the agent about it. I will check with housekeeping as to why there were no towels in the room.   We look forward to welcome you soon.  Sincerely,  Franciscu S

Summary: Adequate parking, well lit. Staff is friendly and helpful, appearance is clean and presentable. The hotel is located next to the freeway, and the rooms face outwards, so you do hear some noise. They offer a continental breakfast, free wifi. There is a pool. The room itself is spacious. There is a microwave, hair dryer, and coffee maker in the room.  Upon entering the room, it is outdated. Carpets and bedspreads have stains. There were tiny bugs flying out of the bathtub drain- we killed 5. There were holes in the sheets, linens were rumpled. The clock did not work. There are multiple cracks in the bathtub. There were holes in the shower curtain.
Manager Response: Dear JGNevada,  Thank you for your review. I sincerely apologize about the condition of the linen you mentioned. I will let our housekeeping and maintenance department know about your review.   Sincerely,  Franciscu S.

Summary: My friend and I stayed here....it's a basic room, but clean and the staff was friendly.   It sits right next to food places, a dollar store, target. ..so convenient.  Oh super close to Starbucks, a great Thai place, and Knotts Berry Farm.  We went all over the place....we only needed our room to sleep in and have free breakfast in the morning.   If I return to California. ..I will stay here again.
Manager Response: Dear Matoyia T,  Thank you for your review and we look forward to welcome you soon.  Sincerely,  Franciscu S.

Summary: Let me start by saying that I am not one to write reveiws and I also ALWAYS try to be optimistic, im not one to complain about missing towels or one rude employee but my stay here was SO bad that I want to warn EVERYONE who even considers staying here. When we first got there the desk was nice though they sent us in the wrong direction to our room which wasnt a huge deal the room was clean I thought it had a strange odor but my husband said it was just me. We checked in late and went straight to dinner and got back around 10pm .The rooms have the connecting doors so you habe the option of connecting rooms though we didn't use that option we mine as well have because I could hear EVERYTHING the neighbors said and did all night. Even over the roar of the highway. We skipped out on
Manager Response: none

Summary: We got this property for a really great rate, and had a quality stay. There was ample parking, and people at the front desk were friendly and helpful. We didn't partake in the breakfast (slept in), but it looked decent. Our only complaint was that the internet was kind of slow at times, but that could be fixed if they were to lock the network. There's a great possibility we'll be back in the fall for a similar trip.
Manager Response: Dear Dtnrhi06,  Thank you for your review and glad to hear that you had a quality stay with us. We have fully upgraded our wifi network to be as fast as possible. However, I will let our IT manager know about your feedback. We look forward to welcome you soon.  Sincerely,  Franciscu S.

Summary: Rooms are dirty, linens are shabby, neighborhood noise is atrocious, breakfast food is laughable, unclean eating area and in our room we could hear mice scratching within the walls. Bathtub was cracked, vent fan didn't work and room air conditioner sounded like a 747 taking off. No refrigerator, (contrary to advertisement). Management moved us once to a less noisy room but no cleaner. I'd stay at a Rescue Mission before I'd stay there again.
Manager Response: Dear Raymond,  Thank you for your review and please accept my apologies that the room was not up to your standard.  Our breakfast area is cleaned daily. If the area was not clean we would have been shut down by the health department. I will notify the maintenance about the air conditioner and the bath tub you mentioned. Once again please accept my apologies.   Sincerely,  Franciscu S.

Summary: Breakfast was good. Location somewhat difficult to find. Room was spacious. Toilet seat was way too low. Blower, iron and ironing board were provided. Heater difficult to adjust (knob was missing), Price was reasonable.
Manager Response: Dear Manuel,  Thank you for your review. We are in the same parking lot as the Target. I will notify the maintenance staff know about the knob you mentioned.   Look forward to welcome you soon.   Sincerely,  Franciscu S.

Summary: This hotel had many negatives.  Area not clean, no response to my concerns of inadequate door lock, beat up lampshade, worn linens.  Also beds were too hard & breakfast was lacking (cold cereal & toast?), no management on site.
Manager Response: Dear Keith,  Thank you for your review and I am glad that you are going to visit us  again to give us another chance to better serve you. Be rest assured that you will have a great stay with us.   Sincerely,  Franciscu S.

Summary: We were looking for an inexpensive hotel for our California trip. This one fit the bill well. It was about 7minutes to Disneyland, it shares the parking lot with a Target and a Dennys and it has lots of terrific restaurants. The continental breakfast was worthless though and we had a few issues with the TV which was annoying though maintenance was fairly quick to help. Overall a decent place to stay on a budget
Manager Response: Dear Deborah,  Thank you for your review and please accept my apologies that the TV had issues. I will check with the maintenance staff about it to make sure it's been taken care of. Our breakfast consists of Toast, wheat, white bread, butter, jam, muffins, pastries,  2 kinds of cereal, oatmeal, oranges, tea, coffee, orange and apple juice.   We look forward to welcome you soon.   Sincerely,  Franciscu S.

Summary: Room was next to one with noisy folks.  We had retired at 11:00 p.m.  At 1:30 a.m. we called the front desk and notified them of the noise.  They called the noisy unit but no change in noise level resulted.  We asked for a different room and, fortunately, we were accommodated.  The next night was much better.  Were disappointed that the breakfast food did not have raisin bran for two of our nights but only frosted flakes and fruit loops.  We do not enjoy all the sugar, plus it's not good for the body.  Also, the cooked oatmeal had not been salted and no salt was available.  Other than these problems, we enjoyed our stay and will probably consider this Day Inn when we visit the area again.  The front desk personnel were very cheerful and helpful.  Thanks.
Manager Response: Dear William,  Thank you for your review and I am sorry to hear that the guest who was next door was loud. I am not sure if you requested for salt from the server. We do have salt on request. Glad to hear that you had a good stay and we look forward to welcome you soon.  Sincerely,  Franciscu S.

Summary: I often return to this hotel when I'm in the area. I like the management, the clerks, maintenance--the whole crew!  Friendly, personable yet professional. Lots of free parking. Ultra convenient to major freeways (make 2 quick rights and you are ON the 91 fwy!). Buses to the rest of OC & L.A. cruise right by regularly. Within walking distance to lots of stores, restaurants etc. And, it's usually very reasonably priced.  It's great in many ways. It's not plush but that's not what I'm looking for anyway.  You can spend more nearby but not really get much more than fancier upholstery. You know what they say about a fool and his money....
Manager Response: Dear Karen,  We greatly appreciate your review and we look forward to welcome you soon.  Sincerely,  Franciscu S.

Summary: We stayed here for a family vacation to Disneyland for 3 days. Very, very comfortable beds & pillows! Friendly staff, quiet & clean buildings, great price! There is a Mediterranean restaurant right next door which had loud music until late one night but it was a Friday & we couldn't hear it in the room. Target and restaurants very close by, as well as the freeway! We will definitely stay here again!
Manager Response: Dear Pamelainnis,  Thank you for your review and glad to hear that you enjoyed your stay with us. We look forward to welcome you soon.  Sincerely,  Franciscu S.

Summary Heading: it was a place to stay
Summary: The rooms were dingy, hair in the sinks and bath tubs upon check in.  Spiders in the room.  We cut our stay short due to this.
Manager Response: Dear Toni,  Thank you for your review and please accept my apologies regards to hair you mentioned. Our head housekeeper checks every room thoroughly before we rent. I will check with her how she missed the hair in your room. Once please accept my apologies and we look forward to welcome you soon.     Sincerely,  Franciscu S

Summary: At flighting for 13hours we needed to pay $20 too check in early, towels was solid had too buy new towels from target too scared too use hotel towels. Housekeepers don't speak English. Power was turned off the whole nite for some reason.  As I'm trying too get information from the front desk agent , he looks over my shoulder and wanted too help the next guest as I'm still needed help. There are helpless people sleeping in the parking lot and the police is always around the hotel for some odd reason. After 14days we was glad too get out of this place.
Manager Response: Hi,  Thank you for your review. Our check-in time is 3PM and we do have an extra fee if a guest would like to check-in earlier than 3PM. The power outage was scheduled by the Southern California Edison which was beyond our control. I sincerely apologize that the front desk agent looked over your shoulder to assist the guest who was behind you. Furthermore, I am not sure if you informed the front desk about your concern of the local police department patrolling the parking lot. Had you mentioned we would have contacted the police department to get an update.   Sincerely,  Franciscu S.

Summary: I really like this Days inn, they have some friendly and helpful employees. My only problem was the rates have gone up a bit. Also one night there was no power, and I feel everyone should've gotten a small discount for the inconvenience
Manager Response: Hi,  Thank you for your review. Our rates fluctuate depending our occupancy. You may have experienced a higher rate on a busy day. The power outage was scheduled by the Southern California Edison. Please contact me and I will be more than happy to discuss what kind of a discount I can offer for your past or future stay.   Sincerely,  Franciscu S.

Summary Heading: Wouldn't want to stay for any long period of time
Summary: The room was adequate.  I tried not to look at too much for fear of freaking out at the dirt or something else I might find.  There was a floor lamp in the room that was pretty old and rusty looking, and the floors were so dirty that my feet left marks in the bath tub when I got in to take a shower.  Was a great "stopover" or "need a place to lay my head" kind of hotel, but wouldn't want to stay for any length of time.  It was also confusing to get to from the freeway - we sort of went around the block a couple of times before we found the right entrance.  Total night's stay was $58, so can't expect much.  It did the job.
Manager Response: Dear Mkyms,  Thank you for your review and please accept my apologies about the cleanliness of the room. I am happy to hear that you received a great deal for the room.  Sincerely,  Franciscu S.

Summary: Was really surprised after reading some reviews. Had a very nice room for me and my little boy. Plan to stay again next week.
Manager Response: Dear Rene,  Thank you for your review and we look forward to welcome you!  Sincerely,  Franciscu S.

Summary: The pool is heated and nice, however take down shower towel. Pool towel is size of a hand towel. Breakfast choices are only: cold cereal, oatmeal, danish, toast.
Manager Response: Dear Heidi,  Thank you for your review and we look forward to welcome you soon.  Sincerely,  Franciscu S.

Summary Heading: Don't leave anything in the room
Summary: Long story short there weren't any major problems with the room. All of the cast I came across durning my stay was just alright, not mean but definitely not friendly or welcoming. When I got home is the problem. I left my $80 MacBook Pro charger in the outlet after being rushed out because no one could be in the room to get your deposit back. I called and the gentleman I spoke to said it wasn't with him but if I did leave it in the room that housekeeping would have it and to call back the next morning when they are there. I called back the next morning and of course the lady I spoke to wasn't very helpful and said no they don't have it. I told her I left it in the very noticeable outlet the one above the dresser, not under anything or in a corner. She said nope, not even
Manager Response: Dear Monica,  I am so sorry that you were not given a good service by our employees in finding your charger. I will personally look into this with our head housekeeper and will contact you for an update.   Sincerely,  Franciscu S.

Summary: Badly stained walk ways. Room in disrepair. Not well cleaned. Bathroom mold. Vegrants hanging around outside the fence. Felt unsafe for myself and my vehicle.
Manager Response: Hi,  Thank you for your review and please accept my apologies that you felt unsafe.   Sincerely,  Franciscu S.

Summary Heading: One Night @ Days Inn Buena Park
Summary: Room was good, not great.  Fine for a 1-night stay but I'd look for something nicer if you're staying for more nights,  Shower floor was stained and needs to be repaired.  Close to Knott's Berry Farm.
Manager Response: Dear Michael,  Thank you for your review. I will let our maintenance staff about the shower floor you mentioned. We look forward to welcome you soon.  Sincerely,  Franciscu S.

Summary: This was the second time I had stayed here and I enjoyed it better this time they had their continental breakfast back in the area it was suppose to be in and not in a room on second floor.  The room was great no complaints and it was nice that it was walking distance to black angus
Manager Response: Dear Tammy,  Thank you for your review and glad that you enjoyed your stay with us. We look forward to welcome you soon.  Sincerely,  Franciscu S.

Summary: the bedding needs updated. Both spreads had major stains.  The room did show recent painting.
Manager Response: Dear Grace,  Thank you for your review and I am sorry about the stains you mentioned. We look forward to welcome you soon.   Sincerely,  Franciscu S.

Summary: Check in was nice and swift. I liked how it was close to the little tourist strip and right next to Target. Although we didn't use the pool, it looked nice and clean. Didn't even attempt to snag breakfast since the lobby was super packed and crowded with guests trying to get food. The only negative we came across was that there was little black freshly shaved hairs in the soap dish in the shower and a long black hair on the shower faucet which I have no idea how housekeeping or the supervisor missed during inspection.
Manager Response: Dear Jemma,  Thank you for your review and I am sorry to hear that you were not able to enjoy the pool. Please accept my apologies about the hair you mentioned. I will be forwarding your review to our head housekeeper. We look forward to welcome you soon.   Sincerely,  Franciscu S.

Summary: Took the kids to the hotel for a swim in the heated pool and the hot tub. Took some great pictures underwater and above.  This was for spring break for the kids.  They had a great time, which means i have a great time.  We will go back.   Maybe someone from the hotel will plans some bamboo (tall grass) to deal with the noise of SR91.
Manager Response: Hi,  Thank you for your review and for your suggestion about bamboo trees. Furthermore, I am sorry about the freeway noise you had to experience. We look forward to welcome you soon.   Sincerely,  Franciscu S.

Summary: There is a restaurant close to the lobby entrance across the parking lot.   Loud music blared from their patio area till after midnight.  Phones in our rooms did not work….had to contact Days Inn 800 number who gave me a disconnected phone number.  Finally got the number, front desk would not answer their phones.  Hotel parking lot was full with people eating at the restaurant and not staying at the hotel.  Our rooms had 2 refrigerators one not working in both.  No outlets by the bed, but only extension cords.  I would not recommend this hotel; other side of hotel is located right next to the 91 fwy onramp.  Very unpleasant experience.  We arrived 2 hours early, rooms where available but front desk attendant wanted $20  per room for checking in early.  We ate at Wendys (handed a
Manager Response: Dear Khris,  Please accept my apologies that the phone in your room didn't work and also about the front desk not mentioning about the discount at offered at Wendys. I hope you will give us another opportunity to better serve you in the near future.     Sincerely,  Franciscu S.

Summary Heading: Hotel is okay but internet was being upgraded
Summary: The room and hotel is ok but the day that I arrived they were upgrading the internet and I needed to go to Target to use the internet. This was quite inconvenient. I was told that the internet would be back on in 1 hour but it was off for about 6 hours.
Manager Response: Dear Noob,  Thank you for your review and I am sorry that the internet upgrade took longer than we anticipated it to be. On the bright side we have much better internet speed than what we used to which you will be able to experience during your next visit.   Sincerely,  Franciscu S.

Summary: Got a good rate- AAA discount. Area is o.k. Kinda dirty outside and around the property.  Close to Knotts, short drive to Disney. We got here after a long day at Disney. Check in, took a little long, and I was the only one there. Non smoking property, but I saw a lot of cig butts on the stairways, and saw a few people smoking outside their room. If you get rooms overlooking pool, you WILL hear the freeway noise, if that kinda stuff bothers you. My daughters said the pool was nice and warm, and hot tub was great. Room was o.k. Beds fine, older fridge and microwave in room.  Breakfast in morning was nothing to write home about, toast, cereal, pasty, and very weak coffee. I liked my stay at The Buena Park Hotel & Suites last time I was in town better to be honest, but I was trying
Manager Response: Dear Dick,  Thank you for your review and please accept my apologies that the outside was dirty. I am glad that   you enjoyed our beds. We look forward to welcome you soon.  Sincerely,  Franciscu S.

Summary Heading: Just need more water pressure for the shower and better...
Summary: Just need more water pressure for the shower and better internet service. Other than that our stay was good.
Manager Response: Dear Lucinda,  Thank you for your review. We are in the process of upgrading our internet and it should be faster when you visit us again.   Sincerely,  Franciscu S.

Summary Heading: Not even worth the discounted rate
Summary: The A/C barely worked properly. The room was not clean. Mold was growing in the shower. I received a discounted rate and our stay wasn't even worth that. I will not be staying here again.
Manager Response: Dear Javon,  Please accept my apologies for the unpleasant stay you had with us. I have informed our housekeeping and maintenance staff about the mold and the A/C issue you mentioned.   I hope you will give us another opportunity to better assist you in the future.   Sincerely,  Franciscu S

Summary: Great beds. The pool area was clean. Breakfast was limited. Close to Knotts berry farm. The staff was kind when we arrived early and tired the let us check in early for a min fee. Close to Dennys and Black Angus for food.
Manager Response: Dear Corine,  We appreciate your review and we look forward to welcome you soon.   Sincerely,  Franciscu S

Summary: The room was nice and the bed was comfortable. There is Wi-Fi, but it was not available in the room. I had to go to the lobby. There is very limited area for breakfast for such a large number of rooms.
Manager Response: Dear Raula,  Thank you for your review and we look forward to welcome you soon.   Sincerely,  Franciscu S

Summary: The outside appearance of the hotel seemed nice for the cost.  The room was a 2 star quality.  I booked the room for 4 people and only received 2 towels, and had to go to the front desk to get the 2 towels that should have been in my room. The floor mat in my bathroom had a hole in it. The baseboards in the bathroom were poorly executed; there were chunks of drywall missing, which made the bathroom feel disgusting.  The bath tub/shower was stained and also gave a dirty appearance. I had issues connecting to the internet, and the air conditioner unit gave the room a motel feel.  The blow dryer shorted out after 2 minutes of using it.
Manager Response: Dear Jennifer,  Thank you for your review and I apologize for the quality of the room you received. I will let the appropriate departments know about the issues you mentioned. We have a dedicated wifi in the lobby which is password protected that can be used when the wifi in the rooms get overloaded.   Sincerely,  Franciscu S

Summary Heading: very good for cost and location
Summary: A shower and a pillow top bed with a basic breakfast in a good location for the cost we where happy with it . The front desk was happy and helpful even switched our room location to a location away from pool and hot tub for less noise .
Manager Response: Dear Cmgarbe,  We appreciate your feed back and happy to hear that you had a pleasant stay with us. We look forward to welcome you soon.  Sincerely,  Franciscu S.

Summary: Great Location, easy on and off from freeway, lots of eateries within walking distance, and Target in the parking lot for those last minute forgotten items.  Average room, clean, with comfortable beds.  Pool was clean and refreshing.  Daybreak breakfast was sufficient and always being stocked, so never out of anything.  We will definitely stay here again when we are lucky enough for another Disney trip.
Manager Response: Dear Dyana,  Thank you for your review and glad that you enjoyed your stay with us. We look forward to welcome you soon.  Sincerely,  Franciscu S.

Summary Heading: nice property and over all good stay. breakfast somewhat...
Summary: nice property and over all good stay. breakfast somewhat scrimpy/lack of what we have had at other days inn, eggs/meat etc.but still would stay here again. soda machine ate my money.BOO!
Manager Response: Dear Robert,  Thank you for your review and we look forward to welcome you again!  You should have informed the front desk that the soda machine ate you money and we would have refunded the amount to you.   Sincerely,  Franciscu S.

Summary: This review would have gotten 4 stars if they cared enough to upgrade their internet.  The hotel is next to Target and a Dollar Tree store, Wendy's, Denny's, and Black Angus.  Rooms are clean and well maintained but do NOT have internet.  Black Angus bar has free internet if you're in need.  But do not stay here if you need internet.
Manager Response: Dear Sandieck,  Thank you for your review and please accept my apologies. I will notify the IT person who is in charge of the inter issue you mentioned. I hope you will give us another opportunity to better serve you in the future.  Franciscu S.

Summary Heading: One night and my last night!
Summary: The hotel was located near Hwy 91, Knott's Berry Farm. When checking in there were two desk clerks at counter but only one clerk was checking in guests.  The room had older decor and definitely needed cleaned. I found old accumulated dirt and a pair of sunglasses on floor near corner of bed. The phone didn't work and desk lamp. Television channel list in room needs updated the channel lineup didn't match TV.  No ironing board or iron in the room. I had to give my drivers license as collateral to borrow both.  The bathroom had plenty of towels and supplies.  I would only stay or recommend this hotel in a pinch for families or business.
Manager Response: Dear rvlzom62,  Thank you for your review and please accept my apologies that your room was not clean enough at the time you checked-in. I will let our housekeeping manager know about the cleanliness you mentioned. Once again please accept my apologies and we hope you will give us another opportunity to better serve you in the future.   Sincerely,  Franciscu S.

Summary Heading: Want to watch TV? Unplug the Microwave???
Summary: Start with the good stuff. The motel is close to everything. The rooms are comfy and clean. Staff is friendly. Pool is nice and there are lots of people enjoying it. It's a happening place and people are enjoying themselves. The property backs to the freeway but they've done a good job of blocking out the sound. Even on the 4th floor the noise is pretty unnoticeable.  The problem is this. There are no outlets in the room. For example, we have an alarm clock but it's unplugged. When I went to plug it back in, there was no outlet. No big deal because I can use the alarm on my phone. Except, I need to charge it and there is no outlet near the bed. Want to watch TV? Unplug the microwave and plug the cable box into the spot once reserved for the microwave. In today's media driven
Manager Response: Dear Jon,  Thank you for your review and please accept my apologies for not  having sufficient outlets in the room.  We are glad to hear that you enjoyed the pool and our location.   Sincerely,  Franciscu S.

Summary: My stay was very pleasant. The staff was friendly and caring about my needs. The check-in was fast, the hotel was clean and the location was great for my trip. The only complaint was that there was no glass plate in the microwave and I did not like the breakkfast. Overall, it is a good place to stay.
Manager Response: Dear Jacqueline,  Thank you for your review and glad that you enjoyed your stay with us. We look forward to welcome you soon.  Sincerely,  Franciscu S.

Summary: You would think that photos might somehow reflect what to expece. But, not in this case. The beds were wonderful but the rooms were grotty! Had to clean the room before we could enjoy any of it. We tried 6 rooms before picking the least offensive. WE chose a non smoking hotel, but disgusting previous guests smoked in 3 of the rooms we looked at. Holes in carpet. junk stuck to the counters and furniture, and BODY FLUID STAINS ON THE FURNITURE!!! Tile cracked on bathroom floor, ancient fridge, not enough power outlets and holes in carpet. A/C cycled on and off all the time. We changed the chair in our room with a room next door that was vacant. Told on the phone that the rooms had been very recently renovated and while they looked somewhat updated they were worn and dingy.
Manager Response: Dear Ellen,  Thank you for your review and I apologize that you were not pleased with our rooms. I appreciate you mentioning about our staff who are trying their best to accommodate all guest's needs. We look forward to welcome you soon.  Sincerely,  Franciscu S

Summary: I was there on family business, my stay was OK. Clean room, comfortable bed. hot shower. Quick and easy access to the 91 freeway. It suited my needs.
Manager Response: Dear John,  We appreciate your review and glad to hear that we were able to meet your needs. Look forward to welcome you soon.  Sincerely,  Franciscu S.

Summary Heading: paid to sleep in a hospital instead
Summary: The hotel bed was not properly cleaned, I went to sleep at 10pm & was in the hospital by 1am with a horrible rash that wouldn't go away until two days after I left California. The hotel gave me 25% off my night, even though they cost me much more in out of state hospital bills. Thx Days Inn!
Manager Response: Dear Carolyn,  Thank you for your review and once again I apologize for the inconvenience. Like you requested during your stay we made sure that your room was deep cleaned and all the linen were changed. Furthermore, we offered 50% off your night. I understand that it's frustrating when you have to be in a hospital during vacation. However, I hope you are feeling better now.   Sincerely,  Franciscu S.

Summary: The hotel was old and the service was less than adequate. We had to deposit our ID if we wanted to use Iron and Ironing Board. Breakfast area had 3 tables and 2 high tables. The only positive to this was that it was close drive to the parks.
Manager Response: Dear Hugo,  Thank you for your review and I apologize having to keep your ID to check-out an iron was an inconvenience for you. I hope you enjoyed your stay overall.   Sincerely,  Franciscu S

Summary: Good deal for the buck!! If you want a 6 star Hotel, then pay for it, but for sleeping and road trip A1...
Manager Response: Dear Eddie,  Thank you for your honest review!   We look forward to welcome you soon.  Sincerely,  Franciscu S

Summary Heading: Ya get what you pay for
Summary: The beds were comfortable, room was okay. We are on a tight budget so it was ok. Breakfast was great if you like fruit loops or a blueberry muffin. I was hoping for a bit healthier start.  Noisy rooms, not super clean but it is right next to the freeway, and target and all a dollar so that was convenient. Pool and hot tub were great!
Manager Response: Dear Kathy,  Thank you for your review and glad that you enjoyed your stay with us. We look forward to welcome you soon.  Sincerely,  Franciscu S

Summary: The Days Inn - Buena Park is NOT a place I would stay in again. The room was unclean, sheets were stained, inoperative hair dryer and lamp fixtures broken. The floor was so dirty such that you would not want to walk barefoot on the rug without washing your feet. The complimentary breakfast was meager and limited to watery oatmeal or high sugar cereals.
Manager Response: Dear Thomas,  I sincerely apologize for the unpleasant stay you had with us. I will notify the housekeeping manager about the cleanliness you mentioned about the room. I appreciate your feedback and hope you will give us another opportunity to better serve you in the future.  Sincerely,  Franciscu S.

Summary: We have stayed here two times this year. In early February and 9-11 of March. The first time they were renovating the loby/breakfast area. This time it was the trees were being trimmed and had parts of parking lot closed for 2 days. Guess what the part closed for 2 days was closest to our room. Had to park in Target parking lot who turns lights off at 10:30 p.m. The people were really nice and so was room. Rooms are quiet and beds comfortable. Hopefully next time no construction.
Manager Response: Dear David F,  Thank you for your review and I am sorry for any inconvenience caused during our tree trimming and breakfast area renovations. I hope you will not be inconvenienced during your next visit.   Sincerely,  Franciscu S.

Summary: I have so many things to say.  I have video and pictures to validate this review.  Let's start with cleanliness,  -5 star.  Sheets had stains on covers, bed sheet and pillow cases.  It was so dirty they had no way to defend themselves.  Lamp shades and fairs had tears.  Bathroom was dirty.  Rust showing on bathtub.  Light bulbs were not working in two areas. We were moved to a secondary room and a bit cleaner but had no choice since this was the last room.  What we found an hour into prepping for bed was alarming.  No outlets by the bed instead they spliced into an existing wire in multiple spots then piggy backed it with an additional wire so they can twist it to the alarm clock plug and others.  I called and notified and they didn't do anything.  Didn't care whatsoever.
Manager Response: Dear Allen A,  Thank you for your review and I apologize for the unpleasant stay you had with us. I have notified our  maintenance manager and he will be looking into the wires you mentioned.   Once again please accept my apologies.   Sincerely,  Franciscu S.

Summary: The hotel was really good. The room is big enough, clean, and well kept. Breakfast was good, and the pool was heated, which was really nice because it was a little bit chilly when we checked in. There was a laundry facility with machine and dryer. What I like about this place was that it was close to a lot of restaurants and the hotel gives a discount coupon that can be used to most of them. Target is also less than 5 mins walk away, which also houses Starbucks and a Pizza Hut store.
Manager Response: Dear Carl,  Thank you for your review and we are glad to hear that you enjoyed your stay with us. We look forward to welcome you soon.   Sincerely,  Franciscu S.

Summary: I have heard good things about Days Inn.  This particular property in Buena Park was not so good.I stayed there to save money instead of the Holiday Inn.  While the pool was nice there were several outpoints.  The rooms were not clean meaning dirt and dust, Jacuzzi jets did not work, had to sign a form (desk had my 10 year old do it!) for 2 small pool towels, soda machine was completely out except for  7 up, small breakfast area was so crowded at 8:30am you couldn't even get a cup of coffee, one table for 100 guests?  Loud yelling next door to us on the 3rd floor, some domestic squabble at midnight. Just really below the standard you would expect.  I will pay more and stay at the Holiday Inn in May.
Manager Response: Dear Debroah,  Thank you for your review and I apologize that you didn't have a good stay with us. I will let our housekeeping manager know about the cleanliness you mentioned. I hope you will give us another opportunity to better serve you in the future.   Sincerely,  Franciscu S.

Summary: stale rancid stench, interior walls/doors dirty, bed area dirty. Lobby smelled like marijuana, poor customer service.
Manager Response: Dear Ricardo R,  Thank you for your review and I sincerely apologize that you had a unpleasant stay with us. I am not sure if you requested to be moved to another room upon finding the dirty areas. Please feel free to let our front desk know if anything is not up to your satisfaction during your next stay.   Sincerely,  Franciscu S.

Summary Heading: Not bad but can be noisy
Summary: Room itself wasn't so bad. Furnitures were a little old but didn't bother me at all. It was also clean and staffs were nice. One thing that bothered me the most was the noise. The room that i stayed in was located near the highway so it was noisy. Also, theres a night club near the motel (sounded like an Indian club or something? The songs were indian or middle eastern i think) and they left the doors opened so it was very noisy.
Manager Response: Dear Hoony,  Thank you for your honest review and please accept my apologies about the restaurant playing loud music. Next time be sure to ask for a room away from the restaurant during check-in.   We look forward to welcome you soon.  Sincerely,  Franciscu S.

Summary: It was a nice Hotel but the noise got to me.  Kids running all over at all hours, noise from the hot tub/pool and the freeway being so close.  People came and went at all hours of the day and night making much noise.  No consideration of others.  The breakfast bar was very skimpy and not enough tables and chairs.  May try it again in the future.
Manager Response: Dear Richardv722,  Thank you for your review and I apologize that the noise was too much for you. I hope you will give us another opportunity to better serve you in the future.   Sincerely,  Franciscu S.

Summary: Our stay was great! The staff was very helpful, was a small issue upon check-in regarding smokey scent in room, but was immediately moved to another room. Otherwise, the room was good, and the bed comfortable if more firm than I prefer. The Continental Breakfast offered oranges, blueberry muffins, toast, danishes, oatmeal, coffee, OJ, apple juice, and cereal with whole and 2% milk.  Few blocks from Knott's Berry Farm. With a Target store conveniently located right next door, and a new Dollar Tree in the same plaza. Was able to pick up travel essentials at Target and sand buckets from Dollar Tree.
Manager Response: Dear Phyllis,  Thank you for your review and glad to hear that you had a great stay with us. We look forward to welcome you soon.  Sincerely,  Franciscu S.

Summary: We needed a place to sleep after arriving in L.A. after our 2 day drive before going on our cruise.  The beds where brand new and very comfortable.  The room was very clean.  The location was really good for our needs.  The breakfast wasn't something to return for and while under renovations it was in a small room without room for our family to sit so we took our cereal to our room. Other then that, we will stay here again.
Manager Response: Dear 508tamarad,  Thank you for your review and glad to hear that you had a good stay with us. I apologize for the inconvenience caused by the temporary breakfast room. We look forward to welcome you soon.  Sincerely,  Franciscu S.

Summary: The room was very clean and nice. The smell when we arrived was that of over powering bleach. we had to leave the door open for an hour to breath. The front door looked like someone had tried to break in and the metal around the door jam was was bent and the locking mechanism was exposed although it was secure.
Manager Response: Hi,  Thank you for your review and I apologize for the smell of bleach. I will notify the housekeeping manager. Also, I will let maintenance know to check the door you mentioned.    We look forward to welcome you soon.  Sincerely,  Franciscu S.

Summary: We had black feet within minutes of arriving because of the disgusting carpet. We had to put the blankets on the floor so the children could walk around. The staff serving breakfast were extremely rude. The Internet was nonexistent.
Manager Response: Dear SantanaGrissom,  Thank you for your review and I apologize that the carpets were dirty. I will let our housekeeping manager know about it. Also, I will talk to the breakfast server about her service offered to you.  I hope you will give us another opportunity to better serve you.   Sincerely,  Franciscu S.

Summary: Average stay. You get what you pay for. Not luxurious. Just a place to lay your head. They could do better on breakfast menu. I would stay there again. Near a lot of restaurants and store
Manager Response: Dear Antoine,  Thank you for your review and I apologize that our breakfast was not up to your standard. We look forward to welcome you soon.  Sincerely,  Franciscu S.

Summary: This was a good motel and the only issue was the breakfast in the morning it was on a different floor and it was like a maze trying to find it since I was handicap and had to use the elevator and not the stairs.
Manager Response: Dear Tammy,  Thank you for your review and I apologize for the inconvenience caused by the temporary breakfast area. We had to some construction in our regular breakfast serving area. However, our construction is complete now. We look forward to welcome you soon.  Sincerely,  Franciscu S.

Summary: I was less than impressed with the cleanliness of the room. There were ziploc bags left on the night stand, the remote had bits of food on it and the chair upholstery was stained and gross
Manager Response: Dear TripAdvisor Member,  I sincerely apologize for the unpleasant stay you had with us. I will notify our housekeeping manager about the cleanliness you mentioned. I hope you will give us another opportunity to better serve you in the near future.   Best,  Franciscu S.

Summary: For the price this an excellent place. Only problem I have is with the internet - its Horrible constantly fading and kicking me off. Other than that well worth every penny. The staff is excellent from everyone at the front desk to the maids!
Manager Response: Dear kevincZ5962TD,  Thank you for your review and glad to hear that you were satisfied with your stay except for the wifi issue. I will let our IT department know to check on the routers to make sure they are functioning.  Look forward to welcome you soon.  Sincerely,  Franciscu S.

Summary: The first night stay, in the adjoining room, there were 3 people going in and out, all night long, keeping me awake.  I complained the next morning and they said they'd move me to the third floor...and charged me more for the same size room.  There were no towels, washcloths in the bathroom and no liner for the ice bucket.  I went back down to the registration desk and asked for the items.  The light over the sink was like a strobe light - off & on all the time...I could not even shave as it was the only sink.    I asked to be moved to another room...This room's door had previously been pried open with a crow bar and duck tape was on the door jam and had rolled over and stuck to the door - you could hardly get it open.  I refused that room.  The last room, I stayed another 3
Manager Response: Dear 862fredk,  I am sorry that you did not have a satisfied stay with us. I will inform our housekeeping manager about the towels which was not in your room. Please feel free to contact me if you would like to discuss about us charging you more.  Sincerely,  Franciscu S

Summary: For the Price I paid and Star Rating of the motel it was what I expected. Good location, the young man at the front desk as well as the housekeepers were friendly and efficient and my room was clean and ready before I got there. Nothing you would write home about but nothing you would lambast. Only complaint is the WiFi (wireless) was went down often and at times weak.
Manager Response: Dear Craigd562,  Thank you for your review and glad to hear that you were satisfied with your stay. I will let our IT department know about the WIFI issue.   Look forward to welcome you soon.  Sincerely,  Franciscu S.

Summary Heading: My Comments and I hope They're Reviewed
Summary: First, Brent at the front desk is awesome!  What a wonderful person who's gone above and beyond for my family to make us feel welcomed and comfortable.  However, my son woke up screaming last night, 2/1/15, because there was a roach crawling on his leg.  My husband had to basically strip of the bedding, find the roach, and eliminate it.  Also, there have been smaller roaches found in the refrigerator and trash near the sink.
Manager Response: Dear 655stephaniew,  Thank you for your review and I will let Brent know that his service was recognized by you. I sincerely apologize about the roach that crawled into the bed. I will let out housekeeping staff know  to inspect the rooms thoroughly and also I will inform our pest management  company about it.   I want you to know that we will be taking all necessary precautions to avoid any future occurrence of the same nature.   Best regards,  Franciscu S.

Summary: Our visit to Days INN Buena Park was not a bad one. Got our money worth. The room was not so bad and location was near the Feeway and other attractions. WIFI was available and free. Pool was clean but needs to be easy  with chemicals. Breakfast was OK but could use a face-left.
Manager Response: Dear Sal,  Thank you for your review and we are glad to hear that you were satisfied with your stay. I will let the maintenance staff know about the chemical levels.   Look forward to welcome you soon.  Sincerely,  Franciscu S.

Summary: Difficult to get to. Can be seen from Beach Blvd, but entrance is unmarked and off Orangethorpe Ave. Nothing on website saying that entire property is non-smoking, had to smoke in the neighboring property's parking lot. At least they could have mentioned it before I booked my room. Last but not least, they ran out of washrags! they gave the excuse that they had a full house the day before and expected us to do without or use hand towels instead. Staff was indifferent at best. Not happy with my stay. Expected better from Days Inn
Manager Response: Dear beerwolf67,  I apologize for the unpleasant stay you had with us. I will notify the housekeeping manager about the towels you mentioned. I hope you will give us another opportunity to better serve you in the near future.  Sincerely,  Franciscu S.

Summary: Only complaint: pillows smelled aweful. I had to put on the floor. Other than that, everything was great.
Manager Response: Dear TripAdvisor Member,  Thank you for your review and I sincerely apologize that the pillows you had smelled bad. I am not sure if you notified our front desk staff. If you did we would have provided you another set of pillows.   Sincerely,  Franciscu S.

Summary: For the price I thought I would regret it but it wasn't bad at all. Nothing great but an overall good stay with plenty of food in the area
Manager Response: Dear TripAdvisor Member,  Thank you for your review and glad to hear that your stay was better than you expected. We look forward to welcome you soon.  Sincerely,  Franciscu S

Summary Heading: Got a 2 bedroom suite - the pictures looked like it was 1...
Summary: Got a 2 bedroom suite - the pictures looked like it was 1 bedroom with a bed, and the sofa bed and other bed in the 'living' area. But the 2 beds were together instead. Would have been nice to know. Also thought there was just 1 bathroom, but there were 2. Nice surprise. Would be good if the website had more details. i almost did not book because I thought it was 1 bathroom.
Manager Response: Dear Tinap411,  Thank you for your review and I will notify the appropriate department about updating the room information. We look forward to welcome you soon.  Sincerely,  Franciscu S.

Summary Heading: Asking for to be on the 4th floor was a bad idea.
Summary: I should have never asked for top floor.
