Got placed in room 431,the door didn't close like a normal door which is kinda scary since the last days inn I stayed at some weirdo tried to open my door at 3am and then started cussing at god knows who, well long story short that person was arrested shortly after. Also being in room 431 is bad due to the sound of all the cars on the freeway and the wind breeze coming threw the door that don't close all the way.well I guess this time should be my last encounter with the days inn. Other then that this days inn actually like this days in  a lot more then my horrible experience at the days inn in Whittier can.
Manager Response: Dear Shootzbrahh,  Thank you for your review and I apologize for the unpleasant stay you had with us. I will let our maintenance staff know about the door you mentioned in 431.  I hope you will give us another opportunity to better serve you in the future.  Sincerely,  Franciscu S

Summary: Hotel was overbooked, Requested first floor, I was placed on the 4th, door didnt close all the way in room 431, heard and felt wind all night, heater would not work, Couple in the room next or behind us however you want to put it argued all night. Im a regular and this trip by far was HORRIBLE!!!!
Manager Response: Dear Porshac2015,  Thank you for your review and I sincerely apologize that we were not able accommodate your request. Next time if the neighboring rooms are loud please let us know and we will inform the appropriate parties not to be a disturbance to others.   Look forward to welcome you soon.  Sincerely,  Franciscu S.

Summary: I was more comfortable and treated better than my previous stay at a well known 5 star hotel. I was especially impressed by the wonderful way the staff treated my rambunctious 6yr old. The pool and spa were beautifully maintained even in the off-season and my son and I thoroughly enjoyed our short 2 day stay.
Manager Response: Dear 881kimberlyj,  We greatly appreciate your review and glad to hear that you enjoyed your stay with us and we look forward to welcome you soon.  Sincerely,  Franciscu S.

Summary Heading: Good location for my needs.Price is completive with other...
Summary: Good location for my needs. Price is completive with other hotels in the area. Only minor complaint is 3 prong electrical outlets are needed near the desk to plug in computers.
Manager Response: Dear BlimpPilot,  Thank you for your review and we do our best to offer competitive rates at all times. We appreciate your suggestion and will be looking into it.   Look forward to welcome you soon.  Sincerely,  Franciscu S.

Summary: I could not have been happier with the customer service.  The workers at the front desk were great and very helpful.  The location is key for Knott's but the rooms were a little scary.  We had 7 rooms being there for a tournament.  Some of the doors looked like someone took a crow bar to them and tried to break in.  You had to sleep with one eye open.  The Customer service was fantastic though once again and the rooms were clean.
Manager Response: Dear Agostog,  Thank you for your review and I am glad to hear that we were able to provide you great customer service. Look forward to welcome you soon.  Sincerely,  Franciscu S.

Summary Heading: For the love of all that is sacred to you....DO NOT BOOK THIS HOTEL!!!!!
Summary: We stayed at this hotel while taking a family trip to Disneyland shortly after Christmas. We generally aren't very picky about our hotel accomodations....all we are looking for is a clean room and beds to sleep on. We thought we would give this place a try as it was semi-close and affordable. BIG MISTAKE.  What was wrong?  1. Location: This hotel is located directly next door to a Mediterranean nightclub. There was loud music playing directly outside our window almost all night. Not a relaxing atmosphere.  2. Cleanliness: We noticed immediately upon entering our room that it clearly had not been vacuumed. Taking this into account along with the fact that this facility is the closest and cheapest hotel next to a busy nightclub....let's just say I'm glad I didn't have a
Manager Response: Dear DeborahcF1821AF,  We greatly appreciate your review and I sincerely apologize for the unpleasant stay you had with us. Unfortunately, the power outage was beyond our control. Generally when unforeseen incidents take place we do our best to get things back in order as soon as possible.   Furthermore, I will talk to Ricardo about his customer service. Once again I apologize for everything and I hope you will give us another opportunity to better serve you.   Sincerely,  Franciscu S.

Summary: not enough soap and not enough towels.  Bad internet service.  Hair dryer is weak. Good breakfast Nice customer service  Nice room Nice pool and spa
Manager Response: Dear Bearbear173,  Thank you for your review. We would have been able to provide you more towels and soap had you requested. I will let my staff know that their customer service was praised.   Look forward to welcome you soon.   Sincerely,  Franciscu S.

Summary: Staff were very nice; small "suite" had 2 bathrooms which was great with 2 kids (10 & 12); Queen bed for adults & another for a child & sofa bed for other child was a plus. Read there was a shuttle to Knott's Berry but found it wasn't so & that was 1 reason we chose this place. Place is in desperate need of refurbishing - drippy faucet, slippery tub, mold on wall w/shower, 1 torn hand towel & dirt spot on bath towel, partially broken coffee pot; beds were comfortable; very close to Knott's Berry; very sparse continental breakfast with more seating needed; pool & spa were clean except decking was peeling off badly; pool towels were smallest we've ever seen; needed help with TVs & someone did come immediately & help us.
Manager Response: Dear Gammy912,  We really appreciate your review and also apologize for torn towel you were given. I informed the housekeeping staff to be more careful when placing towels in rooms.   I hope you will give us another opportunity to better serve you in the near future.   Sincerely,  Franciscu S.

Summary Heading: Great location, older hotel, needs repairs. Rate is...
Summary: Great location, older hotel, needs repairs. Rate is adequate for what you get. Noise from traffic & loud music from local restaurant/ nightclub, until 2 am!
Manager Response: Dear TripAdvisor Member,  Thank you for your review. We do our best at all times to offer the best rate for our guests.   Look forward to welcome you soon.  Sincerely,  Franciscu S.

Summary: It was suppose to be a nonsmoking property however, the room I was in with both my kids, had as terrible smell of smoke and cigarettes stains, my kids have asthma so they were coughing all night, asked for another room and was told they were sold out. The heater pushed out more of a bad smell. There were spider and roaches in the restroom. There were stains throughout the bread spread, sheets and room in general. The door did not shut all the way for a secure lock. There were prostitutes walking around that had rooms there. I was never given our breakfast tickets, than was lied to and told they no longer serve breakfast at this location. The gentlemen that checked me in was I gaged in a conversation with somebody else, not once did he acknowledge me, I had to interrupt the
Manager Response: Dear Travelingmommy56,  I sincerely apologize for the unpleasant stay you had with us. I will personally look into the matter you mentioned where the front desk agent was engaged in another conversation while checking you in. I will also let our maintenance staff know about the heater. Once again I apologize and hope you will give us another opportunity to better serve you in the near future.   Cordially,  Franciscu S.

Summary: Every one has been so professional and helpful during my stay. I will definitely recommend this days inn to family and friends traveling here this holiday :)  So many restaurant's are nearby, it is very convenient.
Manager Response: Hi,  We really appreciate your review and glad that you enjoyed your stay with us.  Look forward to welcome you soon.  Sincerely,  Franciscu S.

Summary: Stayed at this motel located next to the 91....my room, 302, was located on the "inside" area of the motel and I didn't hear one bit of noise.  The room was large, king bed, TV, refrig, writing table...the usual things....had breakfast included, but I slept too later for it (6-9 a.m.)....Many reviews of this hotel say it's noisy, but I slept like a baby.  Room large.....comfortable and convenient.
Manager Response: Dear Shirley,  Thank you for your great review and we look forward to welcome you soon.  Sincerely,  Franciscu S.

Summary: This was our first time staying at a Days Inn and I was not impressed. Even though the location is close to a Denny's and Target and off the freeway there were too many sketchy people hanging out in the parking lot and smoking illegal drugs.  Not the kind of place I would want my child to be around.  The breakfast was ok but I was told I couldn't take the food up to my family even though we had a refrigerator and microwave in our room.  I didn't understand the difference it made.  We won't be staying here again. First impressions are my last.
Manager Response: Dear Tonitas,  Thank you for your review and I apologize that you didn't feel safe. I hope you will give us another opportunity to better serve you in the near future.  Sincerely,  Franciscu S

Summary: Just read your reviews online and booked our stay for the 19TH of december im so excited to be staying here with you for my husbands birthday and our first family trip to disneyland with our two year old cant wait to see you  soon :) Blessings Jamie Molina
Manager Response: Dear Jamie,  Thank you for letting us know that you are looking forward to staying with us. We will do our best to make sure that you have a great stay at Days Inn Buena Park. Please let our staff know if you have special requests during your stay.  Sincerely,  Franciscu S.

Summary: The host at the front desk was rude and did not have any manners, charge me $20. for early checking fee, when rooms are available,
Manager Response: Dear Juan D,  Thank you for your review and I apologize for the unfriendly service you received. I will talk to the person about it. I hope you will give us another opportunity to better serve you in the near future.  Sincerely,  Franciscu S.

Summary: Every one has been so professional and helpful during my stay. I will definitely recommend this days inn to family and friends traveling here this holiday :)
Manager Response: Dear 902jennifera,  Thank you for your review and we are glad to hear that you enjoyed our services. We look forward to welcome you soon.  Sincerely,  Franciscu S.

Summary Heading: They leave my door open all day
Summary: I went to Days Inn Buena Park for three days in total. I must say that the hotel is fine, the room ok, but the shower didn´t work, so I requested that they repair. I left for Disneyland very early in the morning, and they told me they were going to repair it so I thought that at night everything was going to be ok. I returned around after 10 pm from Disney and when I went to my room, where I found that the door was opened. Yes... OPENED... and the worst thing is that hotel employee (the night one) didn´t apologyze and gave no reason for that. I could have lost everything. I had luck... but the experience was horrible...
Manager Response: Dear Federico S,  Thank you for your review and I sincerely apologize for the bad experience  you had with us. I will check with the maintenance department as to why the shower was not fixed and why he didn't even apologize to you. I hope you will give us another opportunity to better serve you in the near future.   Sincerely,  Franciscu S.

Summary Heading: Only if you need to sleep
Summary: This Establishment wasn't worthy of anything but a Place for You to Sleep.  The rooms had been modified but they didn't live up to the standards.  The towels & linens were used and seemed as if they were used from back in the day.
Manager Response: Dear 444melb,  Thank you for your review and I apologize that our standards didn't meet your expectations. I will let our housekeeping manager know about the linen you mentioned.   It is our hope that you will give us another opportunity to better serve you in the near future.   Sincerely,  Franciscu S.

Summary: Was not impressed. My family and I have stayed at this same hot for the last 4 years. We will not be doing it again. Not only do they require a deposit when you check in now they also charge more per night for their rooms and have downgraded their breakfast to next to nothing. We left the note on asking that our bed cover be changed and they put it back on our bed. To top all of that they charged both my sister and I for the room so we were charged double. We had to wait 3 days for them to fix what they had done wrong. I'm very dissappointed with the new management and would no longer recommend this hotel to others.
Manager Response: Dear 555nothappy,  I sincerely apologize for the inconvenience you had with your card being charged twice. Like most other hotels/motels we require a deposit from every guest. The rates tend to be on the higher side when our occupancy is high. Please feel free to call me on 714 670 9000 if you would like to discuss further about your stay.  Sincerely,  Franciscu S.

Summary: ok! no problems!!       Breakfast was  good  with lots of selections.  The tv worked well with cc.  The jakuzzi was just right!!
Manager Response: Dear 852tomn,  Thank you for your review and we look forward to welcome you soon.  Sincerely,  Franciscu S.

Summary: This days inn is an alright location and to get into it you have to drive behind some shops...not a big deal. They did some updating to the rooms but not enough. Still needing new tvs and bathrooms. The maids don't look for missing stuff in the rooms so my room had no glass plate in the microwave and only one garbage can. Rooms lack accessible outlets to plug in your stuff. Pool and hot tub are nice but they need to clean off the deck and skim the pool for dead insects and leaves more often.  the beds are comfy and there's plenty of pillows. Plenty of parking. Lots of good food options near by.
Manager Response: Dear HotelGuruGirl,  Thank you for your review. We are in the process of getting new TV's. Hopefully by the beginning of next year we should have flat screens. I will let our housekeeping manager know about the missing glass which you found in the microwave. Please accept my apologies.   We look forward to welcome you soon.  Sincerely,  Franciscu S.

Summary: This Day's Inn is EXCEPTIONAL! A perfect location, near the freeway and a lot of nice restaurants within walking distance. The staff are very courteous and professional. It's my near out-of-town stay with great breakfast.
Manager Response: Dear Qarawol,  We greatly appreciate your review. I will let our staff know that they were mentioned in your review.  Look forward to welcome you soon.  Sincerely,  Franciscu S.

Summary: clean and very friendly staff. only thing is that i wish their TV's where upgraded TV's freeze a lot as well as channels have awhile to load.Also the carpet needs more cleaning you can hop out of the shower and walk around your feet will get all dirty. (must wear shoes or socks in room)  Other then that great place to stay.
Manager Response: Dear Dianne,  Thank you for your review. I will let our maintenance staff know to check the TV's. I apologize for the inconvenience it caused.   Look forward to welcome you soon.  Sincerely,    Franciscu S.

Summary Heading: Close to Knotts and Medieval Times
Summary: Clean no frills place to sleep after a long day at Knotts. Lots of restaurants around and a swimming pool.
Manager Response: Dear Meowser666,  Thank you for your review and we look forward to welcome you soon.  Sincerely,  Franciscu S.

Summary: Complex could use some serious cleaning. Exterior walls sidewalks dirty.  I came in on Saturday afternoon, exterior trash cans full to overflowing. Cleaning ladies passing by, but no one emptied them. Still full when I left the next day. One piece of furniture had a heart on the arm rest, someone made with an ink pen. Room was pretty clean, but some debris in corners,Like papers etc. Front desk staff were friendly and helpful. Slept well despite proximity to the freeway. Facility is just ok, not terrible, but not great. Also my laptop could not pick up the wifi.
Manager Response: Dear 298eugened,  We sincerely appreciate your review. Also, please accept our apologies for the trash and debris in corners. I have informed our housekeeping manager to make sure that all the trash cans are emptied daily. Furthermore, I am glad to hear that the front desk staff were friendly and you slept well.    We look forward to welcome you again in the near future.   Sincerely,  Franciscu S.

Summary Heading: You pay for what you get....
Summary: This hotel is about a 5 minute drive from Knotts Berry Farm. They offered free continental breakfast. Housekeeping kept the room very clean and gave us extra towels upon request. This hotel is very close to a freeway which was very noisey in the morning. We couldnt get the microwave to work for us. Overall, we were satisfied with this hotel and would probably stay here again.
Manager Response: Dear Robert,  Thank you for your review and glad to hear that you enjoyed your stay with us and also sorry to hear that the freeway noise was a disturbance for you. Next time if you have any issue with the microwave or anything please let our front desk know and we will be more than happy to assist you in getting another or have our maintenance staff fix it.  We look forward to welcome you soon.   Sincerely,  Franciscu S.

Summary Heading: Was good for the price. Was near the location we were going...
Summary: Was good for the price. Was near the location we were going to. A little hard to get to the hotel building itself. In a shopping center with restaurants. Was quiet for where it was located.
Manager Response: Dear Chris,  Thank you for your review and glad to hear that you enjoyed your stay with us.  Look forward to welcome you soon.  Sincerely,  Franciscu S.

Summary: Very small room; called and asked for micro and  fridge before arriving and none  was in the room, reserved 2 rooms for 3 adults n 1 child yet only  had 2 towels,  called housekeeping for towels and toilet paper.  Maintenance came 3 times to fix tv and replace a ac unit.
Manager Response: Dear Kanakeaina,  Thank you for your review and I apologize for the issues you had in your room during your stay. I will be looking into the issues you mentioned and hope you will give us another opportunity to better serve you in the future.   Sincerely,  Franciscu S.

Summary Heading: It's a decent place to stay
Summary: Our queen 2 room "suite" with a pull out was the perfect size for our family of 5. It was clean and most of the staff was friendly. However upon checking in I was told it would cost me $15 for "early check in" we opted to go across the street for lunch and when we returned to check in our room was not ready for us.
Manager Response: Dear Disneygirl2014,  Thank you for your review and I sincerely apologize that the room was not ready when you came to check-in. Also, I am glad that the suite was the perfect match for you and your family.   We look forward to welcome you all soon.   Sincerely,  Franciscu S.

Summary: there were night I had to leave out of the room to get food and other items and I did not feel safe. A lot of homeless and what seems to be drug users hanging out on the side of the hotel asking for money. I informed front desk and once I returned they were no longer around.
Manager Response: Dear RedB66,  Thank you for your review and thank you for letting us know about the people who were hanging around the property. We look forward to welcome you soon.   Sincerely,  Franciscu S.

Summary: Got a great price for the two nights we stayed but was very disappointed about multiple problems. Such as the curtains in our room were too long and not wide enough to cover our window.. I say too long because the ac below the window was sucking up the curtain almost , which I fixed with putting a hairband around the curtain... Still cracks for passing people to see though .. Also toilet needed to be flushed 3/4 times to go down all the way.. When our room was cleaned we were not even left more soap and could tell they only barely cleaned up . Also the free breakfast yeah it's like a couple items and if you don't get there at 6am there's nothing left
Manager Response: Dear Haileejade,  Thank you for your review and I sincerely apologize for the unpleasant stay you had with us. I will let our maintenance department know about the issue with the flush you had. Our breakfast hours are from 6am to 9am.   We look forward to welcome you soon.  Sincerely,  Franciscu S.

Summary Heading: Overpriced for the kind of hotel it is.
Summary: Stayed once but the rate was too high for the quality you get. for the amount of money you pay, you could get a much nicer hotel.  I did not try the room service but the freeway noise was too loud but was the only available room at the last minute.
Manager Response: Dear Tony,  Thank you for your review and I apologize that you felt you over paid for the room. When the occupancy is high the rates tend to go up.   We look forward to welcome you in the near future.  Sincerely,  Franciscu

Summary: Overall I would say it was a good experience. Bed was comfortable as were the pillows.  The breakfast was okay. It is definitely continental breakfast so don't expect too much. Room was clean and the a/c worked really well.
Manager Response: Dear Matilde,  Thank you for your review and we are happy to hear that you enjoyed your stay with us and we look forward to welcome you again.  Sincerely,  Franciscu S.

Summary: The room I was in had a torn screen and a door that you could see under to the outside.  The day my bedding was changed ,, the sheets were just thrown in.   I won't stay again.
Manager Response: Dear Mary,  I sincerely apologize for unpleasant stay you had with us. I will check with the staff why the room was not up to the standards. I hope you will give us another opportunity to better serve you in the near future.   Sincerely,  Franciscu S.

Summary: Enjoyed our stay very relaxing.  Very close to restsurants. Staff very friendly. I would stay here again.
Manager Response: Dear Alicia,  We greatly appreciate your review and happy to hear that you enjoyed your stay. I will let the staff know that you mentioned them in your review. We look forward to welcome you soon.   Sincerely,  Franciscu S.

Summary: room was great, only problem was that the desk clerk was very snappy, in a hurry and did not want to take the time to allow me to ask questions and complete my check in
Manager Response: Dear Gloria,  Thank you for your review. I apologize about the service offered by our front desk agent.   We look forward to welcome you soon.  Sincerely,  Franciscu S.

Summary Heading: no air conditioner,worst hotel i have seen in north america,atleast in USA
Summary: very bad managed and dirty sub standard hotel.no air conditioning.staff was discourteous,i booked for 2 nights 8/30 to 9/01.Since there was no Air conditioner in the room working,was hard to spent night.I left and checked out under protest the same midnight,Since i paid total payment in advanced.could not get get refund,i tried to reach hotel manager,they all are discourteous to refund my legitimated funds,was really bad experience.  HATE TO STAY DAYS INN IN FEATURE..Day inn should remove FLAG from these this property.
Manager Response: Dear Manzar57,  Please accept my sincere apologies about your unpleasant stay with us. If you wish please call me on 714 670 9000 to discuss about the issues you had.  Sincerely,  Franciscu S.

Summary Heading: Close to Sea World and Beaches
Summary: Hotel was busy, fully booked.  WIFI was non existant... got better signal from hotels next to property!  Breakfast was OK, could use another Hot disk like Ham, Bacon  or Sausage.
Manager Response: Dear Walter,  Thank you for your review and please accept my apologies about the wifi. I will forward your suggestion to our ownership regards to breakfast.   Look forward to welcome you in the near future.  Sincerely,  Franciscu S.

Summary: The check in was quick, the staff were friendly, the room was quiet and clean. Our bed was so comfortable I felt like I was sleeping on air. i enjoyed the shower, water pressure great. We had an amazingly quiet room on the bottom floor. No banging doors or noise from the pool outside. The double pained windows kept it pretty quiet considering we were next to the freeway, The a/c was great on the hot nights. All in all a good stay. Will return if in the area.
Manager Response: Dear Trish,  Thank you for your review and we are glad to hear that you  had a great stay with us. Look forward to welcome you in the foreseen future.  Sincerely,  Franciscu S.

Summary: Old building and rooms/furniture but clean. Noisy by the pool area with the traffic from Fwy right there. Didn't appreciate the no check in early policy unless you pay 20 dollars.
Manager Response: Dear PS,  Thank you for your review and we look forward to welcome you soon.  Sincerely,  Franciscu S.

Summary: I'm a gold member with Wyndham Rewards, meaning I stay often at their properties.  Well this is the second time I've had a problem at this location. First time it was the mildew and now blog on my so called clean towels. Really? The late night fella at the front was ok thiugh.
Manager Response: Dear Pierred,  Please accept my apologies. I will be checking with the housekeeping department as to why a uncleaned towel was placed in a room.  I hope you will give us another opportunity to better serve you in the future.  Sincerely,  Franciscu S.

Summary: first of all when I made the reservation we asked for early check in. we got there around 1200 noon and were immediately told by the desk clerk that it would be twenty dollars extra to check in before 3:oo. My husband had appointments and left. I asked the clerk what was the earliest I could check in and she told me 2:00 would be OK. I asked where we could leave our 2 small suitcases and she said that she really wasn't allowed to keep suitcases but she would do me a special favor and keep ours. I went to lunch and shopping and came back at 2:00. Again I was told check in time wasn't until 3:00. I reminded the woman that she said I could come at 2:00. she then found me a room but said next time she would have to  charge me the extra twenty dollars. there will be no next time. she
Manager Response: Dear Joyce,  Thank you for your review and please accept my apologies for the unpleasant situation you encountered during the check-in process. The $50 is a fully refundable deposit which we credit back at the time of check-out. It is not an actual charge.   I will inform our housekeeping staff to inspect the rooms thoroughly prior to putting the room back to service. once again I apologize that you didn't enjoy our service and hope you will give us another opportunity to better serve you in the near future.   Sincerely,  Franciscu S.

Summary Heading: room overall was good. the cleanless not so well.. the...
Summary: room overall was good. the cleanless not so well.. the guest bathroom was dirty and the toiler seat was all crapped. also left over food from previous customers were left in the fridge like if they barely cleaned the room.
Manager Response: Dear Christian,  Thank you for your review. I will let our housekeeping department know about the left over food which was in the fridge. Please accept my apologizes.   We look forward to welcome you soon.  Sincerely,  Franciscu S.

Summary Heading: Was suitable for our trip.  Carpets could've been cleaner...
Summary: Was suitable for our trip.  Carpets could've been cleaner.  Should include a refrigerator for the price for storing restaurant leftovers. Room was not ready when we arrived well after 3 p.m.  Had to be given a different room. Regardless, we enjoyed our stay.
Manager Response: Dear Aubree,  Thank you for your review. I will let our housekeeping department know about the carpet issue you mentioned. I am not sure if you requested a fridge during your stay. We usually give a fridge if any is available to our guests who requests.   We look forward to welcome you soon.  Sincerely,  Franciscu S.

Summary: the hotel was very dirty, trash all over, no ice machine in 2nd floor, no towels in pool, no fridge in room, no phone, no extra toilet paper, next to hotel a cantina restaurant loudly, we want rest but we couldn`t. never get internet, even in the main looby, the excuse was the hotel is bussy, why you couldn`t fix this problem?. carpet dirty in the breakfast area.
Manager Response: Dear Bernardo,  Please accept my apologies for the unpleasant experience you had with us. I will let our housekeeping and maintenance department know about the issues you mentioned.  We hope you will give us another opportunity to better serve you in the near future.  Sincerely,  Franciscu S.

Summary: Very pleased with this hotel. Front desk host was very cordial and nice to notify that I had booked 2 rooms instead of 1 that I needed.
Manager Response: Dear Carlos,  Thank you for your review and I am glad that you experienced our hospitality. We look forward to welcome you soon.  Sincerely,  Franciscu S.

Summary: We stayed just one night.  Room was very clean and up to date.  We stayed opposite the noisy highway and did fine.  Breakfast was good, just running low on available options as of 8:30 am.  The television did not work, nor did we pursue it.  Too tired!  Internet connection was a bit tough.
Manager Response: Dear Biolaparent,  Thank you for your review I will let our maintenance staff to check on the TV and the wifi issue you mentioned. We look forward to welcome you again in the near future.  Sincerely,  Franciscu S.

Summary Heading: Bathtub was old and should have been replaced.  Air...
Summary: Bathtub was old and should have been replaced.  Air condition was broke and could not turn it off.  Maid left cigarette wrapper on one of the beds.
Manager Response: Dear Laura,  Thank you for your review and I apologize that your expectations were not met. I hope you will give us another opportunity to better serve you in the future.   Sincerely,  Franciscu S.

Summary: The Days Inn Buena Park is the perfect location for access to Knotts, Disney and the 91. Plus, a Target is steps away. The rooms are basic but comfortable and surprisingly quite being right off the 91. Would definitely stay again.
Manager Response: Dear Byron,  Thank you for your review and we are glad to hear that you will be back to stay with us. We look forward to welcome you again.  Sincerely,  Franciscu S.

Summary: I have mixed emotions about this hotel.  The price for my stay was fairly decent and the location was excellent for me to conduct business.  I received decent customer service from the staff at this facility but I was very unhappy with the quality of the rooms.  My biggest complaint would have to be geared towards housekeeping.  The rooms really need to be clean thoroughly and the bed linens need to be washed properly.  Most of all, it's summer time and families are constantly in and out of these rooms going to the pools.  Something needs to be done about the damp mold-like odors that are in the rooms. I totally felt like I was at a high-end motel rather than a hotel.
Manager Response: Dear Jasmine,  Thank you for your review. I will have housekeeping make sure that all the rooms get cleaned thoroughly. We look forward to welcome you soon.  Sincerely,  Franciscu S.

Summary Heading: Worst hotel experience of our lives!!
Summary: Not sure where to start... look at the pictures I took of the 1st and 2nd room we were given.  We walked in, and were grossed out by the appearance of the hotel.  It also had a stench that I can only describe as musty cigarette smoke and skunk smell.  (possibly people in a close by room smoking pot?)  I brought the concerns to the front desk, and they switched our room to one just as bad, with a cigarette trash outside our door (& I am asthmatic), hairs and a bug in my daughter's bed that bit her (and Ricardo at the front desk smirked when I showed him the swollen bite -- not funny!)  Didn't sleep because we had our sheets changed at midnight. Many stains on the carpet and sheets... and to top it all off, after a night of no sleep, I took a shower, and when I opened the 1st
Manager Response: Dear Karen,  I sincerely apologize for the unpleasant stay you had with us. I will be looking into the room you stayed and I will also check with housekeeping as to why the room was in rented without checking it. Once again I apologize that you did not have a great stay with us.  I hope you will give us another opportunity to better serve you in the near future.  Sincerely.  Franciscu S.

Summary: We could not find another hotel in the area, so we ended up staying here. What a mistake. Place is old and dirty. When he made the reservation, we told them that their would be four in our party and we needed a room with two queens. This is the only thing that they got correct. Upon checking into the room, we noticed that their were only two bath towels. Both towels were old and thin and one had a huge tear in it. My sister went down to the front lobby to ask for two more towels. She was told by the front desk clerk (Asian owner) that their were two towels in the room already and to share them. My sister insisted on two more towels and after a pissed off look from the clerk she got two more towels. We were here three nights and every day we had to ask for two more towels. When
Manager Response: Dear Gayle,  Thank you for your review. I sincerely apologize for all the issues which took place during your stay. I would have been more than happy to assist you in every possible way had I known about the issues you experienced. Once again I am extremely sorry for the unpleasant stay you had with us and I look forward to welcome you again.   Sincerely,  Franciscu Silva

Summary: I've been booking hotels for years and this is the first hotel I regret staying. PLEASE READ THIS REVIEW BEFORE BOOKING!! When we first got there (Friday, July 25), we went to the front desk to check in. The man was nice, but had a weird attitude which made him suspicious, but I let it pass. We go to our room and the room is humid and had an old people smell. Then I look to the corner and there is a spider! The spider is the size of a half dollar! Well, we killed it and continued the day. I go to the restroom to take a shower and the door doesn't have a lock! It's not a broken lock, there wasn't a lock at ALL! So, it was pretty annoying that everyone had to advise everyone else before entering the restroom. Also, there was only two towels! We get tired and go to sleep very
Manager Response: Dear Edgar,  Thank you for your review. I sincerely apologize for the unpleasant stay you had with us. I informed our housekeeping manager to check the rooms thoroughly prior to renting them. Once again I am extremely sorry for the inconvenience caused during your stay.  Sincerely,  Franciscu Silva

Summary: My boyfriend&I recently stayed here as is is close to his place&my girlfriends place. We stayed here2make it easy4transportation2&from her place as her little ceremony for her past wedding was that weekend. It really worked out4us to stay here. I'm a light sleeper&half the time i stay in a room i am woken by very inconsiderate people(doing the deed)&the nice lady at the front desk was accommodating to my request of an upper level room.Thank you very much;)
Manager Response: Dear Candi,  Thank you for your review and I am glad to hear that we were able to accommodate your request. We look forward to welcome you soon.  Sincerely,  Franciscu Silva

Summary Heading: Infested Caterpillar Suite- save your money.
Summary: We came because of the price, we have 4 kids and got the "suite". There was nothing sweet about our stay. From the moment we checked in we had issues. Right away I noticed for a suite for 6 people there were not enough towels or pillows. We asked for more and were asked to pick them up from the front desk. Fine. Went to pick them up, they were not there. The manager scrounged up 1 pillow and 1 towel from his cabinet up front. A few hours later we realized our remote didn't work. This vacation was not a park vacation, but a relaxing beach vacation we wanted to lounge in our room and visit the beach. With the tv stuck on one Chanel we called maintenance to come they never came. Went to the front desk and finally someone came, I also asked for someone to come with the other towel
Manager Response: Dear Akeara,  Thank you for your review. I sincerely apologize for the unpleasant stay you had with us. After we received your complaint while you were at the property we had our pest control company come over to inspect the room. Also, we informed Time Warner cable about the issue you mentioned about the TV. I informed our housekeeping manager about the insufficient towels you had in the room. I will make sure that this will not happen in the future.   Once again I sincerely apologize for the unpleasant stay and hope you will give us another opportunity to better serve you.  Sincerely,  Franciscu Silva

Summary: Had booked this room for 8 days, what a mistake.  Dirtiest hotel ever.  Cockroaches in restroom.  After first night, maid never came to clean the room.  I arrived at 8:00 pm, and had to go to front desk to get towels.  Day 3, 4, and 5 room never cleaned until after 5:00 p.m.  Also, cleaning staff decided to clean the sidewalks.  Flooded the dining area and nobody even bothered to excavate the water, put a fan instead.  The following day it stunk really bad, but still served breakfast in this area.  Breakfast area was extremely dirty.  They never bothered to clean.  This was the dirtiest hotel that I had ever stayed at.  Homeless people in parking lot too. Trash was overfilling in parking lot and stayed that way for days.   Will not stay again. Staff acted as if you were a
Manager Response: Dear Penny,  I sincerely apologize for your unpleasant stay. I will be taking this up with our head housekeeper  about the cleanliness you mentioned. Once again I apologize for any inconvenience cause by our maids cleaning your room after 5PM.   I hope you will give us another opportunity to better serve in the future.  Sincerely,  Franciscu Silva

Summary: At a bargain rate, this is a very good place to stay, especially for families visiting nearby theme parks. Its best asset is the well-maintained pool area, with a pool large enough to swim laps in and a hot tub that can accommodate an extended family. It also has a small fridge and microwave in every room, free WiFi, and something approximating a complimentary breakfast. Our room had new, very comfortable mattresses.   But the place has some serious drawbacks, mainly owing to the fact that it probably operates on a shoestring budget. Plumbing seems to be one of them. The toilet in our room backed up four times before we could convince the staff that it required more than a plunger to fix it. The computer connection in the lobby was completely unreliable and staff was unable to
Manager Response: Dear Todd,  Thank you for your thorough review. We try our best to provide the most competitive rate at all times. I will forward your review to our ownership for their reference.   Next time if you run into a issue where you need an extra power outlet please let our front desk know so we can send an extension cord or a multiple power outlet.   Once again thank you for your review and look forward to welcome you soon,.  Sincerely,  Franciscu Silva

Summary: Room was good sized and clean. Beds were real comfortable! Pool area was well maintained and good sized. Only negative was being told my debit card would be charged as I checked out and it was charged at check in. Other than that, for $70/night ..... Well worth the price!!!!
Manager Response: Dear Larry,  Thank you for your review and I apologize about your charges taking place at check-in. We are glad to hear that you enjoyed our facility and look forward to welcome you soon.  Sincerely,  Franciscu Silva

Summary: we stayed here last week in order to take kids to Knotts Berry Farm. The property was average about what you would expect for a Budget Motel. The Manager was very helpful in that when I booked online I accidently booked for june instead of July. The manager applied the no-show charge to our current stay!
Manager Response: Dear Gary,  Thank you for your review and it was my pleasure to have been able to assist you. We look forward to welcome you soon.  Sincerely,  Franciscu Silva

Summary: I'm sorry but the room smelled very bad and there were cock roaches in my room. The front desk representatives were nice but my room was a disappointment.
Manager Response: Dear Sherry,  I sincerely apologize for the bad smell you experienced in your room. I will let our housekeeping manager know to place the room out of order. We notified the pest control company about the roaches you mentioned which was in the room. Once again I apologize and look forward to welcome you soon.  Sincerely,  Franciscu Silva

Summary: Front desk was rude. No sleep for 2 nights, loud noise. Front desk did not care. Locked out of room. And management could not find our reservations
Manager Response: Dear Joshua,  Thank you for your review and I apologize for the inconvenience caused during your stay. We hope you will give us another chance to better serve you soon.  Sincerely,  Franciscu Silva

Summary: Service need to be improved quite a bit. 1) Wifi connections could not be used. Called to check few times. Always they say it works, did not bother to correct. 2 Wanted my ID to  leave at the desk before we can pick up Ironing board and Iron. 3) Charge $20 extra for early check in. 4 Breakfast area is too small even for 20 people. Need lot of improvements.
Manager Response: Dear Prakasa,  Thank you for your review and I sincerely apologize for the issues you experienced during your stay. We will let our IT manager know about the WIFI not connecting.   We hope you will give us another opportunity to better serve you in the near future.  Sincerely,  Franciscu Silva

Summary: We stayed for one night after visiting Knott's Berry Farm. At first glance room seemed clean and the property was quiet. There were a lot of maintenance issues with the room. Broken bathroom tile, scuffed up sink area, wifi didn't work, no available outlets by the bed, the bottom of the chair was torn out, etc. Since we were there only one night, it was okay. We went to McDonalds for breakfast as the choices were slim and the room was packed full of people...
Manager Response: Dear Maria,  We appreciate your review. I will let our maintenance staff know to check the room for the issues you mentioned. I hope you will give us another opportunity to better serve you.  Sincerely,  Franciscu Silva

Summary Heading: Room's odor was horrible, cleaning staffs are very poor...
Summary: Room's odor was horrible, cleaning staffs are very poor, hotel staffs are very unfriendly and not very happy when you request something, roaches in the room.
Manager Response: Dear Hung,  Thank you for your review and I sincerely apologize for your unhappy stay. I hope you will give us another opportunity to better serve you in the future.  Sincerely,  Franciscu Silva

Summary: Great stay clean,nice pool and very friendly staff. But plan on your own breakfast, all they offer is a muffin, cold cereal,and a orange. There is a Denny's on the corner from hotel.They offer a 10 percent discount to Days inn customers. Great 2,4,6$ menu. Everything you need is all an Beach Blvd.
Manager Response: Dear Robyn,  Thank you for your review and I will let our staff know that they were mentioned. I will let the ownership know about the breakfast options and hopefully they will make some changes for the menu.    Look forward to welcome you soon.  Sincerely,  Franciscu Silva

Summary: I left this place after one night. Not only were the facilities and furnishings falling apart, it is severely understaffed. Long waits in lobby at check-in. Really nice and apologetic clerk, Agnes, tried to help 7 or 8 people in line while manager sat in his office. They were washing carpet in the morning while customers were trying to check out, which made it hard to hear. They can't do that in the middle of the night?   All in all, this place was a train wreck. I'll never stay at a Days Inn again because the quality control for their flags must be really poor for this place to maintain its flag.  It was a cheap motel, but I booked because my friends planned to stay there. When they arrived, Days Inn had lost their reservations.   This has the feel of a place that rents by the
Manager Response: Dear Mary,  Thank you for your review and I apologize for that you were not able to have a pleasant stay with us. We hope you will give us another opportunity to better serve you in the near future.  Sincerely,  Franciscu Silva

Summary: For the price, the accommodations were great, the continental breakfast was appealing and the room had more space than expected.
Manager Response: Dear Trudy,  We sincerely appreciate your review and glad that you enjoyed your stay with us. My staff and I look forward to welcome you soon.  Sincerely,  Franciscu Silva

Summary: The stay was good but the room had roaches and the A/C did not cool the room enough.  The breakfast was adequate but wished there was more.
Manager Response: Dear Chris,  Thank you for your review and I apologize about the issues you had in your room. I hope you will give us another opportunity to better serve you in the future.  Sincerely,  Franciscu Silva

Summary: Very close to Knotts Berry Farm.  Room was very neat and clean.  Nice size quiet frig. and a microwave.  Pool was adequate size and clean.  Air conditioner worked well as it was 95+ when I stayed.  Breakfast in the morning was nice.  Farmer Bros. coffee.  Great parking!!!!
Manager Response: Dear CA Sunshine 33,  Thank you for your positive review. We try our best to maintain the cleanliness of the property at all times. We look forward to welcome you soon.  Sincerely,  Franciscu Silva

Summary Heading: this hotel is DIRTY - yuckstained furniture, dirty...
Summary: this hotel is DIRTY - yuck stained furniture, dirty bathrooms and walls toilets didn't flush and showers didn't drain the sign out front said they had just updated the hotel and they were the newest Days Inn, only thing new was the bed, the room was awful !
Manager Response: Dear Eline,  I sincerely apologize that you were not satisfied with the room you were given. I am not sure if you told the front desk about the room. Had you mentioned we would have given you another room to your satisfaction. I hope you will give us another opportunity to better serve you in the future.  Sincerely,  Franciscu Silva

Summary Heading: Clean with friendly staff. Close to expressway but not...
Summary: Clean with friendly staff. Close to expressway but not bothered by the noise. Good wifi. Good value. Breakfast was limited. Only went once. Would return.
Manager Response: Dear Vacationhound_8,  We greatly appreciate your review. I will let the staff know that they were mentioned in your review. Look forward to welcome you soon.  Sincerely,  Franciscu Silva

Summary: Do NOT RECOMMEND FOR ANY REASON !!! When went to site it stated you did not have to give CC # to hold room . I got a call from "Manager" to call with card or room would be given away. Called back was told they charge 1st night. Ok, whatever. So carged 1st night. Then get there and they charge 2nd night and a $50 charge for a "INCIDENTAL" deposit. Ok. 242 total between 2 charges. Once again whatever. Then when we checked out got receipt and it states 192.42 and that 50 was given back. NOT! Not only are the first two charges still on card but they have since authorized another 242 and change. UNACCEPTABLE! None of the other hotels i have stayed at have done this. Definitely not worth the money or MY time to get this straightened out. WILL USE ANOTHER CHAIN FROM NOW ON.
Manager Response: Dear Melissa,  I apologize for the inconvenience caused due to your credit card being authorized multiple times. It was a system error which resulted the multiple authorizations. I hope you will give us another opportunity to better serve you in the near future.  Sincerely,  Franciscu Silva

Summary: Spent the night after a day at Knott's Berry Farm.  The suite was very nice and fit our needs.  The staff was very helpful.
Manager Response: Dear Fred,  Thank you for your review and I am glad to hear that you enjoyed your stay.   We look forward to welcome you soon.  Sincerely,  Franciscu Silva

Summary: I booked this hotel thinking it would be a great place for my husband and kids to stay during their vacation to Disneyland and the beach....boy was I WRONG! The first night was ok, second night, 2am on Sunday morning, I get a phone call from my husband saying that the front desk was accusing him of banging on other rooms doors and that he was carving swasticas on the doors that he was to pack his things,and get out of there! My husband said he had no idea what they were talking about and if they didn't stop calling his room he was going to call the police. My husband then hung up and called the front desk where they advised they did not call his room nor have any complaints that night. The calls continued and the last straw was when the man on the phone talked about our teenaged
Manager Response: Dear Cbasulto,  I apologize for the inconvenience you went through and you are very well aware that I called you back the moment I got your voice mail and I left you a voice mail since you were not able to get to your phone. Then you had called me back when I was not in my office and I returned the call again to the number you left for me and that number you provided did not have an option for me to leave a voice mail. So I called your husband's phone and left a voice mail. Unfortunately we were playing phone tag. My apologies that we were not able get hold of each other.   Our front office staff is trained not to give out room numbers or to even say it out loud. But I will check if any of the staff did give out the room number your family was in. With regards to the incident you mentioned we are unable to control the calls that goes through to the rooms directly. Like many other hotels outsiders have the option to dial a room number without going through the operator. The front office agent who worked the night shift informed me that the police was called and the police is aware of the incident.   Once again, I sincerely apologize for the inconvenience.   Cordially,  Franciscu Silva

Summary: Great place to stay with close access to the highway and disneyland. Check in/check out was very easy and the hotel was very helpful in giving you the room you wanted. The only problem I really had was that the door had to be slammed shut or it would open back up. Other then that the stay was great. The breakfast was always stocked though during the busy hours around 8 am there isnt any seating since there are only about 5 tables with 2 chairs each. Also, the food selection was slim. For the cost and location it is a great place to stay!
Manager Response: Dear Kacie,  Thank you for your review and I am glad that you enjoyed your stay with us. I will let our maintenance staff know about the door issue you mentioned.   We look forward to welcome you soon.  Sincerely,  Franciscu Silva

Summary: The front desk staffs were nice and friendly , the location was very convenient, Target, restaurants and freeway entrance right there. However, the cleanliness of the room should be improved by a lot. Some of towels did not look clean , hairs on all the pillow cases,  my son got bites on his back and ankles and not enough plugs near the TV and refrigerator. If you want to use the fridge, unplug the microwave.
Manager Response: Dear Darian,  Thank you for your review. I will let the front desk staff know that they were mentioned in your review. I apologize that you didn't find the room was not clean. I will let our housekeeping manager know to make sure that she double check the rooms after they are cleaned.  I hope you will give us another opportunity to better serve you in the near future.   Sincerely,  Franciscu Silva

Summary Heading: Was treated very well, staff and management was extremely...
Summary: Was treated very well, staff and management was extremely friendly and welcoming ;) Had some problem with my car and management was very helpful .
Manager Response: Dear Melisa,  It was our pleasure to assist you and thank you for your review. We try our best to provide exceptional service and glad that you were able to experience it.  Look forward to welcome you in the foreseen future.  Sincerely,  Franciscu Silva

Summary Heading: You get what you pay for
Summary: We usually try to stay at Marriott/Hilton properties but most of the hotel searches in the Buena Park/Anaheim area turned up quite expensive ($129+) for our tastes.  This Days Inn had a great rate online ($73.99 per night) and I was hesitant to book it but thought since our family would be spending most of the day at the local parks, it shouldn't be too bad. I was also hesitant because we never stay at Days Inn but thought they should be decent enough since they're with Wyndham Rewards.  My first impression when I walked into the room (2 queen non-smoking) was the unpleasant smell.  I concluded after 3 nights it might have been a moldy smell from the a/c unit.  Second impression was anything that was electrical in the room was unplugged.  I guess that's a money saving strategy
Manager Response: Dear Kyushujet,  I sincerely apologize for the unpleasant stay you had with us. I am not sure if you informed our front office staff about the electrical wires. Had you we would have sent our maintenance staff to look into it.  I will be talking to our housekeeping manager with regards to the general cleanliness of the room you mentioned. Once again I apologize and I hope that you will give us another opportunity to better serve you in the near future.  Thank you,  Franciscu Silva

Summary: Put in reservations 3 weeks a head of time did not accommodate them. Sink in first room leaked soaked my husbands clothes had to buy new ones. Finally moved my room after to days of that. None of the microwaves or hair dryers worked in either room and for 4 out of six days I stayed the cable was out. Very unhappy and I stayed there all the time. I will never go back again.
Manager Response: Dear Kimberly,  Thank you for your review. I apologize for the inconvenience caused during your stay. The cable TV issue was out of our control since the cable company had to do some upgrades since they had to change their signals to all digital. However, once again I apologize for the unpleasant stay you experienced with us. I truly hope you will give us another opportunity to better serve you in the near future.  Sincerely,  Franciscu Silva

Summary Heading: Not Returning to this Hotel ever
Summary: Upon check in I asked if i could check in early and then they wanted to charge me 25.00 extra. I said no i will come back. Then she said 15.00.. I told her i was a Wyndham rewards customer and never had been charged for this. Then she said oh ok .. Thinking she was trying to make some extra money on the side. Then i had to pay a 50.00 cash deposit because i wanted to pay with my debit card. This made me very upset. Why is a debit card not any good.. she stated oh we need a credit card That i booked the room with. I said no i wanted to pay with my debit card from my credit union. This has just made me never want to stay here ever again. Then she stated oh i gave you a very nice room. I had NO towels or a shower curtain. The sheets had hair on them. The out lets were very
Manager Response: Dear Kimberly,  Thank you for your review. We generally charge an early check-in fee depending what time it is that a guest comes to check-in. I would like to let you know that the agent who was assisting you was not trying to make any money on the side. She was doing her duty. Also,we require a $50 deposit from all of our guest and we do accept all major credit cards and cash. I apologize for the confusion regards to the deposit. I will be looking into the other issues you mentioned to make sure it doesn't happen again.   I sincerely hope you will give us another opportunity to better serve you in the near future.  Sincerely,  Franciscu Silva

Summary Heading: days in my hotel room was not ready, I paid in cash and they charged me three times on my credit card
Summary: When I arrived at theorem rooms were not ready. I was over charged and then when I paid in cash they still charged my credit card three times making it extra. I paid 302.00 in cash and then he charged my card 230.00. I would not return to the days in Buena Park again
Manager Response: Dear Angela,  I apologize for the inconvenience caused by the payments. Your credit card was authorized and has been released now. If you would like please call me and I will be more than happy to go over any overage if there is any.   I truly hope you will give us another opportunity to better serve you in the near future.   Sincerely,  Franciscu Silva

Summary: The hotel is in bad need of a make over. Old bedding with cigarette holes burned in, teenagers jumping from the 2nd floor over the railing into the pool and noise that kept us up. Uncomfortable beds, air conditions that didn't work properly and water that trickles so showers are not fun. Who paints a plastic shower/tub enclosure! The paint is peeling off the drain, and so much hair in the drain that it took over 10 minutes for bath water to go down the drain. Breakfast is a joke. 2 cold cereals to choose from and muffins doesn't make a breakfast.
Manager Response: Dear Dana,  I apologize that you didn't have a great stay with us. I am not sure if it is possible for anyone to jump from the second floor into the pool. However, I will let all my staff know to keep an eye for any activity of that sort from happening in the future. I will also let the maintenance staff know to take look at the bath tub.   I hope you will give us another opportunity to better serve you in the future.   Sincerely,  Franciscu Silva

Summary: Nice stay clean rooms nice folks at front desk good continental breakfast pool clean the only thing the pool furniture was dirty and tables by the pool but over all great stay1
Manager Response: Dear Eva,  Thank you for your review and I am glad to hear that you enjoyed your stay with us. We look forward to welcome you soon  Sincerely,  Francsicu Silva

Summary: Overall, room didn't seem dirty, but sheets were dirty.  Did not bother asking they be changed, since it was late & had already taken 15 - 20 minutes to check-in, with only 2 people ahead of me.  Could hear people walking & talking (in normal volumes) outside room.  Electrical outlets were scarce & awkwardly placed.  Killed a few gnats in the room.  Wasn't the worst room I've ever stayed in, but not returning.
Manager Response: Dear Carmelle,  Please accept my sincere apologies. We would have certainly sent you new sheets had you informed the front desk upon finding out the sheets were not clean. I will let the housekeeping manager know about your review to make sure this will not happen again in the future.   I hope you will give us another opportunity to better serve you soon.   Sincerely,  Franciscu Silva

Summary: Stayed here due to the location and price. We were given a room away from the pool and general area. At first, I was a bit upset since I had to walk with luggage a way, but after the music started at the Middle Eastern restaurant next door, I was glad I was so far away.
Manager Response: Dear Fernando,  Thank you for your review and I am glad that you enjoyed your stay with us.  Sincerely,  Franciscu Silva

Summary: great stay love it there big rooms, and very peaceful. only bad thing i have to say is that the maid serves knock on your door even with the do not disturber sign on the door. but other then that great! will go their again.
Manager Response: Dear Dianne,  Thank you for your review. I apologize about the maid who disturbed you when you had the do no disturb sign. I have spoken to the head housekeeper with regards to this issue. We look forward to welcome you soon.  Sincerely,  Franciscu Silva

Summary Heading: Nice property, nice staff, nice location. Breakfasts are...
Summary: Nice property, nice staff, nice location. Breakfasts are free for alls that need staff supervision. Wi Fi is very slow. Room lights and t.v. were on timers that required turning back on.
Manager Response: Dear Larry,  Thank you for your review. I will let the staff know that their service was praised by you. We look forward to welcome you soon.   Sincerely,  Franciscu Silva

Summary Heading: Rooms are ok for prices offered. I guess what more can you...
Summary: Rooms are ok for prices offered. I guess what more can you expect from the days inn. Parking is horrible.
Manager Response: Dear Jasmine,  Thank you for your review and we look forward to welcome you soon.  Sincerely,  Franciscu Silva

Summary: Although this seems to be an older property, it is new to the Days Inn family.  I stayed for a total of 7 nights with only 1 night of noise, even though it is right next to a busy freeway.   The property is currenty undergoing an extensive remodel. During my stay the hot tub was resurfaced, one half of the parking area was resealed and stripped, and I saw several rooms receiving new mattresses. So, don't let the age of the exterior or the lobby fool you.  They are working hard to update the facilities.    My room was always properly cleaned and maintained during my stay.   Only a few things were questionable but not of extreme importance to me.  The alarm clock was positioned between the beds, but not plugged in and no outlet was available to plug it into.  And like many other
Manager Response: Dear James,  Thank you very much for your in detail review. I apologize for the inconvenience caused by the laundry room hours. Sometimes we make exceptions for guests to use the laundry facility until about 10:30PM if they request. Yes, we just completed re-plastering the hot tub, seal coating the entire parking lot and getting brand new pillow top mattresses to all the rooms.    We look forward to welcome you again in the near future.   Sincerely,  Franciscu Silva

Summary Heading: Staff was friendly, room was clean, the sink and bathtub...
Summary: Staff was friendly, room was clean, the sink and bathtub drained extremely slow, and the jacuzzi was brown and disgusting looking, the breakfast was good but they need to stay on top of refilling the pastries and muffins because the guests grab 3 or 4 at a time and it runs out quick
Manager Response: Dear Amy,  Thank you for your review. I hope you called the front desk to let us know about the issue you had with the sink during your stay. We are in the process of renovating the hot tub and it should be completed within the next two weeks. I will make sure to let our server know to refill the breakfast items constantly.  We look forward to welcome you soon.  Sincerely,  Franciscu Silva

Summary: They were re-paving the parking lot and they changed out the mattresses in the rooms. Also, the spa is being re-plastered which it sorely needed. The front desk personnel were always attentive and cordial. As I use this hotel for business purposes I would like a more consistent and speedy internet connection. The internet is not just a nice thing to have anymore - it is a necessity. Over all this is a great place to stay for the value.
Manager Response: Dear Dennis,  Thank you for your review. The re-paving of the parking lot is completed now and the spa will be completed within the next few days. I will let our IT staff know about the consistency and the speed of out internet connection and hopefully he will be able to find a solution for the speed.   Once again, thank you for your review and we look forward to welcome you.   Sincerely,  Franciscu Silva

Summary: Descent rooms. Working on parking lot during our stay. Looked like some rooms were getting new mattresses. Close to Knotts Berry Farm. Reasonable room rates.
Manager Response: Dear Julie,  Thank you for your review. Yes, we are in the process of getting brand new mattresses to all of the rooms! Also, I apologize for any inconvenience caused due to seal coating our parking lot during your stay.   We look forward to welcome you soon.  Sincerely,  Franciscu Silva

Summary: Stayed 2 nights on a very busy holiday weekend. For the price, quality was good and bed was very comfortable. I will for sure stay there again.
Manager Response: Dear Jeremy,  Thank you for your review and I am glad to hear that you enjoyed your stay with us and we certainly look forward to welcome you soon.  Sincerely,  Franciscu Silva

Summary: no waffle egg sausage bfast just conti, no free early check in - $15 for 2h early, $25 for 2+h early
Manager Response: Dear David,  Thank you for your review and I apologize that you were not satisfied with our breakfast menu. Free early check-in is provided depending on what time guests arrive. If it is very early yes, we do have a fee for early check-in.    We look forward to welcome you soon.  Sincerely,  Franciscu Silva

Summary: Your facility was clean and quiet.  The staff was most helpful, polite, and welcoming.  The room was clean and comfortable, and even though it was next to the freeway, it was VERY quiet in the room!  We enjoyed our stay and plan to return again soon!
Manager Response: Dear Ljknb,  Thank you so much for your positive review and I am glad to hear that you enjoyed your stay with us and we look forward to welcome you soon.   Sincerely,  Franciscu Silva

Summary: Guest rooms on bottom floor are not sound proofed. Any little noise or sound outside can be heard within the room. Other than that, the room was clean and the price was right.
Manager Response: Dear Ricky,  Thank you for your review and for staying with us. I apologize about the noise you had to experience. Next time I suggest you request for a room on a higher floor to eliminate any noise.  Look forward to welcome you soon.  Sincerely,  Franciscu Silva

Summary: Just down the street from Knots Barry Farm. If you can get the rooms for $50.00 range. This is an excellent price for this hotel. Visit savingsbiz  for discounted rates. Don't waste your $ if they want $70.00 Or more. To many other nicer hotels for that price.
Manager Response: Dear Patrick,  Thank you for your review. We always strive to give the best deal for our valued guests and I am glad you were able to make use of the good deals we provide.  Look forward to welcome you soon.  Sincerely,  Franciscu Silva

Summary Heading: Room was clean and had a lot of little amenities...
Summary: Room was clean and had a lot of little amenities (hairdryer, fridge, microwave, etc.) however as a senior citizen it was right next to a noisy freeway.  Would have preferred a room in another part of the building.
Manager Response: Dear Carolyn,  Thank you for your review and I am glad to hear that you enjoyed the little amenities we provide. Next time I encourage you to let our front desk staff know if you are not comfortable with the room provided so we can offer a room to your satisfaction.   Look forward to welcome you soon.  Sincerely,  Franciscu Silva

Summary: We had to wait for our room while it was being cleaned, and was left with a bleach smell.  After that smell wore out, we noticed a very strong smoke odor.  Reported to the staff in lobby; they apologized but didn't offer solution.
Manager Response: Dear Roger,  I apologize that you had to wait while the room was serviced and I will be checking with the front desk agent why she/he did not offer to move your room.  I hope this incident will not stop you from giving us another opportunity to better serve you in the future and we look forward to welcome you soon.  Sincerely,

Summary: We had 2 rooms.  Both rooms were clean and looked nice.  The lobby was inviting and check in was very easy.  All employees were attentive and helpful.  I will definitely stay here again.
Manager Response: Dear Pamella,  We greatly appreciate your review about our motel and I will let the staff know that they were mentioned in the review. Thank you for staying with us and we look forward to welcome you in the near future.   Sincerely,

Summary Heading: THE HOTEL WAS GOOD,THE STAFF OFFERED ME AN EXCELLENT...
Summary: The hotel was good,the staff offered me an excellent service, I like my staying at the hotel, I would recommend this hotel.
Manager Response: Dear Martha,  Thank you for your review and I will let the staff know that you praised them and we look forward to welcome you in the near future.   Sincerely,   Franciscu Silva

Summary Heading: This is a good hotel the pool is heated and the hot tub was...
Summary: This is a good hotel the pool is heated and the hot tub was good after a long day  Rooms were also good  They need better wifi have to leave room to get a connection
Manager Response: Dear Greg,  Thank you for your positive review. I will let our IT department know about the wifi issue you had. We look forward to welcome you in the near future.   Sincerely,  Franciscu Silva

Summary Heading: There wre roaches in the room I was assigned (first floor...
Summary: There wre roaches in the room I was assigned (first floor), but was switched once I went down to the front desk and complained.
Manager Response: Dear Maria,  I sincerely apologize about the issue you had with the room you were assigned initially and I am glad that we were able to move your room to better accommodate you. We have notified the pest controlling company we work with to check the room and they will be looking into the issue.   We look forward to welcome you again in the near future.   Thank you,  Franciscu Silva

Summary Heading: I loved the price of rooms, but it seemed a little...
Summary: I loved the price of rooms, but it seemed a little outdated. The TV didn't function properly. The lock on door was falling apart. There was no fridge or microwave.
Manager Response: Dear Bell,  Thank you for your review. I am not sure if you informed our front desk about the issue you had with the television.  If you did we would have moved your room or replaced the unit. Not all the rooms are equipped with fridges and microwaves. They can be provided upon request depending on our availability.   We look forward to better serve you in the near future.  Sincerely, Franciscu Silva

Summary: My wife and I recently booked a 4 night stay at this location.  We were pleased with our time there and it was what we expected.  There were no surprises.  The room was clean and maintained.  I was advised to book a room on the side opposite of the freeway for a quieter stay.  We never had noise issues and therefore got a good night's rest each night we were there.  The location was great.  There are plenty of places to eat and there is a Target conveniently located within walking distance.  Disneyland is about a 15 min drive from this hotel.  All the places we visited were about a 30 - 40 min drive from our hotel.  All in all, it was a pleasant stay and was the best bang for our buck.  While it may not be as nice as 4 or 5 star hotel, it will serve the same purpose which for
Manager Response: Dear Yong,  I am pleased to hear that you got what you expected. We do our best to keep all the rooms well maintained and clean at all times. Thank you for your positive review and we look forward to welcome you soon.   Sincerely, Franciscu Silva

Summary: The hotel building from outside looks good, even lobby but inside the rooms very dirty, old linens&towels . The beds not comfortable , old style TV look like cheap motels and over price just because of the location. The balcony outside the rooms is not safe for the kids. Be aware! Total Rip off.
Manager Response: Dear Crest92501,  Thank you for your review. I am sorry to hear that you did not enjoy your stay with us. I am not sure if you informed our guest services agents about the beds. If you had they would have moved you to a room of your preference.   I hope you will give us another opportunity to better serve you in the near future.   Sincerely, Franciscu Silva

Summary: The staff was friendly, the location absolutely ideal, and it was a great deal for the money.  I would definitely return and ask for the same type of room.
Manager Response: Dear Jacquelin,  I am delighted to hear that you enjoyed our competitive rates during your stay. Reviews like yours help us better our service and it gives a boost to all our employees.   Feel free to contact us directly when you plan to visit again.   Sincerely, Franciscu Silva

Summary: Great staff Great location  lots of restaurants in walking distance clean swimming pool  Clean bathrooms and rooms the price is right
Manager Response: Dear George,  Thank you for your review. I am delighted that you enjoyed your stay with us and we look forward to welcome you soon. Please feel free to contact me  when you plan to visit us again.  Sincerely,  Franciscu Silva

Summary: My family and I went to Disneyland for 3 days and we picked his motel because it is only a 5-10 minute drive and because it is way more affordable that staying near Disneyland. This of course is if you have a car and a parking pass.  We had 3 rooms(327, 328 & 330). All were clean and comfortable. Beds were easy to sleep in. Walls are a little thin but not to the point of being bothered. The carpets are clean, the showers are warm and everything they offered in room worked. Nice to have a fridge and microwave for left overs.   The pool is big and the water was warm. Other guests were out using it late and they were pleased with the heat as well.   Plenty of parking. Target, Wendy's, and Black Angus are all in the same parking lot. A lot of other places close by as well. Easy
Manager Response: Dear vacationsalot,  We greatly appreciate your detailed feedback about our property and I will let my team know that their service was appreciated by you. We continuously strive to offer very competitive rates so everyone can enjoy our great service.   We look forward to welcome you and your family in the foreseen future. Please feel free to contact me if you need assistance planning your next visit to our location.   Sincerely,

Summary: This was a one night lay over for our family needing 3 rooms - the 2 room & 2 bath suite was great for a family of 6 - the 2 queen beds had no coffee maker for an evening relaxing coffee and the breakfast hours were way too short - would have liked extended to al least 10:00 am and the variety of items available were very limited
Manager Response: Dear Fallywall,  Thank you for the review and I am pleased to hear that you and your family enjoyed our suite. I apologize that there was no coffee maker in the second room. If you had requested for a coffee maker from our front desk staff we would have sent one to your room. I will discuss about the breakfast hours and the items offered with the ownership to possibly see if we could do some changes.   Sincerely, Franciscu Silva

Summary Heading: Extremely unhappy with the service. My family and I checked...
Summary: Extremely unhappy with the service. My family and I checked in after our visit to Disneyland. There was a 30 minute wait with only ONE person at the front desk. I was then told that there was going to be an additional $50.00 fee that would be on hold as a security deposit. The representative at the front desk said in her exact words "There will be a hold but no charges will apply." I checked my bank account the next day not only to find that the $50.00 was indeed charged but also a duplicate charge was made on my card for my ONE NIGHT STAY at your hotel. I called to have them reverse my fees which was Saturday. It is now 4:40pm on Monday March 31, 2014 and the fees are still taken off and my money has not been returned to me. The room had a horrible smell. The outlets did not
Manager Response: Dear Yong,  Please accept my sincere apologies for issues which took place during your stay. Please feel free to contact me if you would like to address the issues with me personally and I'll be more than happy to assist you.  Thank you,  Franciscu Silva

Summary: Beds were like sleeping on soggy cardboard with rocks under it. Room service wouldn't bring a towel to your room you had to go get one. Bathrooms feel dirty inside. Breakfast is awful (typical continental) staff was snotty in regards to Expedia.
Manager Response: Dear Jon,  Thank you for your review. I will be personally looking into the room you were in to inspect the beds. We are a limited service motel hence we don't offer have room service. However, thank you for letting us know about your experience and we hope you will give us another chance to better serve you in the future.   Sincerely,

Summary: This hotel was difficult to enter, and little signage indicating direction.  There was NO Wi-Fi available, for the 3 1/2 days I stayed, even though Wi-Fi was promised. Hotel staff could not establish any connection, even though I asked the front desk several times. Each person I spoke with seemingly had more important things to do, rather than solve this problem.
Manager Response: Dear Alan,  I sincerely apologize that you were not able to access our free wifi and the for the fact that the issue was not able to resolve during your stay.  I will let our IT manager know about the issue you experienced.   Thank you,

Summary Heading: The beds & pillows were very uncomfortable & the AC unit...
Summary: The beds & pillows were very uncomfortable & the AC unit was too loud. It worked great but too loud.
Manager Response: Dear Tracy,  Thank you for the review. I apologize that the beds and the pillows in the room you were in was uncomfortable. If you had informed the front desk the staff would have been more than happy to move you to another room. I will let the maintenance department know to check the A/C.  We look forward to welcome you soon!  Sincerely,

Summary: The room was good and the hotel staff were nice.  The only thing that I didn't like too much was the noise from the freeway.  It wasn't too loud and I slept just fine but it was noticeable.
Manager Response: Dear Jennifer,  Thank you for taking the time to write a review about Days Inn Buena Park. I am glad to hear that you enjoyed your stay with us and I will let my team know that you mentioned about them. Next time let us know if the room is too loud and we can move you to another room depending on our availability.   Sincerely,  Franciscu Silva

Summary Heading: The rooms are nice and clean. The only problem we had was...
Summary: The rooms are nice and clean. The only problem we had was the maid knocking on the door with our privacy sign on. Parking was a problem due to someone not knowing how to evenly paint the lines.
Manager Response: Dear Lisa,  Thank you for staying at Days Inn Buena Park and I am sorry that the maid disturbed you while the sign said not to.
