I will make sure that all the maids pay attention to details. I am glad that you like our rooms and we look forward to welcome you in the near future.   Sincerely,

Summary Heading: Pro: Close to knotts berry farm.  Price is reasonable only...
Summary: Pro: Close to knotts berry farm.  Price is reasonable only when you get a discount. Good internet connection Cons: we lost our new, sealed sunscreen spray when they cleaned our room while we're out. I went to the front desk to report the problem but heard no update or anything about our complain until we checked out.
Manager Response: Dear Maria,  I am glad that you were able to take advantage of our discounted rates. I apologize for that you didn't get an update from one of our team members about the item that you lost. I require some information from you so I can investigate about what happened to your sunscreen spray. Please contact me at a time convenient to you.  Sincerely, Franciscu Silva Operations Manager

Summary Heading: It was a difficult check-in process.  There was no iron and...
Summary: It was a difficult check-in process.  There was no iron and ironing board in the room.  The soda/water machine was out of order.  Cleanliness was very questionable.
Manager Response: none

Summary: Nice and clean, only stayed for one night but didn't experience any issues at all. Good price for the location.
Manager Response: Dear Margarita,  Thank you for your review and I am glad to hear that you had a good stay and we look forward to welcome you again.  Sincerely,

Summary: I stay here whenever I'll be working in this area.  It has good price rates, easy on - off the freeway. I've been in different rooms some are better than others, some don't have a fridge which I always want in a room if I'm staying several nights.  Nice staff at front desk. They got a heated pool. Next to freeway 91 and beach Boulevard which have heavy traffic. Breakfast consists of costco muffins,  cereal, fruit and coffee.
Manager Response: none

Summary: It's a great place to go for the quality and price. I'd recommend Days Inn Buena Park to anyone! The staff are friendly. You really can't beat free breakfast every morning + coffee!! They've got free wi-fi as well. If you stay on the top floor (4th) you get the best reception. Go!
Manager Response: none

Summary Heading: NOT A GOOD PLACE TO STAY IF TRAVELING WITH FAMILY
Summary: hotel next to a very loud restaurant& freeway, affordable but very dissapointing,do not recommend it
Manager Response: Thank you for staying at the Days Inn Buena Park during your recent visit to the area, and thank you for your feedback. Please take our apology for the noise from restaurant on your stay. We have been  always reported to the owner of restaurant if we find the loud issue and they always been good to control. Thank you again for choosing our property and thank you for your comments-we hope to see you again soon.

Summary: The room was comfy and cozy and the employees were really friendly. My mother statyed here after her home was burned. Love that they could have coffe all day long. Breakfast covered only lunch n dinner needed.
Manager Response: Thank you for selecting the Days Inn Buena Park and thank you for your wonderful review. We are glad to hear that you enjoyed your stay with us.Thank you for your continued feedback,as it helps us continue to provide the high level of service you deserve. Thank you again for choosing our property and hope to see you again soon.

Summary: Stayed here for 2 nights last weekend..The outside of the hotel didn,t look too good but when I got into my room it was great.Clean,comfy and the front desk was wonderful. Parking was good too& free. The only complaint was the noise by the freeway-but that was not the hotels fault.All and all it was good and would stay here again.
Manager Response: Thank you for choosing the Days Inn Buena Park and thank you for your wonderful review. We are glad hear that you enjoyed your stay with us and we hope to see you again on next year show.

Summary: It was a very clean con coney room, really big and very nice, near by all the areas we were moving back and forth, very close to the freeways, we had really good nights of sleep for a very good price. it went beyond our standards
Manager Response: Thank you for for selecting the Days Inn Buena Park and thank you for your wonderful review. We are glad to hear that you enjoyed your stay with us. As always we value your feedback and are very happy with the compliments you have about our property. Thank you once again for the wonderful review and hope to see you soon.

Summary: Had a great stay. Location is great, a little freeway noise on the backside of the property, but otherwise great.
Manager Response: Thank you for staying at the Days Inn Buena Park during your recent visit to the area, and thank you for your wonderful review. We are delighted to hear that you enjoyed your stay with us. Thank you again for choosing our property and we hope to see you soon.

Summary: Room was clean. Bed was so so. Towels were soft. Pool was nice. Spa was hot and working. Breakfast is not diabetic friendly. At least have some hard boiled eggs or something. The girl at the front desk was very nice. Girl at the breakfast area didn't smile for anything. I kept trying to get her to smile but couldn't. Hotel is right next to on ramp. They had double windows and I didn't even notice any outside noise.
Manager Response: Thank you for selecting the Days Inn Buena Park and thank you for your wonderful review.  Thank you for your detailed feedback and nice compliment of our front desk staff. I will pass on your feed backs to our staffs to improve the high level of service you deserve. Thank you again for choosing our property ,we look forward to your next stay.

Summary Heading: Entrance is a little confusing as hotel is set back from...
Summary: Entrance is a little confusing as hotel is set back from street and freeway entrance is next door,   which is both good  and bad.. You don't want to wander onto freeway by mistake,  but its great to get to from freeway or if you want to use freeway.
Manager Response: Thank you for staying at the Days Inn Buena Park and thank you for your nice feedback. As Mentioned, finding the entrance is a little confusing but if you find the Target shopping center then it is easy to find. We use same parking area with the Target. We are so sorry about the noise from the freeway. Once again, thank you for selecting our property and hope to see you soon.

Summary: We stayed just before Christmas.  The staff was very nice.  The breakfast was very nice. The lobby and breakfast area was nice.  However, we had a room facing the freeway and the door didn't seal very well, so we had very loud traffic noises the whole time. I think it was as clean as it could be. The room was in desperate need of a renovation.  It may have been a totally different experience if we didn't feel like the door wasn't latched and we didn't have to listen to the freeway the whole time.  I think if that were the case, I would have given a higher rating.
Manager Response: Thank you for staying at the Days Inn Buena Park during your recent visit to the area, and thank  you for your feedback. As far as the door latch issue that you have mentioned, we will take care of it in a timely manner.Once again, thank you for your continued feedback, and we hope to see you soon.    Best regard,

Summary Heading: The Best Room We Have Had
Summary: My family and I come to your hotel once a month for an overnight stay. This was the best room we have had. No traffic noise from the freeway and the shower was comfortable and relaxing. Your staff are always kind and friendly. Eric greeted by name when I checked out in the morning. Ricardo and Judy are two of the most kind people in your employ. They are assests to your hotel and make my family want to stay more. Thank you for your wonderful service and see you next month.
Manager Response: Thank you for selecting the Days Inn Buena Park.  We are delighted to hear with the compliments you have about our front desk staffs. Thank you very much for your wonderful review and thank you again for choosing Days Inn -we hope to see you again soon.

Summary: This review was difficult to write because the staff are so super friendly and helpful, more than any hotel I've ever visited.  But the hotel itself is in desperate need of attention.  Everything was extremely outdated and in disrepair.  Our room had a very strong smoke smell, there was gang graffiti on the furniture, wiring hanging from the walls, torn bedding, and no appliances (although they offer to sell you a coffee maker).  We were left two towels for four people, and had to go ask for toilet paper and a remote control because our room had neither.  The place was dusty, and there was sticky goo on every counter.  There was a gnarly buildup of dust & webs in the vents, and the outdated sprinkler system was hanging broken from the wall.  To end on a good note, they do have
Manager Response: Thank you for selecting the Days Inn Buena Park and thank you for your detailed review on our property.  Thank you for your continued feedback , as it helps us continue to provide the high level of service you deserve. Thank you once again for the wonderful review you have on our staffs and we hope we can be your place of stay during your future trip to the area.

Summary Heading: The location which is too closed to the freeway is a...
Summary: The location which is too closed to the freeway is a disadvantage because you are there to sleep and it was so loud that you cannot get a goodnight sleep, the bedsheets have holes and need to be replaced, the water faucets in the bathroom is hard to turn on and the room smells smoke even though we have a non smoking room but the lady in front desk when I checked out was helpful and did not give me a hard time when I cancelled my two more nights of stay.  The price is good so if you do not want to spend too much and you do not care about the noise and the smoky smell I guess it is ok.
Manager Response: Thank you for selecting the Days Inn Buena Park and thank you for your comments on your stay. We are sorry to hear the noise from the freeway and other comment on your room. We will make sure we take care of your concerns. Thank you again for choosing our property -we hope to see you again soon.

Summary Heading: This Days Inn at Buena Park, CA was average. The rooms were...
Summary: This Days Inn at Buena Park, CA was average. The rooms were average. I was not pleased with lighting. Also the A/C made a rattling noise because of which I could not sleep properly. The window had only one think curtain and no panels, so you could not leave the curtains open to let the sunshine come through. The breakfast area is quite small and on all mornings guests were jostling for space. The reception area has been divided diagonally to make the reception and breakfast area and in the process, the triangle of the breakfast area is quite small. Otherwise this place is value for money, being close to Target, Wendys, Dennys, etc.
Manager Response: Thank you for staying at the Days Inn Buena Park and thank you for your detailed feedback. We are sorry we fell short of meeting your  expectations during your stay: we will do our best to make sure your concerns are addressed in a timely manner. Once again, thank you again for choosing our hotel and thank you for your comments- we hope to see you again soon.

Summary: Before making our reservation at this Days Inn we called the main number on the website to verify that the suite at this property was actually two separate rooms. We were told that it was. When checking in we were informed that the key system was down, and that we would have to come to the lobby to have someone let us into our room each time. When we were escorted to our room we realized that it was not two separate rooms, and that they do not have suites that are separated. We made do, but with a teenage boy and a toddler this was really not the setup that we had planned on. I would not have paid the extra money for this room had I known it was just one larger room. Also, the refrigerator in the room did not work. We informed the staff; however due to our daughters nap time,
Manager Response: Thank you for selecting the Days Inn Buena Park for your last visit to the area and thank you for your nice review.  Please take my apology for  wrong  description of our suite room from our reservation center.  Thank you once again for the nice comment on our front desk staff and we hope to see you soon.

Summary: Fine if you only need a bed and shower or are on a budget.  Rooms were mostly clean but carpets and bedspread dirty/old.  Shower difficult to operate/get working. Other cosmetic issues with bathroom tiles not really important.  No heater (or at least I could not find it). Was a bit cold. Only two towels for three people.  Overall not great, but ok for only needing a bed for 8 hours and a shower.
Manager Response: Thank you for staying at the Days Inn Buena Park and thank you for your feedback. We are sorry to hear some issues on your stay. Our front desk opens 24 hours a day to assist some of your issues that you had on your stay. Thank you again for the feedback, as it is greatly appreciate it.

Summary Heading: The hotel staff was great, the location is a few miles from...
Summary: The hotel staff was great, the location is a few miles from Disneyland. The building need a makeover to compete.
Manager Response: Thank you for choosing the Days Inn Buena Park and thank you for your nice review. We have been working on the property improvement such as new carpet,new bathtubs and so on. We will continuously work to improve to service our guests. Once again, thank you for your staying and hope to see you soon.

Summary Heading: do not go to this hotel
Summary: you get what you pay for...  The owner informed us that the card keys did not work, and that one of the workers would open our room as needed.  Then the phone did not work well either.  Our room was on the first floor, and so there was noise from the parking lot as well as from the nearby freeway.  We did not feel secure, and will not be returning.
Manager Response: Thank you for choosing the Days Inn Buena Park and please take our apology of your stay. We will do our best to make sure yours concerns are addressed in a timely manner. Thank you again for the feedback, as it is greatly appreciated it.

Summary: The room was clean and did not smell of smoke. I enjoyed that aspect of it. What I didn't like was the fact that i was doubled billed. I really didn't appreciate that. When checking out the guy at the front desk didn't seem to care about whether we were comfortable or not. Otherwise it was ok.  I didn't like the fact room keys were not available. We wanted to go out but didn't wanted to be escorted back and forth like kids
Manager Response: Thank you for choosing the Days Inn Buena Park for your recent visit to the area and thank you for your wonderful review. We are sorry we fell short of meeting your expectations during your stay: we will make sure to address staff about their customer service so this is not experienced again. Thank you again for your stay and your comments-we hope to see you again soon.

Summary: Apparently this property was a new acquisition for Days Inn. I'm not sure what stage of overhaul our room was in, but wow. There was graffiti carved into the walls and furniture, the desk lamp was plugged into an extension cord that was only sort of pushed into the floorboards, but the other end had nowhere to be plugged into. Same with the alarm clock, no outlet to plug it into, so it just sat useless on the night stand. The desk lamp was also broken, but since it wasn't actually plugged into anything, that didn't so much matter. The wall thermostat was broken and unusable. The lamps over the bed were ugly "cool white" fluorescents, I couldn't stand to have them on for more than a minute, but the rest of the room used "warm white" bulbs, much better. The paint looked fresh, the
Manager Response: Thank you for choosing the Days Inn Buena Park and thank you for your detailed review on our hotel. We are so sorry to hear our hotel did not meet the high level of customer service we strive for at Days Inn: we will do our best to make sure your issues are corrected in a timely manner. Thank you again to selecting our hotel and we hope to see you soon.

Summary: The door didn't shut all the way.  There was a crack in the sink.  The telephone buttons were missing and we tried calling the front desk and they couldn't hear us.  The toilet is too low.  The beds were comfy but the comforter had holes in it and there weren't enough pillows.  There weren't any tissues in the room or a coffee maker.  The breakfast hours weren't advertised and we missed it.  We just needed a bed for after Knott's and this worked but I'm not sure we'll stay again.
Manager Response: Thank you for staying at the Days Inn Buena Park during your recent visit to the area and thank you for your feedback. Thank you for providing us with a detailed review and please accept our apologies with your stay.  We will make sure we take care of those issues and addressed in a timely manner. Thank you again for your comments- we hope to see you again soon.

Summary: I was staying here for my grandmothers funeral when I was locked out my room for over an hour due to a hotel error. I was severely inconvenienced at an already difficult time. Not only this, but I was given terrible service and had to demand a discount when one wasn't offered to me. $15 for a $150 stay? Awful customer service. I won't be returning.
Manager Response: Thank you for choosing the Days Inn Buena Park  and thank you for your review. I'm so sorry about your grandma's passed away and please take my apology for our door lock problem. I do remember that incident and I am the one who has been helping you at that time. That incident did not last more than a thirty minutes and we did try to open the door as soon as possible. Once again, we do feel so sorry for the incident and thank you for staying with us.

Summary: Our experience (with 4 children) was good. For the price, we had a good stay. Right by target (you can walk) and down the street from Knottsberry and right off the freeway. I don't have anything bad to say. Our room was clean, no bugs. We swam in the pool and hot tub. It was fun. Thanks
Manager Response: Thank you for staying at the Days Inn Buena Park during your recent visit to the area, and thank you for your wonderful review.  We are glad to hear you enjoyed your stay at our hotel. Yes, we are right by  Target and one mile from Knottsberry Farm Amusement Park. Thank you again for choosing Days Inn and thank you for your comments,we hope to see you again soon.

Summary: The front desk lady was extremely nice. The pool and hot tub were clean and enjoyable. Out of coffee both times I went down to the lobby and no pots/coffee in the rooms (very disappointing).  The tub had damage and was dirty. Could not bath. The first night our supplies were ok. They left no towels or shampoo or soap for the second night. The location was great. The price was reasonable.
Manager Response: Thank  you for selecting the Days Inn Buena Park . As always we value your feedback and are very happy with the compliments  you have about our front desk staff,location and pool area. Please take my apologies with the issues of your last stay. We will once more train our team members in matters like the the one you had.  Once again, thank you for the wonderful review you have on our hotel and we hope we can see you soon.

Summary: My family and I enjoyed our stay. Room was clean, non smoking as I requested.  Walking distance to lots of stores, and places to eat.  Pool was clean, my kids loved it.  Continental breakfast was ok.  Beds are comfy.
Manager Response: We are glad to know that you enjoyed your stay at our Days Inn Buena Park. Thank you for your wonderful review and thank you for staying with us. Once again, thank you for your continued feedback, as it helps us continue to provide the high  level of service you deserve.  Best Regards,

Summary: Room was clean, price was great, staff was very friendly and accommodating. Common areas were not as clean and well maintained as the room. The property could use some investment and upgrades, but for the price it is a good deal.  I would stay here again.
Manager Response: Thank you for staying at the Days Inn Buena Park  during your recent visit to the area, and thank you for your wonderful feedback.  As mentioned about cleanliness of our common area I do apologize it. I will get my cleaning staffs to take care of this issue  which is very important to our hotel. Once again, thank you very much for the great compliments you have about our property.

Summary Heading: I like staying there its nice n clean.The desk clerks are...
Summary: I like staying there its nice n clean.The desk clerks are very courteous and whenever iam in town I normally stay.I love the location, it's close to everything
Manager Response: Thank you for staying at Days Inn Buena Park and thank you for your wonderful review. We are glad to hear you enjoyed our property. Thank you again for choosing Days Inn Buena Park, we hope to see you again soon.

Summary Heading: This is my first experience with this hotel in Las vegas...
Summary: This is my first experience with this hotel in Las vegas and Los Angeles, yes very good overall thanks.
Manager Response: Thank you for selection the Days Inn Buena Park. We are delighted to hear that you enjoyed your stay with us and thank you for your feedback.

Summary: Overnighted here for the second time in 2013, quick check in, quick check out, room was adequate, plenty of parking space and perfect location for me.
Manager Response: Thank you for staying  at the Days Inn Buena Park and thank you for your nice feedback. We hope to see you again soon.

Summary Heading: I was horrified with the hotel.  We reserved two rooms both...
Summary: I was horrified with the hotel.  We reserved two rooms both of which has roaches! There were big ones crawling on the table and counter of the rooms as well as baby ones in the bath room and around the sink.  Obviously we didn't want to have breakfast there since we were too grossed out. On top of the bugs one of the rooms smelled like cigarettes.
Manager Response: none

Summary: Room was clean, towels were a little threadbare and the bottom of the tub was peeling away. Pillows were really flat but we brought our own so we slept ok. Breakfast could have more options, since we needed tickets to get in we were expecting a little more but their coffee was good. A homeless man was picking thru the garbage can by the pool the morning we left.
Manager Response: Thank you for providing us with a detailed review on your stay at Days Inn Buena Park. We are glad to know that you enjoyed our coffee. We are working on a better items for our complimentary breakfast. As always we value your feedback and we hope to see you again.

Summary Heading: Friendly staffs and rooms where ok. Hotel is kind of old...
Summary: Friendly staffs and rooms where ok. Hotel is kind of old but could use a upgrade. The  room could use a fresh paint so it would be brighter, the only problem was the Air/heat wall unit did not turn On at all. Slept with window open facing halway....  Charged xtra $20.00 because I checked in at 12 noon. Maybe I should not have cheked in early and waited till close to 3pm since I went to lunch before going to the room. No coffee maker but has microwave and small frigi.
Manager Response: none

Summary Heading: Disappointing for a Usually Good Chain
Summary: Started with a room with no fridge (reservation specified a fridge for insulin storage for type 1 diabetic).  They moved me to another room that had two fridges (the one in the cabinet didn't work so they put another beside the cabinet) and the working one had a broken foot making the door difficult to open and use.  I dealt with it because the next option was to go to a room on the freeway side of the building. Next I attempted to call the desk for a pillow and found that the phone was completely dead.  I went to the front desk and requested that the repair be done on Thursday (the following day) as I would be out of the room for the majority of the day.  When I returned to the room on Thursday at 9:30pm they still had not fixed the phone and I went to the front desk about it.
Manager Response: Thank you for staying at the Days Inn Buena Park during your recent visit to the area,and please accept our apologies with your experiences here at Days Inn.We  will once more train our team members in matters like the one you had experienced. Thank you for your continued feedback,as it helps us continue to provide the high level of service you deserve. Best Regards,

Summary Heading: I would not stay here again.
Summary: There were small cockroaches in the bathroom area + another type of "small" bug on the nightstand.  When I called the front desk to ask them to contact the guests in the adjacent room with the load TV he suggested I dial their room number-I wanted to remain anonymous to avoid retailiation.   The AC unit did aid in drowning out the freeway noise and the TV noise to some degree.  The stairs and walkways were all filthy.  The "breakfast" didn't have any protein such as hard-boiled eggs.  The employee taking tickets didn't bother with sanitizing counters and tables.  The quality of muffins was extremely low.  Upon checking out, we told the clerk about the cockroaches and he said "oh, bed bugs?" not hearing us correctly.  This really had me wondering.
Manager Response: Thank you for providing us with a detailed review on your stay at Days Inn and please accept our apologies.  We always  under control of the issue that you had with bugs. We will not tolerate the issue and will continue to work  and prevent it happening again. For about the breakfast items,starting next year in April we are adding more healthier items to Days Inn breakfast.  Once again,thank you for your feedback.

Summary: was surprised with this property, Good value with a clean pool. The breakfast was average but it did the trick, found the wifi to be spotty in our room but stayed connected most of the time (room 332)for what we paid it was well worth the price, will return.
Manager Response: Thank you for choosing the Days Inn Buena Park during  your last stay and thank you for your nice feedback on our property. We are glad to know that you enjoyed your stay with us. We will continue to improve our complimentary breakfast selections and will work hard to keep a good value to our good customers. Once again, thank you for your comments and we hope to see you soon.  Best regard,

Summary Heading: Lots go bugs in the room, keys didn't work all the time had...
Summary: Lots go bugs in the room, keys didn't work all the time had to get 3 different sets of keys. Beds were hard and uncomfortable and the ac kept shutting off!!
Manager Response: none

Summary Heading: economic rates, good service and they always want to help...
Summary: economic rates, good service and they always want to help. we know the building is old but at least is always clean. close to everything.
Manager Response: Thank you for staying at the Days Inn Buena Park  with your recent visit to the area. We are glad to know that you enjoyed last stay with us and thank you for your wonderful reviews. As you mentioned about our old building,we will continue to improve and renovate our property. Once again, thank you for choosing Days Inn Buena Park, we look forward to your next stay.

Summary Heading: The discount given by Wyndham resort made this stay...
Summary: The discount given by Wyndham resort made this stay definitely worth a lot more than what  I've paid for. It saved me and my friends a lot of money, not just on the price of the stay, but also from the gas saved due its convenient location.  The place felt safe and clean, also very family friendly.  Wifi connection was excellent. Check out was a breeze and  allowed us ample time to make to the airport early.
Manager Response: Thank you for selecting the Days Inn Buena Park. We are delighted to hear that you enjoyed your stay with us and save your money on this trip. As always we value your feedback and are very happy with the compliments you have about our clean  room and convenient  location. We hope to see you again soon.

Summary: I had to keep going down to the front desk because the guest next door was smoking outside my door. Not acceptable, that I was asked to move to another room.
Manager Response: Thank you for staying at the Days Inn Buena Park during your recent visit, and thank you for your feedback.  Please accept our apologies with the smoking neighbor issue. Yes, we are non smoking hotel and no pets. As far as the smoking,that is not allowed in the property and our front 24 hour desk will always be there to help that kind issue. Once again, thank you selecting the Days Inn Buena Park.

Summary: I stayed here for 3 nights from Phoenix, AZ and loved it! I booked it at $40 a night and thinking it was just a room for the night I was impressed all the way.  The had a pool and hot tub that was great... Complimentary breakfast which is a great get-going snack for anyone watching their budget on a trip... a computer in the lobby w/ free internet (and they even printed off my Disneyland tickets behind the desk w/ no problem at all, nice!)... The room was SUPER quiet, the complex is a 4-story solid stone structure so I DIDN"T HEAR A PEEP from anyone around even though the hotel seemed to be quite booked... and my two queen beds were made every single day, even though I'm a late riser they would come back apparently sometime in the afternoon and fix up the room, I'm slightly
Manager Response: Thank you for staying at the Days Inn Buena Park during your recent visit to the area. We are glad to know that you enjoyed your stay here and thank you for the wonderful review you have on our hotel. Once again, thank you very much for the great compliments and we hope to see you again soon.

Summary: Basic, but clean and tidy.  The proximity to the highway was not noisy at all.  The breakfast is hyper-basic - just breads, coffee and orange juice.
Manager Response: Thank you for staying at the Days Inn  Buena Park during your recent visit to the area, and thank you for your feedback.  We hope to see you again soon.

Summary: My experience was not so good.  Although the beds were made the room received no attention whatsoever.. the floors weren't vacuumed, the trash wasn't emptied and any trash laying around (soda cans, pizza boxes, etc) was left just as it was.  Location for Knotts Berry Farm was satisfactory not too far away.  Although breakfast was offered each morning we didn't use that service, so I'm unable to rate that.
Manager Response: Thank you for providing us with a detailed review on your stay at Days Inn Buena Park. And please accept our apologies with the housekeeping issues while you were staying with us. One of our goals here at Days Inn is to have a clean room for our guests at all the time. We will once more train our team members in matters like the one you had. Thank you again for choosing Days Inn Buena Park.

Summary Heading: It was ok the only thing was Breakfast doesnot go late...
Summary: It was ok the only thing was Breakfast doesnot go late enough so we missed the times to early for late night Hours at disneyland and our door needed some repair had to slam it many times to get it shut so probly distrubed other put motel room was great and was quiet had a good nights sleep.
Manager Response: Thank you for your nice feed backs, I will make a suggestion to my owner for the hour 's of operation of our breakfast. Also, we will make sure to correct our maintenance issues. Once again, thank you for staying with us.

Summary Heading: Oh my goodness I have kids here
Summary: The stuff was fine and helpful.. The first room we had the shower just kind of drizzled. The next day I was moved to another room. Then the air Conditioner Hardly worked in the new room. They need to have security at this property do to the homeless problem on the outskirts of the building. And the breakfast is kind of a joke especially when they cut the muffins in half. The location was excellent. Hotel Needs a major update. I would not Choose to stay Again At this property. I Really hope all your properties Are not like this..
Manager Response: none

Summary: Very good  location also affordable for a family of four. We will come back next year close to amusement parks.
Manager Response: Thank you  for staying at the Days Inn Buena Park during your recent visit to the area,and thank you for your feedback. We look forward to your next stay.

Summary Heading: When i walked in something smelled old and rotten then i...
Summary: When i walked in something smelled old and rotten then i opened up the refridgerator door and it was coming from the fridge it wasnt pluged in and it took a while to get cold i had water and snacks i wanted to put in when i arrived. The next morning i went to get breakfeast down stairs and it was over crouded and had to wait in  a long line and they where runing out of food had to wait untill they brought more out
Manager Response: none

Summary: Very disappointed, will not return.  We had 4 families stay here and I was pretty embarassed I recommended.
Manager Response: none

Summary Heading: Not a very pleasant experience-very disappointed
Summary: Not a good review. Was very disappointed in the quality and customer service at this hotel.  Parking instructions was very bad. First night I parked outside of the hotel cause they did not say there was parking around the building,
Manager Response: none

Summary Heading: One of the better Days Inn of the area
Summary: We were surprised with the larger sized room, the cleanliness and the king sized bed quality for this Days Inn. Pool and hot tub descent with pool towels available for a change!!!! Breakfast was ok with the basics available, would stay at this hotel again.
Manager Response: We are glad to know that you enjoyed your stay at our Days inn Buena Park. As always we value your feedback and are very happy with the compliments you have about our clean and spacious rooms. Thank you once again for the wonderful reviews you have on our hotel and we hope to see you again.

Summary: We stayed here due to the convenient location to Knott's Berry Farm.  Plenty of restaurants around and across the parking from a Target.
Manager Response: none

Summary: The place looked like it needs a little pick me up. The rooms are old and the bathroom needed some update. Other then that it was ok.
Manager Response: none

Summary Heading: I had two rooms one for me and my associate. We did not...
Summary: I had two rooms one for me and my associate. We did not even spend the night. The rooms were very musty smelling and I had vomit on my carpet that was still moist and smelled. We were only there for five hours and after concluding our business in Buena Park we decided not to spend a uncomfortable night at this hotel. Upon leaving I asked the person at the front desk for a full refund but she said that was not possible. Thats fine there are many other brands that would like our future business.
Manager Response: none

Summary: Traveled along way for my daughter baby shower, after shower we arrived to room it smelled like chlorine, thought nothing of it. then we pulled the bed back and a strong smell of urine, went to office, they said sorry, but no other room, she talked with maintance man and started argueing with him in front of us, then said she would send us new sheets, and towels, she did 20 min later expecting us to change the bed we refused, then also realized the matress was still wet, again office called we tried to explain unexceptable, still they didnt change sheets or offer. Now she said she would switch us room were before said there wasnt one. Went from 2 queen to 1 king and rollaway, the room was fine the rollaway, would wish my worse enemy to sleep on. then we get up abt 11:00pm to buy
Manager Response: none

Summary Heading: Front desk could use a tune up
Summary: As far as the rooms? Immaculate. Plenty of room. Breakfast crowded but ok. I liked the pool location.  And the parking was great. It was surrounded by other businesses. So I felt safe as far as neighborhood.
Manager Response: none

Summary Heading: We had a suite with a king bed along with a sofa bed.  The...
Summary: We had a suite with a king bed along with a sofa bed.  The room was large and clean.  Our king bed was very comfortable, but the sofa bed was well worn as the mattress was caved in, but that is normal for sofa beds.  The staff was helpful, but the PM crew seemed better able to handle multiple customers.  The breakfast was very simple and the least favorable part of the stay.  I am glad it was a non-smoking motel, but people did smoke outside of the rooms close to the parking lot and that annoyed me.  We found it to be a safe area and very convenient to Knotts Berry Farm.  It was also nice to be close to restaurants and Target in the same parking lot.  We would probably stay here again.
Manager Response: none

Summary Heading: Good spot if you are on a budget
Summary: Read some scary reviews of this place and I think they are overlly critical based on the price. You get what you pay for. We stayed one night and the room was fine. If you want to go to disneyland and have a limited budget this works . The room is dated, but clean. Not too far to drive to the park. We could afford better so only stayed one night and moved closer to Disneyland. They also have a nice pool , and free food in the morning. Nothing wrong with some cereal and fruit for free. You can save a lot of money staying here and use your money for Disneyland...youll need it there !! If I was on a limited budget I would not hesitate to stay here again.
Manager Response: none

Summary: Its just a hotel very old.. anywhere from families to shady people.. but quiet and no drama when we were there.. cops cruise thru multiple times just to monitor.. it is along the freeway but our room was right on the freeway and noise was minimal..jacuzzi kind of dirty.. but you basically get what you pay for..We stayed because our house was being fumigated..wouldnt stay if i was on vacation..Asked for extra towels and pillows we had to go to the front desk and get them ourself..LAME
Manager Response: none

Summary: I have stayed in so many days inn so far and has never seen such a dirty place. It smelled like a old place. The staff are friendly and good. Breakfast is ok. But the room is bad and outdated. Worn out chairs, restrooms with no locks, floor carpet is very old and smelled bad. My daughter got lot of bug bites.
Manager Response: none

Summary: They forgot to clean our room 2x. When it was "cleaned" nothing was vacuumed nor were the counters cleaned. Air-conditioner was extremely loud. Some of the outlets did not work. The laundry was only open form 9am to 9pm.
Manager Response: none

Summary Heading: Pros and BIG Cons.. Read it all...
Summary: So I will start with the pros..   My boyfriend rented the larger suite at this hotel. This was a trip for my daughter and 3 of her friends for her birthday so we needed a larger room.What I will say is the room was huge it was like two hotel rooms that had been made into one including two bathrooms which was wonderful. (Room 205) The beds were clean and the couch bed seems very comfortable, the girls had no complaints about it. The other pro at this hotel was the pool, it was warm and large and the girls just had a ball swimming.  The jacuzzi was quite large as well, although one evening the bubbles did not work in it so it seem to be losing its temperature. They also have regular sized beach towels for the pool if you asked for them at the desk.The breakfast here is so
Manager Response: none

Summary: For a Days Inn, this was one of the poorest ones I have stayed in.  Non-smoking, but MANY guests just stepped outside on walkways to smoke. Really irritated my asthma walking to and from my room.  Much of it seemed to have that lower class "party" atmosphere with people hanging out late outside the rooms, talking, drinking, and smoking.  One night I had to open my door and ask them to take their conversations inside their room, as they woke me up.  Breakfast had very few selections, even when I arrived early. By mid-day the jacuzzi was murky, can only imagine what the little children did in there when allowed to just go where they want. Staff was friendly, room spacious, but the overall atmosphere with kids and young adult running around having a "blast" made me wish I had opted

Summary: The bed was uncomfortable. I found a live roach between the sheets, very noisy, no water pressure. I found it strange that they give you tickets for the continental breakfast.

Summary Heading: Overall, it was a nice stay. I was pleased with the...
Summary: Overall, it was a nice stay. I was pleased with the cleanliness of the room, and the internet was fast. I thought the price was fair considering I booked the room on the 4th of July! I will definitely stay here again. It was the first time with my date and she was very pleased and comfortable at your hotel.
Manager Response: none

Summary: The staff were nice.  I noticed a roach in the room and when I turned down the bedding another popped out of the blankets.  The Shower never really turned completely on due to the bath plumbing needing to be replaced.  The room we requested was supposed to be non smoking, but as soon as you open the door you could smell the tobacco. I stayed in Room #223
Manager Response: none

Summary: We booked this on very short notice for 2 nights! The room is typical hotel style room, Typical style hotel. It was clean and for the price was just what we needed. We checked in at 4am. The fronts desk clerk was awake and very friendly. We had left an Iphone in our room and were pleasantly surprised when we called and it had been turned in. Biggest complaint was the bed. The bed to me was hard as a rock and super uncomfortable but that could be because I like the softer style of mattress.
Manager Response: none

Summary: For a lower budget motel, everything was quite nice.  Clean rooms, friendly staff and a good night's sleep were the norm.
Manager Response: none

Summary: The rooms smelled liked smoke so we had to ask for another room. The phone and clock did not work. The wi-fi was horrible. The shower was another issue. It took a little while to figure I had to put it on cold to get hot water and hot to get cold water. And just because we reported an issues doesnt mean you just go into our room whenever you'd like. I got back to the hotel to check out and the door was wide open with all of our belongings just out in the open. Someone could have taken something without the maintence guy knowing. He didnt even know we were in the room until my husband said something. Will never stay there again!!!!

Summary: Overall this hotel was good, except for the parking, very limited parking in back of hotel so if your room is towards the back your car stays far.  Also, very close to highway which was a plus except for a car getting broken into.  Kind of worried to leave my car unattended.
Manager Response: none

Summary: We came to check in and they didn't have our rooms reserved. We had to go through and fill out paperwork AGAIN. It took over 45 minutes to get checked in. The lady at the desk is rude and barely  speaks English. She was absolutely no help at all.  Ridiculous.

Summary: Good Hotel. Decent price, clean & close to Knott's Berry, restaurant and other shopping. They do need better breakfast selection though.

Summary Heading: Check in and out was fast and easy . Associates were...
Summary: Check in and out was fast and easy . Associates were pleasent and friendly. Close to major attractions.Varitly of restraunts close by. Hotel offered discounts to differents restraunts. Liked the 12pm check out.

Summary Heading: I was impessed with the hotel I will stay there again.the...
Summary: I was impessed with the hotel I will stay there again.the only problem was there wae a strong smell of cat urine in the room/carpet

Summary Heading: Why Is This Place Ranke So High??
Summary: It was under par for almost $100 a night. We were in a bind and needed somewhere to sleep.  This was the only place that had a room.  It was old and the a/c didn't work.  Our room was on the freeway side and it was pretty noisy.  We didn't use any of the amenities.....

Summary: On a vacation with lots of plans we got from the hotel just what we needed, clean room, clean pool, working a/c, free simple breakfast

Summary: We are used to staying within walking distance to Disneyland but doing a visit during the summer months on a budget doesn't exactly allow for that. This Days Inn cost us $41 per night and for the price I was a little nervous about what we were going to get. Arriving was a little difficult because you have to go through the restaurant parking lot next door to the hotel after doing a U-turn on Beach Blvd. Once you figure that out it's easy to get in and out of the property.   The Room: Nice size room with plenty of room for the kids to play on the floor (yes the floor was surprisingly clean, not dirty like some hotels carpets tend to be) We had 2 queen size beds which was plenty of room for our family of 2 adults and 3 young kids. The room had a microwave and mini fridge as well
Manager Response: none

Summary: it was okay could have lotion and better cups to drink out of they fell apart when you drink water.

Summary Heading: Better than expected. The place is beautiful, the rooms are...
Summary: Better than expected. The place is beautiful, the rooms are large, clean, quiet, but the pool is cold.

Summary Heading: Great location and very friendly staff.
Summary: Great location and very friendly staff. Hotel is located within walking distance from the attractions, Shopping and Restaurants. Hotel has very friendly staff who willing help their customers with big smile on the face. They provided clean room and perfect breakfast for our family. It is very nice Hotel with great price.

Summary: WWe had a great time we would stay again here when we come back. The price was right and the staff was very nice we had a great view

Summary: Was in business meeting, returned after first night late to find the bed the way I left it. Used towels in the bath tub where I left them.  No one cleaned the room, but there were towels for the next morning and being tired I did not contact the office.  When I checked out I told them about the lack of service, and all I got was sorry.

Summary Heading: Not one of the better Days Inn. Location is fine but this...
Summary: Not one of the better Days Inn. Location is fine but this hotel is showing its age. Highway noise is excessive and beds are like rock. Front desk staff is friendly.

Summary: Traveled to the area to visit with my 1st great-grandchild. Needed a quiet room. The room & service etc. exceeded my expectations --for the price.All help was very friendly and accomadateing. Motel very hard to find- nee  to have directions from the freeways in Orange Co.
Manager Response: I appreciate your feedback.  Thanks.

Summary: My 5 day stay at the Days Inn Buena Park was comfy. The staff were very nice and polite. Days Inn could have upgraded some features like the TV set is still a 27" boob tube with no setting at all, The exhaust fan in the bathroom was not working either. Modern features could enhance the impression of Days Inn but that's my opinion. I give them an average rating nothing more nothing less.
Manager Response: Thanks for your feedback.  I agree that the TV screens are not of the most advanced quality.  I've also informed the maintenance staff to double check the exhaust fans.

Summary Heading: Not the best Days Inn we have stayed at
Summary: Location was fine..close to Disneyland and Knotts. We weren't bothered by the freeway being so close. Found black hairs in our sheets...we are blonde. Kind of grossed us out.  During check out there was 2 ladies working. Both were on the phone...one was doing actual hotel business...the other was calling about some classes she was trying to get into instead of helping the people in line. Breakfast area was small and ended at 9. Was not as good as the other Days Inn's we have stayed at recently.  We wont be here again.
Manager Response: Thanks for your feedback.  Your review will be passed onto our staff.

Summary Heading: was surprised it wasnt the red rood inn any longer but was...
Summary: was surprised it wasnt the red rood inn any longer but was employed wit the same staff as the year before when i stayed there the only issue i had is with the television turning off after so many hours no timer so couldnt figure that out overall the stay was good
Manager Response: Thanks for your feedback.  We changed over from Red Roof Inn back in June of 2012 to Days Inn, but we are essentially the same management staff.

Summary: great price and kids loved it.  blow dryer stopped working but they brought us a replacement right away.
Manager Response: I'm glad we were able to take care of the problem blow dryer.

Summary Heading: I only stayed one night. The room was clean. A little bit...
Summary: I only stayed one night. The room was clean. A little bit of noise from a couple rooms close by. But not something I couldn't deal with. I was expecting a little bit more variety in the breakfast selection. Not much to choose from. Overall, it was an ok hotel. I would stay again if in town. The price was pretty good.
Manager Response: Thank you for your feedback.

Summary: When you walk in this the lobby looks nice like it has been upgraded. Too bad the fun stops right there. My issues start with the carpet which was  old and felt funny when walked on. The bed was the next issue.. Cigarette burns on duvet and blankets in a non-smoking room that makes perfect sense. The matteress was fine but the pillows were more like towels folded in half and put in a pillow case. No complaints about the bathroom. The noise levels are due the neighboring 91 freeway but its not as bad as I thought it would be.  This is okay hotel if you just need a night to sleep I would not stay here if it was an extended trip.
Manager Response: I'm sorry about your stay.  If you let the front desk know, we can always move you to a different room that's to your standard, or try and take care of the issues that come up with our housekeeping department.

Summary Heading: room smelled bad, had a desk but no 3 prong outlet so desk...
Summary: room smelled bad, had a desk but no 3 prong outlet so desk was useless to do ANY work, desk lamp wasnt working either I made a complaint and nothing was done. pillows were old n flat.
Manager Response: Thank you for your feedback.  I'm currently having my maintenance team go through every room to make sure everything is in working condition.

Summary: This was my first time staying at a hotel by myself, and I gotta say it was great. The room was clean, nice, and fine. The only downside I had with the room was there wasn't enough outlets. I had to keep plugging and unplugging my electronics to switch to the microwave since I could only use two at a time in front the the writing desk. Oh, and the other downside was that the room telephone didn't work. Thankfully I didn't need to use it. Nevertheless, it was a fun experience for me, and I'd come back again.
Manager Response: Thank you for your feedback.  I'm currently having my maintenance team go through every room to make sure everything is in working order.  The power outlet is an issue that I'm aware of and I'm thinking of ways we can resolve it.

Summary: We booked this trip blind. The price was in our budget, location was perfect. The hotel is very clean but is in need of repair. Breakfast had a great selection.
Manager Response: Thank you for your feedback.  I'm currently having my maintenance team go through 100% of the rooms to make sure everything is in working condition.

Summary: While the hotel was close to Disneyland, the rooms faced towards the freeway and we had freeway noise the entire night! It was loud. Top that off with the rooms being incredibly disgusting. I have never felt more uncomfortable in a hotel room before. The carpet was dirty and the room had a terrible dirty smell to it. The only redeeming quality appeared to be the but and shower but when I turned on the shower, the pressure was almost nonexistent. Since we arrived late on Thurs night, I didn't have much options for hotel as the kids were tired. I don't consider myself much of a hotel snob, but this hotel made me one! I even considered checking out Fri morning and finding another hotel, but as were only going to be there one more night and wouldn't be spending any time in the room,
Manager Response: I'm sorry you weren't happy with your stay.  If you let the front desk know, we can often move you rooms to your satisfaction.  The rooms on the Target side are known to be more quiet.

Summary Heading: Great location.  Within walking distance of the attractions...
Summary: Great location.  Within walking distance of the attractions we came to visit.  Tip:  Don't get a room next to the ice machine.
Manager Response: Thank you for your feedback and tip.

Summary: Good value!  Decent cont. breakfast, clean room, good location.  Toilet seat needs tightened, only glitch I found.  For the room rate charged, this was an excellent value.  Will definitely stay here again!
Manager Response: Thank you for your feedback and recommendation, I'll pass this onto staff.

Summary Heading: Overall hotel was nice, plenty of parking. Staff was very...
Summary: Overall hotel was nice, plenty of parking. Staff was very friendly. Breakfast was good. Didn't get to use pool cause was sight seeing all day. Very quiet. Had designated smoking area. The only thing that needed upgrade was the tv.Tv was very old. The only down fall was on the last night there we seen a roach crawling on the wall!
Manager Response: Thank you for your feedback and recommendation.  We do not tolerate cockroaches in our hotel and have a service contract with Isotech as featured on the show, "Verminators".

Summary: My husband and teenage son recently stayed at this hotel. We enjoyed our stay very much! The hotel lobby as well as rooms are clean and beds are decently comfortable. Check in staff was very friendly and even gave us a couple of coupons for nearby restaurants (most within walking distance: Denny's, Subway, Fudruckers, and many more). Our family loved that there was free wifi in the rooms as we brought our laptop and was able to connect with no problems. Our room had a small fridge and microwave which we used to heat up microwave dinners purchased at the Target that is located in the same parking lot area. We had no problem finding parking when returning to our room at night after a long day at Disneyland, which is only about a 10 minute drive. Loved that it was right off the
Manager Response: Thank you for your feedback and recommendation.

Summary Heading: Staff was very frendly. Immediatly brought up a baby crib...
Summary: Staff was very frendly. Immediatly brought up a baby crib upon checking in.  Provided extra towels when requested.  We absolutly loved this hotel.  I'll reccomend it to all my friends. If any improvements were needed, it would be the continental breakfast. It did not have enough variety.
Manager Response: Thank you for your feedback!  Pictures of our breakfast can be found on our main website.

Summary: When we got to our room it was stuffy. It smeled terribly< imediately opened the window to air it out.  Then we went to eat and had to close it up again.  When we got back we showered ,and didn't like the lack of water pressure. It wasn't very quiet and the room still smelled. Also, there was/is mold and rust on the interior frame of the door.
Manager Response: I'm sorry for the condition of your room.  If you'll let the front desk room we can usually move you to a room to your satisfaction.

Summary: Extremely unhappy with the condition of our room, Filthy, not maintained and unacceptable. VERY BAD!
Manager Response: I'm sorry for the condition of your room.  If you'll let the front desk room we can usually move you to a room to your satisfaction.

Summary Heading: It was ok but I would rather stay somewhere else
Summary: Our bathtub leaked pretty bad, guy came over to fix it. it stopped for a minute until he left and it started again. told them it was still leaking with no help. There were tiny water bugs all over the sink, phone had no buttons on it and had broken cord, and the hair dryer didn't work either. We had a nice neighbor which was great. There was a refrigerator and microwave which was nice. The room was super hot when we walked in and had to have the air on while we were out for the day. They asked if we wanted to change rooms but they didn't have rooms with 2 beds like ours was and since we had 3 people, we decided to just tough it out and stay.  It is an old building so I am sure thats why it wasn't the greatest stay. I have heard many great things about Days Inn but they must be
Manager Response: Thank you for your feedback.  All our equipment in the rooms should be in working condition.  I will be informing my maintenance team to go in and make sure everything is functioning in the rooms.

Summary: Late night check in with HS cheerleaders.... requested rooms be next to each other. Did not happen. Close, however.  Going to bed, 1 room had silverfish between the sheets, 1 room smelled poorly, 1 room fan rattled on any speed.  It was spring break so there were those who chose to run up and down halls, pound on rails and doors. Staff gave us a different room for the bugs, comped us one night, and it was all good.  Works well for us on a very tight school budget, and taking kids. I don't think I would stay if traveling on my own.  The kids had a great time, and that's all that matters, so if they want to return next year... we will!!
Manager Response: I'm glad you let us know about the problems you had with your rooms and we were able to take care of your issues.

Summary: the customer service on phone was not great, when checked in I went to counter and stood there with all my luggage and the lady didn't acknowledge me until a minute later and I was standing in front of her
Manager Response: Thank you for your feedback.  I'm not exactly sure about the circumstances of your situation.  Sometimes our front desk staff are very busy taking phone reservations and trying to check people in at the same time during our busiest times.  We're not intentionally trying to be rude, and appreciate your patience.

Summary Heading: Rooms are extremely noisy due to location right next to the...
Summary: Rooms are extremely noisy due to location right next to the freeway.  The mattresses need to be replaced as they are hard and the springs are poking .  Pillows are old and need to be replaced.  No Kleenexes available in the rooms as they are in other motels I've stayed in.  The hi speed internet was anything but high speed.  Had trouble axcessing several internet programs, and ended up shutting down due to frustration.
Manager Response: I apologize for the condition of your room.  We can always move you to a different room if it's not to your satisfaction.  The Target side is more quiet.  The mattresses will get replaced if the springs are poking guests, and we can always replace any pillows as necessary.  The hi-speed Internet is capped for each user in order to make sure everyone can get on the Internet.

Summary: On my visit, for a local medical class/conference, I suffered a migraine upon returning to my room. This unfortunately is normal for me however on this trip I dd not have my regular medication. Although there is a target store very close, I was not in a state in which walking there was feasible. I went to the lobby where the wonderful woman helped me by giving me some headache relief from the hotels first aid kit. The representative was very comforting and sympathetic to my situation which was very helpful.  I would recommend this location to all of my friends and colleagues in the future based on how I was treated.
Manager Response: I'm glad we could help.  Thank you for your feedback.

Summary Heading: We had intended to stay for 4 days but the room was so bad...
Summary: We had intended to stay for 4 days but the room was so bad we barely made it through one night! The tube was in such bad shape, we didn't even want to bath there. The tube backed up and the lamp was falling apart. It was not except able!! We checked out the next day and they didn't even ask why so they knew!!! There wasn't even enough food for everyone to eat breakfast. WE have stayed at Days Inn in another state and it was good, this one ruined any chance of ever staying again!! We should of ask for our money back!!!
Manager Response: I'm sorry about your stay.  I will check on the breakfast issue.  Usually, we can move you to a different room that is to your satisfaction.

Summary: It is like a maze to go through many parking lots to reach the Hotel entry. My room at the freeway side, one of the double windows was missing, the noise was terrible. Only one trash cain in the entire room, not enough Pillows for 2 persons (Only 3 Pillows) in the entire room. There wasn't enough breakfast at 8:15 am
Manager Response: Thanks for the feedback.  It can get confusing to get to our hotel.  We're in the same parking lot as Target.  If there are any problems with your room, please let the front desk know and we can usually take care of any issues, including pillow shortages, or if we need to move you to a different room.  The rooms on Target side are away from the freeway and generally more quiet.

Summary: I called the morning of our first nights' stay to ask for considerations and to my surprise (we arrived late!) they had the perfect room for us! The breakfast was just perfect for my family; it was close to Knotts Berry Farm, which we were visiting. The only small complaint I had was that the pool opened on the late side. We were on the back side, which WAS pretty quiet.
Manager Response: Thank you for your feedback and thanks for the tips.

Summary: This hotel is disgusting!!! there was blood on the shower wall, the sink leaked underneath , the bathroom floor was dirty. And the beds were not soft! People in the next room soounded like the were making a porno! Me and my family were there to go to knotts berry farm the next day! and was not a happy day at all. None of us got any sleep! Dont spend your money here! and the shower bar in the bathroom was falling off!
Manager Response: I apologize about your stay.  If your room is not to your satisfaction, please let the front desk know and we can usually take care of the issue or move you to an acceptable room.

Summary: We got to our room the heater/ac was not working properly.  We got to change to another room the heater/ac again was shutting off.  The sheets of the second room was dirty and the room was not ready for service.  Dirty towels were on the sink counter and only one trash can.  Also, the location was terrible for me who reserved this room almost ten months before check-in.  I wouldn't refer anybody for "Days Inn".    The night staff only had one person working.  I had to come down, drop off the dirty sheets, pick up clean sheets and make up the bed which had dirty sheets.  Disgruntled customer
Manager Response: It looks as though you may had been moved to a dirty room.  I apologize for the mix up.  I don't think they should had let you stay in there!  I'll check with my staff to see if I can locate your room information, or you can contact me direct with your reservation name and date of stay.

Summary: down the street from knotts berry farm. I love days in due to the free breakfast but maybe the could of done more in the selection like their other days in. in all we liked staying there.
Manager Response: Thank you for your feedback.  Days Inn has a brand has a standard breakfast requirement that we follow.  Some hotels do go above and beyond what's required due to local competition.  Compared to other hotels in the area, the breakfast we offer is comparable if not better :]

Summary: I stayed at this hotel for 3 nights its not bad just to sleep very close to target which was awesome. But my room had a lot of areas in the room on the walls that they repaired but its very noticeable they put the spackle and never sanded or textured it also you could see paint on the picture in the bathroom. Clean room overall didn't have a funky smell. The breakfast was good being it just be cereal,toast,English muffin, blueberry muffins, with oj, apple juice and coffee my only problem was the breakfast only went till 9am so after spending 15 hours in Disneyland and waking up at 10am you can't get the breakfast its not so bad because Denny's is like 2 minutes away. Also when you check in you get a little coupon thing for 10% off local restaurants. All in all not a bad place
Manager Response: Thanks for your feedback.  If you'll let the front desk know which room you were in, we can make sure that the maintenance is touched up on.

Summary Heading: Staff very friendly and understanding.customer service...
Summary: Staff very friendly and understanding.customer service A+.rooms bery clean and nice and for the price tour winning this hotel should be up there with bestwestern and hiltons
Manager Response: Wow.  Thank you very much.  I'll let the staff know they have a fan!

Summary: Good location, restaurants and stores at walkind distance. Close to the highway but still quiet enough to get some rest.
Manager Response: Thank you for your feedback!  It makes me happy to see someone satisfied with their stay.

Summary Heading: Now called Knights Inn - good cheap place to stay
Summary: On google maps, it is still called Days Inn Buena Park, but now it is a Knights Inn. It was a clean place to stay for $50 a night. There is very little sound proofing in the rooms, so all the cars and people that came and went in the middle of the night woke me up the first night we were there. The adjoining room had an adjoining door, that was obviously locked, but I could hear their complete conversation without trying very hard. Cleanliness was really great, but soundproofing wasn't so great. I invested in ear plugs the next night and was much happier. We were with kids and visiting a student at Biola.
Manager Response: Our particular hotel used to be called Red Roof Inn, and now we're Days Inn.  The FORMER Days Inn at a different location in Buena Park used to be called "Days Inn" and now it's call "Knights Inn".  I know it's a little confusing.

Summary: So close to the freeway that I had to buy ear plugs for my family to be able to sleep. TV would randomly turn on and off, waking me and my son up in the middle of the night. If you want to be able to sleep, don't stay here.
Manager Response: You can request to have your room in a quite section of the hotel.  The side on Target seems to be the quietest.  And the TV issue is something we can take a look at if the front desk is notified.

Summary Heading: Found Cockroaches crawling on our walls
Summary: We arrived Friday past midnight since we had to detour due to snow on Grapevine. We chose Days Inn due to its location & it had been decent & comfortable in the past. We didnt find a fridge, but we shrugged it off! But the bathroom was really old and just not up to standard with other Days Inn we've stayed at in the past. The next day(sat) we mostly stayed in Knotts. Then came back just to sleep again. Bed was not so comfortable as it sags and I had to go to the front lobby to ask for extra pillows since almost all the pillows in our room was flat & uncomfortable. On Sunday morning while having my coffee, my daughter and I saw a few small & medium-sized COCKROACHES crawling on the walls! We woke up the rest of the family & packed our bags & got out of there as fast as we can! I
Manager Response: I apologize for the service you received.  We should had moved you rooms!  I'll double check with my staff to see if we can locate the room you stayed in and who it was you talked with.  We also have a contract with the "Verminators" as played on the Discovery Channel, as our contracted exterminators.  Thanks for your feedback.

Summary: This room had tons of coachroaches,I even took pictures of the roaches,across the headboard,went to use hair dryer and piece of roach came out, by table,could not get a good nite sleep due to seeing them crawling around, If I did not have to be in town for business I would not of stayed and would of requested my money back. But I had no choice. i DID NOT GO TO FRONT DESK TO COMPLAIN ,as i felt they would of just move me to another infested room, Front desk was unfriendly and just keep repeating to me to not smoke in room, I do not smoke but that was her only concern..Upon arriving home I had to fumagate all my clothes,suitcases,etc so as not in bring roaches in to my home.
Manager Response: I apologize for the experience you had.  I can assure you that of the 131 rooms we have located in three different buildings, and four floors, it's very rare for a cockroach infestation.  We would had moved you to a room that was to your satisfaction.  Allowing a guest to stay in a room that we know is infested with cockroaches is unconscionable.    We have a regular service contract with the company that's showcased on the Discover Channel show, "The Verminators."  As soon as we hear a room has issues with bed bugs or cockroaches, we immediately place it out of order and call in the professionals.

Summary: I read the reviews on this hotel and they weren't all that good. I will say the hotel was clean but it was very noisy with the freeway being right next door. I usually like to keep the door open for some fresh air but it was just too loud to even hear someone speaking to you 5 feet away.  Another thing to be warned about with this hotel is it is entrance. You MUST pull into the entrance to Black Angus and then hike left to get to the hotel. If you missed that and entrance you are getting back on the 91 Freeway as I did.   The continental breakfast is also a sub par. A couple of different kinds of cereal, oatmeal, a little bit of fruit and bread. They had Danish, but they were small and had been cut in half!!! I had never seen that at the many many hotels I have stayed at.
Manager Response: Thank you for your feedback.  If noise is a concern, I would recommend requesting a room away from the freeway.  The entrance to our hotel is the same as Target.  The breakfast we offer is pictured on our main website.  We typically have a designated individual that takes care of breakfast from 6AM - 9AM because the front desk does get busy.  I will double check with my staff to ensure this is emphasized again.

Summary Heading: Clean Comfortable Good Service Close to Disneylant
Summary: Good place to stay if your traveling to Anaheim to visit Disneyland. Is next to a freeway but noise from traffic is not bad. Very nice folks at front desk, accommodating. Does have continental breakfast from 6-9 in am. Would stay there again as it is a good bargain and a nice place to drop after a day at the amusement parks.
Manager Response: I appreciate the feedback.  If the traffic noise is too much, you can ask for a room away from the freeway.  Or if you're stuck on the freeway side, turn on the A/C to create some "white noise" that'll help you sleep better.

Summary: I was there for business at Yamaha Corporation. The only problem with that hotel is it's too close to the freeway, and very noisy at night. Needs some better insulation with the door way somehow. The noise was coming into the room from the door facing the freeway. if there was a deflector there of some kind, if would have been much nicer. otherwise, the room was great. I am also a Windham property owner at the Ellette level. So I expect the best.
Manager Response: Thanks for your feedback!  It can be noisy on the freeway side, and you can request to be placed on the side away from the freeway.  For our regulars, their favorite rooms are on the 4th floor on the Target side.  For those who aren't able to move, turning on the fan on the A/C unit help a lot to create "white noise."  In fact, that's what I do at home for myself and my babies anyway to help me sleep better.

Summary: Thought I was booking the Days Inn closer to Knott's Berry Farm which is now a Knights Inn. First and last time at this one. The Freeway is a 100 yards away and the noise was constant, all day and all night. The room was OK and reasonably clean. The pillows were very thin, we went to the nearby Target and bought $4 pillows. Other than the noise the location is OK, restaurants are nearby but it's a long walk to Knott's Berry Farm.
Manager Response: I apologize for the confusion of the location.  We have become the Days Inn in Buena Park since June 2012.    You can request a room away from the freeway if the noise will be an issue.  We also can bring extra pillows to your room.    We are a one mile walk away from Knott's Berry Farm.  We share the same parking lot as Target for more convenience and savings for your stay.  Thank you for your stay.

Summary Heading: I have stayed now two different times at a Days Inn.  Both...
Summary: I have stayed now two different times at a Days Inn.  Both times there were things requested from front desk and did not receive.  Both rooms showed extreme aging (needed paint work, carpets, tubs scratch, etc).  I know the price is right, but would expect better rooms.  Did not have towels in room and asked early enough for them to be put in room.  When returned had to go to desk and get them.  Not happy
Manager Response: I'm very disappointed that my staff didn't take care of your basic needs.  I'm currently in the process of hiring additional maintenance team members so that we can take care of the issues you pointed out.  Your review will be relayed to the Days Inn staff.

Summary Heading: Clean and Quiet; Would Stay Here Again
Summary: I stayed at this inn about three years before, when it was a Red Roof Inn. I made a reservation online through Days Inn about a week before our stay. My daughter and I were assigned room 408 (2 queens, MW, frig, hairdryer, non-smoking, free room WiFi & continental breakfast), at the back of the building closest to the Target store. We stayed 3 nights: Dec 29 ~ Dec 31, 2012. Price $63.99 + $7.68 tax each for 12/29 & 12/30; $79.99 + $9.60 tax for 12/31.   First, I’d like to point out that there were 3 appliances for only 2 outlets: the TV and frig were plugged in, the MW was not. In order to use the MW, you had to unplug one of the other.  During our 2nd night, the heat register stopped working while we were asleep. I also attempted to use the MW the next morning, but it didn’t
Manager Response: Thank you for your review.  I'll inquire why you weren't given discounts to local restaurants.  They're typically handed out to every check in.  Denny's gives our guests 10% off.  I'm in process of overhauling the maintenance side to ensure issues that you experienced are minimized.    Thanks again.

Summary Heading: Great Customer Service, Terrible Beds & Noisy
Summary: The location was very good; 3 blocks from Knot's Berry Farm. We were able to walk there and save on parking fees. The staff was wonderful, there were always helpful & friendly. Free WiFi & Continental Breakfast were appreciated The beds were awful, we woke up feeling like we slept on the floor all night. The hotel is located next to a major highway & we heard the traffic noise constantly. The room was clean but outside was dirty looking. Overall we would rate this hotel as average.
Manager Response: Thank you for your feedback.  We have hotels rooms on the side away from the freeway if noise is an issue, and we've replaced beds in some of the rooms.  When checking in, you can request a room with one of our nicer beds.

Summary: After 1 night our car was vandilized, I parked only 20ft away from the front hotel lobby door thinking it would be safe. wrong!  When we went to the car to take our daughter to disneyland, i saw the passenger window was shattered and found a note on the drivers window from buena park police, I went to the front desk and the guy said the police didnt notify him about our car, and he seemed to have an attitude as if was our fault. I asked him to check out my car , he didnt want to go and said he couldnt right now. We also contacted the Manager , left a voice maill and email message. No reply .  after 3 days staying at this terrible hotel. I parked the car near my room window and stayed up all night to watch it, I hope others will write a review on this dump, i will never stay at
Manager Response: I'm very sorry to hear about the break in to your car.  Car thefts are very rare, and we advise all guests to make sure they hide all their valuables away from sight.  In this bad economy, even some loose change may cause desperate individuals to break your car windows.  A very common one is when people leave their GPS on display.  I personally parked my car at the site for over one year every night and never gotten broken into.   Ultimately, it's very shameful that any crime occurs on our property, but you will find this issue at any hotel that doesn't have full time security walking the parking lots every night.

Summary: We stayed at this Days Inn for four nights at a very reasonable rate.  When the dryer didn't work the first morning they had it fixed by the next morning.  Breakfast was marginal and the number of people for the space made it very crowded.  Good location for Anaheim.
Manager Response: Thank you for your review.  It can get crowded in the breakfast area from around 8AM - 9AM.  In light of that, I'll inform my staff to allow guests to bring food into their rooms.

Summary: I've stayed at this hotel several times over the years. I've continued to go back because of the convenience for me to get back on the freeway. It was my understanding that the hotel switched to Day Inn this past June.   I was in room #210 and the room wreaked of mildew. The business desk in the room wasn't level and two of the outlets in the room didn't work. I went down to the vending machine and 4 of the 8 selections were out of order.   Upon my check in the gal behind the desk seemed flustered. She said that she needed to count her drawer and that I needed to go sit down and wait 15-20 minutes before checking in with her. She wasn't wearing a name badge. Another gentlemen came in around the same time and was treated the same way. After she called me back to the front desk I
Manager Response: We can move you rooms if you have any issues with your current one.  I'll let my Operations Manager know about this so that they stop playing video games behind the front desk.  I'll also send him your feedback about how you were treated by different staff members.  It does get to be a little crazy during our shift changes at around 2:30 PM since they have to count their cash drawers.
